This place has horrible customer service, asked about baked chicken only got one word answers which was no!. Told them never mind and all we got was a turned back. No I'm sorry, nothing!! Won't ever go back to this location.

We've been here 3 times since discovering this gem last Fall.  Superior customer service -  cheerful staff.  From appetizers,  fried rice, noodle dishes, fish entrees, each order has been delicious and substantial.  Prices are fair and portions large so with leftovers, we get two meals for the price of one.  Clean restaurant - it's obvious this family run business strives to be the best.

I was really anticipating a great green chile pork burrito. I went through drive thru. Very nice young man helped me. He asked if I wanted any hot sauce, I said yes I'm going totally green today. The total tab was $6.80 including tax for 1 burrito. Which I thought was pretty pricy considering it is fast food. The size of the burrito was very big and had a lot of big chunks of pork and green gravy. It tasted awesome. Just enough heat for me. But the pork was extremely tough. If the pork is braised or slow roasted it should melt in your mouth. There was a lot of fat in it too. The only way you can get that tough meat I believe is microwaving. I hope this is an isolated situation. What a waste of money. I have had rolled tacos with guacamole and they were good. I hope somebody else posts their experience with the green chili was awesome.

This is the worst place ever! My Dr ordered a CPAP machine for me here early July, here it is now September and not a word from them. A couple of weeks ago I walked into their office to find out what is going on with my order and all I got was attitude. I was told that they are waiting for my insurance to authorize the machine. So I called my insurance right in there lobby. Insurance told me that they didn't need a pre-authorization for a CPAP. I told them this and I got even more attitude. Now it's 3 weeks later and still no word from them. Went to my Dr and went with a different company.  I came home with a CPAP 4 days later.  I don't understand why this company is still in business!

I'm a former auto technician (I've written for Motor, MotorAge magazines) but sometimes I'm just too busy to do my own work.  So occasionally I'll turn one of my vehicles over to a shop, usually with VERY SPECIFIC directions on what I want done, what brand of parts I want used, whether to REPAIR the vehicle or INSPECT AND ADVISE me on the diagnosis, cost, etc.   I've turned to Greenway Family Auto Service twice now.  Never again.  First time I go to pick up my car, which was running great when I brought it in, and it wouldn't idle.  Barely ran.  The cause is unimportant, (although Greenway caused it), what's objectionable is the tech didn't bother to test drive the car, or didn't even notice backing out of the bay the repairs had induced a serious driveability problem.  I also started seeing transmission fluid on my garage floor after a transmission service at Greenway.  I start the motor, let it idle in neutral, pull the dipstick and it's overfilled.  WTF?   More recently I took it in with a complaint of "Power brakes intermittent --- check for cracked hoses, etc - AND check out that (apparent) tranny leak.  Mind you, I love Dominic and these guys, they got class, but they always seem to be in too big a hurry, rushing, instead of taking the time and doing things right and MOST IMPORTANTLY checking their work.  Confirming the repair, so-to-speak. So instead of actually checking the vacuum hose, (aka DIAGNOSIS) they write me a quote for $1100 to replace the brake booster, including $700 for the booster itself. (Not a Lexus booster, according to the tech I spoke with on the phone)  I can purchase a top-of-the-line, lifetime warrantied booster at NAPA for $330.  Retail.  Greenway obviously can buy it even cheaper.  So a 100+% markup?  Really?  REALLY?   Declining the repairs BUT paying $45 for supposed "diagnosis," I bring her home to do the work myself.  And what do I immediately find?  A cracked, rock-hard vacuum line to the brake booster.  $7 worth of vacuum hose later I'm good to go.   I can no longer recommend Greenway to friends or family.  Oh, and I'd like my $45 for "diagnosis" back. And whatever you charged me for twice as much ATF as my Lexi actually needed.

Only pleasant experience about going to this kfc/taco bell was the friendly cashier.  The store smelled like pee and the lady that gave us our food was very rude.  Charging for utensils, really!!!  The chicken was very undercooked there was still blood on the inner meat and bones...Never going back to this kfc ever again.

Maybe it was an "off" night for them tonight as the food was overwhelming with ginger.  I appreciate that they let me exchange one dish for another as this was the first time at ANY restaurant EVER I have asked to return a dish as I was literally unable to eat it (my normal favorite phad phrik khing looked like chicken with thanksgiving gravy sprinkled in ginger strips).  Waitresses were kind but I was extremely disappointed in the food.
Went there for lunch the other day and the food was really good... Spicy yet flavorful will be back... Wait staff extremely friendly and if you go during lunch the service is quick... A must to try!

I also agree if I could give this place a 0 I definitely would also I call all the time no one ever answers and then you get the recording that says our office is open from 8 to 4 Lunch close from 12 to 1 I call at 11:30 all the way up to 12 and no one answers then when I leave messages no one ever calls me back and then their customer service stinks also I would not give this place business it's not worth the headaches
What can I say about Line Thai?! I always get friendly service and I can't get enough of their Tom Yum Kai soup! Try #38, it's my favorite.

I just moved to the area and went in to this location for the first time today. I must say i was VERY impressed! I have been to many different petsmart locations in multiple states and I was not too thrilled with them. This location is by far the best i have been to! I walked in and was immediately greeted. I took my dog into the groomer to get his nails trimmed and the ladies in the salon were very nice and great with my super nervous dog! While they worked on him i went to do some shopping and all the employees on the floor were so nice and helpful! The cashier was so sweet and personable! The store and the salon looked to be extremely clean and well kept. It was such a welcoming and happy atmosphere and I definitely will be back!!!

We were referred to Mitch Taylor by another vendor, when our shower floor show signs of problems out of their domain.  In fact there turned out to be major problems that could be traced back to our remodel done 6 years prior.  Bram's team correctly identified the mistakes, and made significant corrections. They worked over a week-end (Thanksgiving week-end no less) to accomodate our schedule.  The work was excellent, as was the clean up. We felt that the cost was very fair.  We were very satisfied with the results, and highly reccomend them.We wont hesitate to use them again if needed.

Only open Sundays get ready for a day of entertainment, fun and more importantly spending money!

Start off in the main show room by putting a $20 deposit on a bidders number. 

Then head outside.  The first set of auctions is the job lots outside where box lots go under the hammer for pennies on the dollar.  

Usually about 11am depending on volume you will next proceed to the collectibles in the west building.  Here you are presented with rows of tables, wall items and cases of items going up for bid. 

Lastly you can find the most amazing furniture in the main building.  They really find the most incredible items of unusual design from all over the SW. 

The Brunk family handle the auction like a well oiled machine.... with some fun laughs in between. 

It doesn't cost anything if you dont bid, but you will so reserve a number just in case.  

Food and drink are sold outside.  Get ready for an all day Sunday experience.

Fresh. That is the word.to describe.the China Olive buffet in sun city.  Stopped here on awhim.for lunch and am extremely impressed.  The food is clean, light flavorful and fresh much variety with smiling staff and relaxing atmosphere.  You will absolutely agree after your visit....give it Try great value for the money, definitely I will be back   two thumbs up!!!

I am writing this review, concerning repair of a custom power wheelchair.
My mother's custom power tilt in space wheelchair needed a wheel repaired, the day before she went into the hospital. We drove to 2 other local assistive mobility places and they were absolutely no help to us. SOUTHWEST MOBILITY, however were friendly and willing to help us immediately. Julio, one of their repair men could not have been more kind, efficient and helpful. A few weeks later, when she was in rehab, there was a mechanical issue with her wheelchair and the rehab hospital was incompetent to find someone to repair it. My mother called Julio and the next day, he came over to the rehab hospital and fixed it immediately. He even called me on my cell phone, just to let me know that everything was going well. Thank you!!!

My wife and I stopped in on 8/8/17 at PetSmart on Bell Road to pick up some crickets for our lizards. While waiting in the checkout line we noticed the pet grooming room which was about 10-15 feet away. We witnessed a female dog groomer grooming a medium sized dog and we were taken back when we saw how this female groomer (she had tattoos on her forearms) was mishandling the white poodle type dog under her control.
The dog was visibly shaken and was being restrained, very frightened and being treated very poorly. This handler was grabbing, pulling and had a very tight grip on this dog and this dog made many attempts to nip at this female groomer. We did not wittiness any kindness toward this dog as it was being restrained while being groomed and we felt that this dog was being treated in such an frustrated (by the female groomer) manner scaring this small dog. We reported what we saw to the cashier and she also agreed that this dog was not being treated with any form of kindness.
If anyone is considering having their pet groomed here we would recommend remaining within sight of your pet while it was being groomed or seek grooming services elsewhere.
Thank you...

This place  is the finest Chinese buffet my husband and I have ever had. They have a full sushi bar, king crab, all the to die for regular eats and the best ice cream and dessert bars. Don't know why there are a few 1 stars for this place. It's new, clean, great customer service and fresh food. Highly recommended.

I used to love this store. They used to be very accommodating.  However, they have somehow lost their license to sell prescription meds.  They also lost a prescription I had on file with them and now I have to pay the Vet for a new prescription.

The store might have changed ownership; the guy who was there the last time I went was rude, nonhelpfu, evasive.

Nope, won't be going back.
This shop is the best. Always gentle with pets, never had a bad grooming!  Debbi runs a friendly business with high standards!

I just moved to town and was looking for a good dentist.  1st Classic Dental had some good reviews so I scheduled an exam and cleaning.  It ended up being a great choice.  Michelle at the front desk was extremely knowledgeabe and helpful.  When I got to the back, everyone was great.  Valerie did a fantastic job on my cleaning.  It was painless and thorough.  Dr. Samain came in and patiently answered all my questions.  She made a wonderful impression on me and I will definitely be back.  Everyone was so friendly.  5 stars.

we ate there about 3 months ago for dinner on a weekday. the food was terrible. out of all the dishes on the buffet, only 2 were edible. the crablegs were old and they only brought out 1 tray during the whole time we were there. they never brought out anymore. dont no how they stay open.

China Olive in Sun City was wonderful. The service was very good, prompt and cheerful. They took away dirty dishes at a good pace and refilled drinks quickly. Large variety of foods and organized very well. Everything tasted great and looked and tasted fresh. Now you can tell that it is a work in progress. The decor is still from previous tenent but you can see that they will be changing that out as they can. Although the rug is old, they were very good at cleaning up after guests left, sweeping and making sure things were tidy. 
Overall I truly like this place very much.

It went great. Dr. Athari put a great deal of effort into making sure my dentures fit just right. More than any other dentist I've used in the past, and this is my third set. I only needed one small adjustment, and these dentures fit better than any other set I've had.

Very nice and helpful. Went in looking to repair a wheelchair. Decided it was probably wiser to just buy new but needed to think on it. Went back about a week later and made my purchase. They hooked me up and loaded it in the trunk. Very knowledgeable and customer oriented.

Mitch Taylor, the owner of Bram Flooring, is one of the people I depend on to keep my customers happy.  

I've used them a number of times to do tile, carpet, and even rebuild/retile an entire walk in shower.

Mitch's commitment to quality is second to none that I've encountered in the flooring business.   He wants happy customers, and goes the extra mile to ensure that the job is done right.

On a number of occasions, he's come in 25-30% under competitors' bids, and the material he put down was better quality.   

Mitch, and Bram Flooring, have a simple philosophy.  They tell you what it'll take to get the job done right, let you decide which material grade fits in your budget, and then makes sure the work is done expertly.   No upselling, no hidden costs or last minute fees.   

You simply get the best quality product, and installation, that you can get for your money.

I can't understand what happened to this place. We have been shopping here for the last five years and in the last two months the deals are gone, the great checkers we had have been replaced by a bunch of children who couldn't possibly be any slower, maybe it's because our groceries got in the way of his Monster beverage which he sipped while at the register. It's very unfortunate that today, 11/6/15, was our last day ever shopping at this Safeway. We want our old Safeway back!!!
Had a faux leather jacket tailored here to shorten the sleeves. Came out great just in time for when I needed it.

Mario and Landon were excellent! I was surprised at how quickly they worked. They were very courteous and respectful in the house. The house is brighter and fresher now that I can see clearly through my windows. Thanks Mario and Landon for a job well done!

I have been to this particular Starbucks before and I like the location.  Should mention that as in all Starbucks the free WiFi is standard but appreciated. I asked the cashier if she would allow me to break a $100 bill. Her entire demeanor changed in an instant. "No, we don't change hundreds." She said. Really Starbucks? I found the manager who was perfectly busy taking "care" of the customers. He told me he can change the bill for me, and quickly served me up a complementary tall house with room. The coffee was just the way I like it. The place is clean and is maybe more accommodating for clients who are over 50 I guess. I will continue to come here when it is convenient,but I leave here today thinking that, the Starbucks employees of the world are like a garden of beautiful flowers, yet there are some weeds here and there.
This is my usual Starbucks; because it's the closest to my house. Have always had a great experience here. Friendly staff; standard Starbucks.

This was a horrible experience for me.  Jennifer sold me a Pre-Mobility Scooter a year ago.  She told me it was slightly used but had new batteries.  That was important to me because I traded in my old one that had dead batteries.  Expensive part of a SCOOTER.  Last week the batteries were not charging.  Called their repair guy and he came and said the batteries were the original batteries.  So not new ones when bought per Jennifer the sales person.  The charger had a light on it..but never came on.  That is ruined...told overcharged.  We did not overcharge 
them.  We called Jennifer and I was mad and said she lied to me...nothing working on it.  Like new too.  She said she would give $200 out of her own money towards new batteries.  I handed phone to husband and Jennifer apparently changed her mind and started cussing at him and hung up on him after saying write a bad review on Yelp!    It is now costing us $350 for batteries and $56 for a charger.  Horrible service..lied...and dishonest.  Go elsewhere.

Dr. Samain is a lovely lady.  When I went there the staff kept changing with each visit.  I spent close to $5,000 which included a bridge that was so unbelievably painful I couldn't use it .... some snip of a receptionist said to me, oh, you'll get used to it.  Why should I try to get used to severe pain.  The Dr. then wanted me to pay for another more sophisticated bridge and just toss the other one in the garbage.  No thanks.  I haven't had a great dentist since I left the east coast.
I am enjoying their 1/2 off fraps.  The smores Frap is delicious.  My sister doesn't drink coffee so she ordered one that was cream based.  It was yummy as well!

I've used Ester at least 5 times.  She does great work and gets it done quick.  Every time has been reasonably priced.  I've also used her for same day work.  

I love her personality.  Sometimes she is strictly business and sometimes she is funny but with a dry sense of humor.  She also has no problem giving me a hard time if I deserve it.  

Be ready to pay with cash when you pick up.  She doesn't take credit cards.

My father past in June. It was completely unexpected so nothing was planned. Every single staff member was courteous and caring. They were willing and available to help us in every way possible. We had a man named Governor who helped us through the process of choosing a plot. He really made us as comfortable as possible and really handled everything. The cemetery is beautiful and well taken care of. There are tons of wildlife and the lake is amazing. They went above and beyond what we were very expecting. They made it a beautiful service.
They need to work on their customer service and lose the attitude.  Stay away from Carrie she doesn't know what she is doing and says your wrong instead of apologizing.

One of the rare experiences of my life was my encounter with Mr. Mushkatel. Generally, interactions with attorneys are painful and frustrating at best. I enjoyed every minute that I spent with him. He was pleasant, respectful and most important, successful and efficient. 
He was fair and generous with his billing, and in the end, we were extremely happy with the outcome. I could not recommend him anymore highly

Made an appointment for a consultation. They called the night before and cancelled. Never offered to reschedule. I had to call them to reschedule for the following week. THEY CALLED THE DAY OF THE APPOINTMENT AND CANCELLED saying they aren't accepting new clients. BAD BUSINESS !!!! I WILL NEVER RECOMMEND THIS FIRM. I gave them 2 chances based on previous reviews. I should have been looking elsewhere instead of them waisting 2 weeks of my time
Rudest people on earth.  I have never seen such bad customer service from employees.  Never again.

Course is not in the greatest shape and doesn't look like it's tended too very well.  No marshal, no beverage cart and had groups coming on randomly at different holes slowing up the pace of play.   Service in the restaurant was fantastic and very friendly though and the food was pretty good for club food.

People are friendly and do a good job. I like their hours and location.

My dogs seem to be happy when we leave. The little one does not shake when we go there. She wasn't sure at first as we moved here from Oregon and had to adopt to a new groomer.

This is usually a happy story to visit and shop; today I got aggravated by a rude employee. 

I spent almost $60 at Pet Smart Store #1040 (13764 W Bell Rd, Surprise, Arizona 85374). When I asked for assistance for a product in the cat department, I was taken to a blond lady with glasses chatting with a co-worker. The associate said she worked in that (cat) department. Instead of acknowledging my presence, she continued to chat with a co-worker. After waiting there for about 30 seconds being ignored (after the other associate took me to her), I excused myself for interrupting to ask for a product and her response was to sigh. Without making eye contact, she said "Follow me" and walked away. She took me to two places until she finally found the product I was looking for (Nature's Miracle for removing urine stains).

She preceded to hand me a gallon size. When I asked if she had a smaller bottle like on another shelf, she sighed again, looked up and claimed that ANY cleaner would work as well. When I asked if she had one with the large yellow label specifically for urine, as did the gallon size, she sighed a third time and repeated that any other cleaner would do the same thing!

Upon check-out, I briefly told that cashier that she was rude to me. The cashier responded as if it was MY misunderstanding!

I'm a regular customer at this Pet Smart branch, but they have lost my business after today.
Tried their  food for the first time their breakfast burrito  was great , reasonable  prices and great service
I brought my 9 year old dog in for her first experience at a groomer ever and I will definitely be bringing her back! Amanda did an amazing job!

I have had a lot of dental work done, so I'm very familiar with dentists and dental offices.  Dr. Athari and staff are professional, friendly, competent, and make you feel completely relaxed and comfortable. The office is very modern and clean.  I have had 6 implants done at various places ... my family dentist, oral surgeons, and Midwestern University Dental School.  After meeting with Dr. Athari and his assistant and having preliminary work done, they will be doing my 7th implant.  I have complete confidence in Dr. Athari and the staff at Affordable Dentures.

I have been coming to this Barber Shop for years. I have always received a professional cut exactly the way I wanted it. The owner is young yet proficient in cutting with old school methods to include hot lather and razor shave of your neck to complete the clean, crisp cut. Don't pass this one up fellas. Give this barber a try and you'll be coming back again and again. Professional cut, great value. Win, Win.

Ester is the best tailor I have ever encountered. She has years of experience and is the sweetest lady I know. She goes above and beyond for everyone and never dissapoints. I will never go anywhere else, and I tell everyone about her! Now almost all my friends go there too! She's absolutely perfect.
My little fur baby, Skittles, loves visiting the folks at Glamour Pets! They are so good to her and she always looks absolutely fabulous when she's done!

Sorry about this review, don't feel very wordy right now. Stephen, the head groomer does a great job with my Golden Retriever. I like the way she cuts Bree's hair and leaves the feathers on her legs and ears so she still looks like a golden.
I love this quiet, tucked away location.  No drive thru, awesome.  Plenty of parking.  Both indoor and outdoor seating.  Set in a quite strip mall. Staff gets your orders right, consistently.
Were from Boston home of amazing Chinese food such as out of Asia and Kowloon,price was very fair,food was good, not a bad little spot , we go with kids and like it.
Terrible customer service!!! Scheduled to have a representative come estimate for an estate auction and they never showed up.

I'm surprised there aren't any other reviews on this little gem because I know it's been around for at least a year.  We stopped in with some friends for dinner tonight.  They have a full bar, but I had a glass of chardonnay rather than my perfect rob roy.  The chardonnay was a flavorful pour at a really good price.  Our waitress and her helpers were very attentive (with the exception of water not being delivered as soon as requested).  

I ordered the tilapia and it was some of the best tilapia I've eaten.  Pan fried so it was just a little crispy around the edges and with wonderful flavor.  I also had a baked potato which was very good.  There are good baked potatoes and then 'meh' baked potatoes and this one was good.  It came with pats of real butter and a generous portion of sour cream.  The vegetable of the day was a sauteed squash which was flavorful and just the right degree of firmness.  Tonight I chose the soup of the day - Italian Wedding - rather than my usual salad.  It too was very tasty!  

The lights were a little bright to my liking but that's just me.  They have what looks to be a little one person band on Saturday nights - may have to try that at some point.  Even though my wonderful companion is not keen on dancing - unless an elevator dance at a wedding - it's fun watching the couples here in Sun City show off their dancin moves.   

We will definitely go back and although I may be tempted to try something new on the menu I think I'll have to go with the tilapia, but next time - make mine a perfect rob roy, perfectly please...

I had cataract surgery done in March 2016.  Dr. Wallman did my laser surgery.  He was with me telling me what was going on, or a nurse or the anesthesiologist was with me the entire time.  It was fast and painless.  Recovery has been great.  Looking forward to going back to him for the other eye when it is time.  I highly recommend him and his practice.

Have played there twice this week - the course is in GREAT condition! And except for the few pro-golfer wannabes, the pace of play is excellent, at about 4 hours per round. Sand traps are much improved over previous years. Thank you, Tom Loegering(SCCC owner)!

Could not be happier with how my two girls looked after leaving Glamour Pets. I have been searching for a groomer for a year since moving to the area and I am so happy to have found this place. The staff was so nice, the shop was very clean and I felt very comfortable leaving my girls there. Cannot wait to take my girls back here! Thank you thank you!

Ok, normally I like to support local over big chains, but I've always had a good experience at this PetSmart. The cashiers are always friendly, the store is clean, and most of the time I can find what I need (minus one time they were out of vitamins). I wish they had more organic and natural products, but since I feed my dogs mostly fresh food, this isn't an issue. They have a great selection of holiday items, so I am looking forward to what they have this year! And I've had no problem returning items if I needed to. Plus, they have adoption drives!

Just like to give a special thank to dr Brannon crew in making my wife happy with the procedure she's having done so far and a very special person's that's putting up with my crap and handling it very professionally thank you Stephanie and Megan you guys are awesome later on I will be posting more as a procedures are being done on my wife thank you all ladies
Highly recommend. Best dentist office i have ever had. Dr. Carr and his team are honest, professional and very skilled. The end results are amazing. Prices are fair

I am beyond disappointed with the changes in this store. The latest is with their meat department.  First of all they will no longer allow you to select a cut of meat that you want to have cut a specific way.  And if you want meat cut they give you their sob story about new regulations and that they have to clean, sanitize and allow their meat cutter to air dry before they will cut anything for you. In fact they told me that 5 times before answering my original question of how long it would be before they cut my meat (which was "a couple of hours").  What's the point of having a meat service counter if they won't provide the service when you need it?  I will definitely take my business elsewhere if they can't figure out how to meet customer needs in a timely manner.

It never fails. Every appointment I have, I am left waiting to be seen, most of the time, for an hour. People come in after me & get taken before I do. Too bad this is the only Affordable Dentures around. I give 3 stars because I do like Dr. Brannon & his staff. Something needs to be done about how they schedule & take patients.

This place is an absolute sham of a business.  Penny Burley has taken $550 from us for legal documents she was supposed to file.  She is never at the office, does not return phone calls, and I'm filing every complaint I can to get her to stop ripping people off.  Do not use this business.  They are not really a business.

I bought $9k worth of engineered flooring from Mitch in early 2016. It took me over a month to find just the right color and texture. 
  My husband and i didnt live at the house at the time. I was not told to check to be sure they had ordered the correct flooring so when it arrived we had it installed.  Only to find out after the install that it was completely different. 
Mitch didnt offer any explanation and told us that its not his issue once its been installed. Im so disgusted. The rest of my flooring needs will NOT be purchased through Mitch @ Bram Flooring    BEWARE!!!!!!
     **** in RESPONSE to Bram Flooring 
Your rep NEVER contacted us! The amount you charge for install was well over the going rate. If that meant getting the flooring we ordered, then thats a high price to pay. It sounds to me that if Bram flooring doesn't get the entire job then customers are SOL. When we ordered the flooring we were never told to be sure and check it against the sample we made our choice from. It was under my understanding that paying Bram flooring that follow through would be their job. They are a business and should take their own advice on quality control and verification of product. We feel we should receive some sort of refund do to Brams mistake.
I found Ester about 4 years ago and she has done an excellent job with all of my alterations - taking in dresses, hemming slacks, skirts and sleeves - always on time, and always with a smile.

Dr Helvig is the best he is honest and very caring and personable. His staff is awesome. The location is easy to get to. The place is clean and makes you feel comfortable. I am 36years old and I had been taking my yard having sex in an awkward position. Also had been camping where I slept in a metal bunk bed on the top bunk. I also went and filled the 5 gal water jugs and put them in the back of my truck four of them and lifted them out without opening the tail gate all of these things led my back to be locked up. I couldn't stand up straight and when I was lying in bed and would go to roll over on my side I could barely do it. Dad called Helvig and got me in the same day. It was a Saturday he just happen to be there and made an exception to see me. Thank goodness he did. I have had three treatments I am all better now. He told me that I am over the worst of it so I don't need to come in anymore until I have an issue again. I feel as tho just because I feel better doesn't mean I should stop going I plan on seeing him every two weeks at least. I also had a burning down the front of my left leg that is now gone. There is a wonderful woman that does massage there as well that is great. Dana sue she rents a space from him but I think it's great to have someone right there that u can see. Anyway my dad also goes to Helvig and my dad paid cash for the visit and when his insurance paid for the visit Helvig refunded dads money back! He could have just kept it. Honest, friendly, and really helps u. They have several things to help ultrasound, muscle stimulater, nice massager, ice, heat. I will never go anywhere else. Thank u Dr. Helvig
Thank you for the excellent service! Mario did a fantastic job and I would recommend him to any family or friends!!!!

Visited Sunday 6/22 at lunchtime.  Was surprised that it was so dead.  

Interior was clean, service was decent.  Food was not so great.  There was a big selection to choose from, sushi, soups, also the mongolian grill.  Unless you get the grill, your food won't be hot.  There was steam coming out of each container, but the food was barely lukewarm.  Weird.  Wanted to try it, but won't be back.  We miss FURRS!  :)

The course is not very long but does have a range and restaurant.  The course was priced very reasonable.  It was difficult to determine where the greens were. There were a lot of dog legs . The course was wet and too soggy . It played a lot longer than advertised. The ground around the greens made it difficult to chip. There were also a lot of trees definitely a lot more challenging

Staff was super friendly and helpful! They took great care of my cat Logan. He came home smelling good and looking fresh. This will definitely be our place to go when Logan is looking a little scruffy!
My Lily looks fabulous!   I will definitely be back!   Recommending to all my friends. Great rates too!

We love Glamour Pets! Every time we go in, the staff is always so friendly and they make me feel comfortable and safe leaving my dog Khloe there in their care! The prices are fair for what you get, they do an amazing job!

Excellent doctor and staff. I bought LASIK through an online deal they were having and went in thinking that they were going to bill me for a different type of LASIK or they would have all these extra fees but they did not. I even had to get Epi-Lasik which is a more complex procedure but they didn't bill me any extra for it. The surgery tech said that is not how they do business. I highly recommend Walman Eye Center for anyone looking to get LASIK!

Bad customer service - took months to do our paperwork, rushed us in to finish it up before Christmas, then no response for 2 months. Paid up front, didn't answer emails or 2 phone calls - finally dropped in to get our documents and obviously nothing had been done for 2 months. Had to wait an hour for them to scramble - how embarrassing for then. NOT recommended.

We are so VERY pleased with the wonderful job done on our Silky Terrier, she has NEVER been groomed so beautifully. 
Considering she is 13 years old and we were FULL Time RV'ers traveling the western states for the past 11 years she's been to groomers all over the west we're happy to have found Glamour Pets.
Thank you!

This Starbucks used to be great. My company and I spend a ton of money with this store. Now it's slow and unwelcoming. I online ordered 8 drinks ( on a slow day as far as traffic in 99th location) When I got to the store I  was first informed I couldn't use a card I know for a fact I can use. No effort into even trying to see if it worked. Secondly I was told they were out of drink Carriers..... That's it. Not even eye contact when told. As he slides 8 drinks over to me...Offered no alternative. Asked for a box, guess what? No box? You guessed it. Then to add to that, they Forgot to make my sandwich. (Had to ask to make it after 10 minutes of waiting and exchanging awkward eye contact with customers who had not been helped at register for 10 minutes.) While listening to Starbucks workers right on the other side of the counter have a casual conversation about life while doing an excessively slow and sloppy job. Example- not paying attention and dropping cups and coffee grounds. Not looking for sympathy or reimbursement, I never yelp unless it's that awful of service as you can tell from my profile. I hope management sees this. Will not return.

I love the banfield pet hospital here. They always take car of my pup and are always very helpful and accommodating. I used to drive to my local one and they never seemed to care or be helpful so now I drive 45 mins away one way and it's the best decision I've made so far. Love the staff here very friendly.
Its fine during the day but at night its like the hills have eyes people come out.

Unfortunately Mathis Becker treated his clients like crap and coward down in the court room. He often seemed confused and unorganized. Although I won my case, I lost approximately $75k because he personally chose not to dispute a fraudulent will, and we also have several thousands in bank accounts that will go to the state because of his poor decision making. I would avoid this practice at all costs, unless you want a team that will drain your bank accounts...that's the only thing that was done properly.
Well the service was good but I just didn't care for the food. I found the food to be bland and just not very flavorful. I have definitely had better and I have definitely has worse. Your call.

Mario your crew was great. Your son arrived early . He was dog friendly, . Thank goodness because Mr. Boomer is a handsome handful . We would use your service again . Please put us on 6 months recall . Thanks again . Notary Services by Janet Swalley, Surprise AZ .
Friendly staff prompt service, and the best customer's I'm here. Lol good looking women here too.
It was just okay, might go back but nothing that I was excited and need more of. My daughter appreciated all the fresh fruit but honestly that was all that she ate.
My favorite auction in Arizona!

We love this Starbucks! This is a convenient location right on Bell Rd. where we've had nothing but excellent customer service every single visit. The employees are always friendly and remember their customers by name! We've been using Mobile Order and our drinks are always ready when we arrive! I just love their chalkboard in the lobby right now!!

Great shop.

Customer service was wonderful. They take their time with your questions and interests, and seem to have good product knowledge. 

I brought my dog in with me, and they showered him with lots of rubs, compliments, and treats! 

We looked at some new harnesses, some treats, and just browsed the food. I was hoping to find Pet Curian dry food, but did not find it here. They have a huge variety of other brands, however.

They've been in business about 10 years. I've moved a lot, so in comparison to other pet needs shops I've visited, I'd like to see a little more variety in treats in here, specifically bully sticks. Also, the lighting is a little dull, brighter would be much friendlier. Minor preferences on my part, but a nice local shop!

Mario and Landon are the best in the business. They did a job for my mom and treated the place as if it was there own. They were punctual, professional, observant, very reasonably priced, and efficient. They go above and beyond the call of duty and I would recommend them to everyone.

I've worked with this company for many different homes and each and every time the do a great job and their prices are very affordable!  I've used them to install carpet, tile, kitchen back splashes & even to remodel showers with tile!  They always have a great selection in stock to choose from & they're easy to schedule with!  The wood tile flooring selections are amazing!  I will continue to use them and highly recommend them for all your flooring & bathroom/kitchen tiling needs!!!

My mother broke her dentures in half a few weeks ago.  She has Dementia and lives in a Memory Care facility,  so taking her into a dentist is a challenge(I also live out of state).   Called several denture/dental offices in the area and was immediately met with sales pitches for new dentures.  I was pleasantly surprised when I called Sun City Dental and talked to "Karen."  She was friendly and eager to help us out with the least traumatic solution for my mother.  My brother was able to drop off her dentures and they were fixed within a day.  They assured us that if there were any issues with fit, we could then bring her in to make adjustments.  I feel their prices were reasonable, especially since most other options involved total replacement.  Their office and billing staff were very sweet and helpful!

Highly recommend these guys!  We have family that referred us to Bram. We even shopped around at other flooring stores  (including Lowes and Home Depot who ended up being more expensive and a much longer wait) before pulling the trigger at Bram's. Mitch is a super nice guy- very helpful and patient with us since we were in and out of his store for almost a year trying to figure out what we wanted/liked, taking home sample flooring and waiting til the perfect time to  be able to afford to re-floor our entire downstairs. Once we ordered, they were here 6 days later getting to work, and finished 1180 sqft in 3 days! The big box stores quoted us about a month before they'd even get started.
The crew (Carlos and Oscar) that came to install our flooring couldn't have been better! Very respectful of us and our home, polite and meticulous.  You can tell they take pride in their work and it shows!
When we decide to have our stairs and upstairs redone, we'll be back!

This was a pleasant find so close to home. Got the desired bird feed at a very fair price. Owner and employees were all very helpful and knowledgeable. I'll be back. Sincerely, Art Huseonica, Sun City

What a great find! Squeaky Clean was heaven sent and made my new listing sparkle. Call Mario Owens today you will be sorry you did not call Squeaky Clean  sooner. Prompt, efficient and very fair price.

Store is around the corner and I've never had any problems. I've even had workers ask if I needed help out. Of course, after work hours will be busy do I go either during the day or late at night to stay away from long lines. The rewards are great because it feels like we are always getting 10 cents off per gallon. The only issue I agree with is the meat selection.... need more to choose from :)

I have used and counted on this company for a myriad of legal needs over the last 10 years.  I have always received great service and production.
Charlie Cunningham
Won't answer the phone or return calls but had no problems cashing the check. Still haven't received our documents.

I have two miniature horse sized dogs. One looks like a hyena. A big hyena.

I wouldn't bring my dogs here, not because they're not friendly (they are) but because there are like a million little yappy dogs roaming about the place like rats. And they might get stepped on or smushed. 

Anyways.

This is just run-of-the-mill for me. Nothing spectacular or surprising. No exceptionally amazing customer service, just blah. I am disappointed that despite being a "Pet Perks" member for years now, I've never seen any coupons or discounts or "perks" to being a member. On top of that, their prices are exactly the same as grocery stores like Safeway, which I find strange. Shouldn't a pet store have better deals on pet food?

Checking out always seems to be a nightmare as they usually only have one or two cashiers, each with a line extending back into the Dog Food aisles. They have those last-minute impulse buys (grow your own catnip, engraveable dog tags, 99 cent frisbees) that I'm always a sucker for. I buy plenty of those 99 cent frisbees and tennis balls as my dogs/hyenas chew threw them like al-dente pasta. 

And a side note of little importance: if your debit card's magnetic strip is a little worn out, their machine WILL NOT read it. Ever. And as the cherry on your embarassing ice cream sundae of a wait in line, they will not input your debit card manually. Or they can't. Whatever.

I needed to rent my home asap and it needed new carpet. My best friend recommended Bram Flooring and I am so glad I listened. From the moment I met Mitch he  was professional. He worked with my needs and helped from the beginning until the end. Need to add my downstairs was not the easiest to work with because its shaped differently. I was so happy with the flooring. Needless to say my renters were happy with it all too. I will always use this company. They were fast, efficient and good every step of the way.

I am so happy I found this place.  The owner and the staff here is so wonderful.  They did a good job with my 2 Bichons. The staff is really  nice and the shop  clean.   My Bichons hated going to the groomers in the past but they seem to be ok coming here which of course makes me feel comfortable leaving them here.  If you schedule your appointment on time, you can pick up your furry kids in less than 2 hours.  No more dropping them off at 8am and only getting to pick them up around 1 or 2.  I love having the flexibility when I drop them off and when I pick them up,

To be honest I have never thought much about rating a grocery store. But this store has been getting on my nerves for a couple of years now. There is no just "running in and out." The lines are outrageous all the time and they recently implemented some new thing where they open a new register if three or more people are in line but it has not helped at all. When you go in you need to expect at least a 15 minute wait at the checkout counter. About 6 to 9 months ago they started doing some remodeling in their store and I was so happy because I thought that they were finally putting in some self checkout registers. But no, that's not what they did. Instead they put in some credit union that nobody has ever even heard of! The produce is not very good and leaves a lot to be desired. And they are constantly out of everything - especially if it's on sale. Put it this way - if you want to go there and get something that's on sale for that week you better get there in the first hour or two on Wednesday morning when the sale first starts. Otherwise you are sh*t out of luck. It has gotten to the point where I hate shopping at this store and I don't know how they remain open! From now on I think I am going to drive a couple miles and take my business to Fry's!

Took my new little rescue babies here and they treated them so well.  The grooming was perfect and together they were there just 1 1/2 hours.  The owner gives great one on one attention to the pet owner and pets!  The staff is so welcoming and caring. This will be our permanent grooming salon!

The staff here is awesome. They are very knowledgeable & friendly. The prices aren't too bad either. I got my grandpa a scooter for half the price of any other scooter store I priced out. And the guys at the shop aren't bad to look at either... double plus!!!

Wow Wow Wow...... First time in and what can I say!!! Sun city pet market you know your stuff. Thank you so much for all of your help. I wish I could write a review on this place but it wouldn't do justice. They may not have everything you need but will point you in the right directions. Hands down my new favorite place in the west side. Keep up the phenomenal work!
Long lines are the norm. I walked out without purchasing more than I actually buy The new signs threes a crowd means nothing but if you like waiting in line this will be your favorite store

Just about anything you could need for your pets.  We have to feed our dog a special food that contains more fat than most dog foods, and Petsmart is the only place we can find it.

Their prices are pretty high so I don't shop here unless they're the only ones that have it.

They also have a pretty good carpet cleaner that's only about $25/day to rent.
Got referred from a friend to check this place out. Played 18 holes and had a great time. Will be returning in the future.

I bought $9k worth of engineered flooring from Mitch in early 2016. It took me over a month to find just the right color and texture. 
  My husband and i didnt live at the house at the time. I was not told to check to be sure they had ordered the correct flooring so when it arrived we had it installed.  Only to find out after the install that it was completely different. 
Mitch didnt offer any explanation and told us that its not his issue once its been installed. Im so disgusted. The rest of my flooring needs will NOT be purchased through Mitch @ Bram Flooring    BEWARE!!!!!!

I don't like Starbucks. I avoid them if I can. I don't like how they burn their beans (leading to a very bitter coffee), and I don't like how they have turned their back on their sustainable and employee-friendly practices. All that said, this is the only real coffee shop I know of that's walking distance from my grandparents, so I've been coming here off and on for years. As Starbucks go, the espresso drinks are as good as they come from a Starbucks and consistent. They used to charge for Wi-Fi, and I'm happy to report that I'm writing this review on free Wi-Fi now. Their prices do seem a bit high, even for a Starbucks -- over $5 for my Venti Vanilla Latte -- I'm used to only paying those prices at airports. Might be because they don't have any competition. No matter -- I'll be back.

Can't go wrong with a store for the fuzzles.

Kudos to Petsmart for giving me three extremely...er...lusty koi that had a blast in my pond and multiplied into at last count 20 mini koi of different colors.

I think the koi have far surpassed the reputation of rabbits....

Not a big fan of Safeway's. They're always so expensive. But if I need to just grab a thing or two and it's the only thing on the way I'll stop in. BUT their self serve soup from the deli is always delicious so I do get that for lunch occasionally. I recommend the tomato basil. This location is pretty clean and the staff are always nice. Honestly it's just how much higher the prices are than Fry's that steers me away

This is one of the bigger buffets in this part of the metro area and offers a wide selection of standard Chinese buffet dishes, most of which I found to be quite well made. The quality of their of sushi - a trick item in most buffets - is quite good, as is that of the non-standard items they offer, such as Korean kalbi. This is a good place to dine along the western Grand Avenue / Rt. 60 corridor.

Place is great! We have a schnauzer and a Wheaton terrier and both are well cared for and beautiful when they are groomed here. Debbie and her crew take good care of our pets. They are kind, gentle and friendly.

This review is for the grooming section of this petsmart... As a surprise my boyfriend took our dog to petsmart for a haircut while I was at work. When we picked him up he had a giant cut on the side of his neck. I used to be able to trim him in between haircuts to save a few bucks but now he's so scared of the clippers that he won't even let me go near his left side. Needless to say, we will not be returning to the grooming section and we don't recommend it.

I stopped by and was looking for  carpet.  They found what I was looking for and said they could get it ordered and installed within a week.   It was fast and easy and their price was good.  They seem to really know their carpet.

This was one of the worst buffets I have ever been to. The sushi was awful, dumplings were over fried,  the variety of sushi was limited down to 4 choices, the advertising outside the restaurant displayed rainbow sushi once inside the restaurant ,that sushi was nowhere to be found, the egg drop soup had no flavor and was over priced. Also another thing since when is preach cobbler Chinese?

I've personally received outstanding service and I've been spoiled by Zachary Mushkatel's utmost professionalism.  Great attorney with with real fire and true compassion for his clients. 

I can honestly say I know I have the sharpest, most competent attorney in Arizona in Zachary Mushkatel. I don't know many attorneys who will turn down your business if it's not in your best interest, but he is honest and will always give you his best opinion for your particular situation, even when it doesn't benefit him. 

Thank you Zachary!

Squeaky Clean did a great job cleaning the gutters of my home. Filled with pigeon poo, it took a power washing to remove this mess. Can't give enough stars on the cleanup of the yard. No piles of poo on the ground. Quality work. Happy customer.

Absolutely Great!!! Great Customer Service!!! Great Product!!! Very Friendly and They Seem to Care and are Very Helpful...
My wife and I have been looking for a Mom/Pop type Pet Shop for ever! They carry all kinds of natural treats for our boxers and they actually give you samples to take home to see which flavor your dogs like best... 
Also the Young Man that Works the front wears an Arizona Cardinals Hat!!

Went in on an about $35.00 special I saw in Sun City Independent to get cleaning, check up and X-ray after recently relocating here from Colorado.  I asked if they could furnish 4 small rubber 0-rings for my implants and they said sure and threw away my old ones.  Their cleaning was minimal (at best) then they proceeded to try and "sell" me a crown for which I turned down and then they advised me that the four 0-rings would be $160.00.  I extremely questioned why a 10 cent item would be so costly and was advised that they cost them a whole lot.  I was between a rock and a hard place now so I had to proceed with the purchase.  I went home and called my dentist in Colorado and they packaged up 8 of the 0-rings and mailed them to me for $10 so I would have back ups as necessary.  Boy 1st Classic Dental wont see any more of my money and all I can say to anyone who contemplates going there is...caveat emptor.
The staff is kind and good-natured. The dental hygienists are knowledgeable and outgoing. Dr. Carr is trustworthy and I feel comfortable in his office.
landlord who got rid of Furr's now wants me to patronize? No way! Boycott!

I love this location! They are in Sun City so it makes sense they close early but I really wish they were open later. The staff is friendly and know me by name. Usually my drink is done before I'm done paying. Super quick and friendly. Love it!

Thank you Mario! I am so happy and impressed with the gutter cleaning service you did for us! The service was efficient, a great quality and at a fair price! Will definitely tell friends and family about you and call you next time for our windows!!!

This place is fantastic. They have great "problem solving" products. They carry time that I can only find online, otherwise. The owner actively buys products that are unique and practical. I wish I lived in the same city so I could do all of my pet shopping there.
They should be ashamed to charge over $50 to golf this goat track, fairways are poor, greens are terrible, no sand in traps. What a disgrace!
Terrible!! They never have fresh vegetables and there shelves are never fully stocked in the bread section. I live down the street and would rather drive 10 minutes away for better food!!!
Professional, courteous and speedy. Very nice work at my home. Mario and Landon are the best...

Still coming to NW Valley EyeCare and we still love Dr. Toland! My son recently wanted to give contacts a try (he's 10). Made the appointment and the friendly staff spent well over an hour with him trying to help him learn how to get the contacts in and out of his eyes. It ended up that we didn't get them after all because he decided he just wasn't ready for them due to his challenges getting them in and out of his eyes. I have to give huge kudos to the patience, kindness, and care of the staff as there was absolutely no time whatsoever when they made us feel rushed or that they were exasperated by his inability to work with the contacts. Working with kids isn't easy, especially frustrated kids, but the staff was nothing short of amazing!

went for cardinal tetras, none at all, strange... maybe next time.

cheerful staff. 

20% discount on first purchase if you sign up for their rewards, so two leashes and two collars and a couple of fish and a healthy discount.

We recently adopted a dog from the Humane Society and decided he needed a little bit of training. I was hesitant at first because the other dogs in the class were larger and much more aggressive than our dog. However within minutes of the class starting I was reassured by the confidence and control the trainer had. Her name is Reba and I would highly recommend her as a trainer.  At each point she was teaching she took the necessary time to make sure that the dog understood the command. As for the store itself I have only found the employees helpful and knowledgeable. Kudos to them for hiring senior citizens!

We came in tonight looking for tick medication and some toys for our pup. The ladies working were so helpful and sweet. They price matched every item for the significantly cheaper prices that were on the online store. The customer service was so great that we left with big smiles on our faces. I'm going to return to this location for all my pet needs!
I have been getting lessons from Andrew for a while now. Amazing teacher and I would highly recommend going there to improve your game!

I really do like this Petsmart. I have problems with mobility and a couple of times I mentioned how nice it would be if they got a scooter. I know that pets are a big part of the lives for folks like me. They got a scooter. I have been using it for awhile and it is marvelous.  Because I cannot lift, when I go in, I ask someone to
help me shop.   They quickly get staff to assist and they always offer to take my 
heavy items to my SUV. 

When I have questions about an item or product, if the associate does not know the answer, they will find someone who knows rather than give an off the cuff answer.  I have no idea about the vet or grooming areas. The groomers always seem busy when I am there.

If I could I would give them zero Stars this Safeway never fails they always have only one register open and about five to seven customers waiting in line they don't care about or worry about opening other lanes it's been multiple times this happens to me in the morning and in the evening. Honestly I'd rather go to Walmart at least they have self-checkout lanes. It's really ridiculous when this big Corporation can only afford to have one register open. Bad customer service!!!

Rude groomers who openly talk about how much they hate their job and the people they work with. I was standing 5 feet away from a woman complaining about how things are run there.  It sounds like PetSmart doesn't know how to treat their employees which leads to them being jaded.

Our Silky terrier Newby has been groomed by Nicole for 2+ years now. She has always done a fantastic job with him, not to mention, she has a genuine caring attitude. As evidenced by Newby's grooming session today, he looks great. I would not entrust him with anyone else!
Mario was great! Very kind and professional and did a fabulous job. We had all our windows cleaned inside and outside plus our solar panels and we are very satisfied, will use his services again
She was great she actually cared. Had me try on everything a job was completed. So "MUCH" better than Leslie's in Sun City West

I've been taking the Saturday clinics at SCCC that are only five dollars a session and I've learned the use of different clubs. Andrew is a great teacher, his method of teaching is just right for me. I like Andrew's teaching so much that now I am taking private lessons with him and learning even more!

What can you really say about starbucks?! Aren't they all the same. Well, basically yes. This one is nice, spacious, has few tables outside that don't feel crammed up together. Service was good and quick. The only reason why I'm reviewing this Sbux is because of the location. I was actually surprised, there were quite a few people inside and atmosphere was pretty nice, for a moment I totally forgot I'm in the Sun City.

I was calling around for same day service and called about 3 companies when I finally got ahold of Mario the owner he gave me a fair price and could do the work the same day. I was so impressed with his attention to detail and the quality of his work. I will definitely tell everyone about his company.  Thank You Mario ....

Tony B

Simply the best of the best.  My family and I have trusted Dr. Toland and his team for years and we really appreciate the quality from start to finish.  Dr. Toland is a real Doctor and does a proper exam and works very hard to make sure you leave with the right RX and answers all questions.  

Consider this my highest endorsement.  If there were a button for more "stars" I would click it!!

The pace of play was great just under 4 hours . The course  was wet but in good shape this was my 5 the time playing greens were smooth but I am little slow . Price was reasonable  . Tee time me was accessible  . But there is no cart girl

This place is AMAZING! I take my shih tzu and my cat here and they never disappoint. I have a very large angry cat and they do such a good job dealing with how difficult he is and are still able to shave him. I love coming in here, everybody is so nice and easy to talk to and the prices are great. I have nothing bad to say about this place
I love this Starbucks and the staff, so friendly! I like that they are open early and I can go on my way to work since I work the early shift.

This place is re-opened under new management or something.  A Christmas tree in the lobby with a fountain that is not operating. Place looks a bit grungy, stained  floors, carpet; don't touch the condiments. The food leaves a lot to be desired, dry & tough, maybe on the steamer too long.  Food counters dirty, especially by the desserts.  Ice cream bins were very low and an elbow would rub against the side of the container to get the ice cream treat out.  Womens rest room not clean with empty soap dispenser. I could hardly enjoy the meal wondering what touched what.  Fresh foods to be stir fried sat stagnant on the counter.  I'm not going back.  I'm tempted to call the health department

pulled lower back and rt shoulder, I researched best Dr in my area, and was impressed that he had a long, established reputation,  Dr is very gentle, knowledgeable and  personable,we talked about the options to my care, Rachel and Donna,  his staff, are very caring, I just recommended him to a dear friend, and will continue to do so. and he has a patient for life..good care is everything.
thanks Dr Helvig.
This Safeway NEVER has bagels or to go pastries ready in the morning. Every time I go the bakery person says its 30 more minutes until they are ready. Very inconvenient. Do your job!

I called to ask for a product and they had it. I spoke to Chris. He was very friendly and prompt to check for what I needed. I drove out to Sun City. The young lady at the counter was very nice and helpful. It was her first day and she had excellent customer service. 
I will take the drive to get Answers Sardine Stock. I didn't get to meet Chris but he seemed very knowlegdable about raw feeding.
They did an amazing job.  The price was fair, the work ethic and result was impeccable.  Hire them!

I debated how to rate this store, because they were friendly, and I believe they did want to help me with the repairs I needed for my 12 year old Amigo scooter.  Unfortunately, their mode of internal operation (failure to clearly communicate with each other; failure to write specific repair needs down) led to a real goat rope of problems.

I took in my scooter to have the left back tire replaced, as it had developed a permanent flat side (which they said was due to it having been parked in one spot for over a year - although the other 2 tires were fine).  A new tire was $60.  When I drove my scooter the next day, it still went ka-thunk, ka-thunk, and the left tire looked like it had NOT been replaced.  When I took it back, they and I discovered (just about at the same moment) that the RIGHT (not left) tire had been replaced.  At that time, they still had my original tire (which was OK), andthey had dug it out of the dumpster to show me that they had indeed changed the tire for a new one (albeit on the wrong side).

Later that day, they called me to tell me that my old tire had been thrown away (again), and the trash had been collected, and they were going to have to put ANOTHER new tire on the scooter, but since it was their fault, they'd only charge me half price for the tire, and no labor.  I've been told by others they should have given me the second tire for free, but by then, I was ready to just be done with the whole process.

When within a few days after having 2 new back tires, my Amigo began making skritch-skritch-skritch sounds, I returned.  The first time they "greased the wheels," and the sound went away... for 2 days.  I went back, but the (presumably) oldest staff member said, "Bring it back in when it's worse; I can't really hear it that well."  My next visit, he said, "I dunno.  Some wheels just make that noise."  (Time to look for another repair source.)

So, in conclusion, Mr. Southwest Mobility and staff, my suggestions:  1) Write down what your customer needs/requests when they drop off their equipment.  You already ask for name and phone number; it would only take an additional 30-90 seconds to note what needs to be done, so faulty memory or communication doesn't cause additional problems. 2) If the scooter is an older model, with which you're unfamiliar, admit you don't have the knowledge base to address the problem, and refer your customer to a company that does.  My recommendation:  AZ Lifts 4 Less in Mesa, whose owner has a great deal of expertise, and who fixed the grinding problem in under an hour by removing built up rust from and polishing the steel wheel hubs.

Visiting from out of town and needed a quick, simple haircut. Luckily, I found Sun Bowl Barbers on Yelp. Very friendly and fast service. Nice location and shop is professional looking. Good conversation and very nice haircut. I can recommend this shop to anyone looking for a traditional man or boys haircut.

Mario came out at the agreed time and did the job for the agreed price.  He detailed the tracks, cleaned the windows, explained some problems we had with the window panes and even tried to help me with reconnecting my shades that I had knocked off their mountings,

Awesome customer service! I went to a different Starbucks and they messed up my drink, I did not notice until I got into my car and had left already. I then drove by this Starbucks and told them what happened and they gave me the correct one for free!! Made my day! Thank you!!!!

The service is not good. Every time we have dealt with them since we paid for the dentures they have given us issues. Today it was suppose to take 90 minutes without the dentures and then get the permanent ones tomorrow. When he got there to pick them up after calling and saying he was up the street they said come on in. My son got there and the door was locked they didn't answer the phone and it said they were closed for 2 hours!!! He needed to be at work and was not going to work without teeth so he had to make another 25 mile one way trip to retrieve them and miss work.. Unacceptable service ! I won't go into all the problems we've had but certainly wouldn't recommend them to anyone!

I don't shop here a great deal, but I do go here when I run out of water because they are the only store I have found that carries the bottled water I like.  They are usually pretty friendly there, and since I am really short I usually have to ask for help getting the water down from the top shelf.  Good overall!

I have been taking my cat to Petsmart grooming every month for over 5 1/2 years. I have never experienced anything but total professionalism and great treatment of my cat. Diane is our groomer and she is wonderful. My cat is always at ease and he always looks wonderful when I pick him up. I highly recommend Diane for grooming needs. Thanks Diane!
Great service everytime I pop in.  I need to be able to just stop in for my dogs nail trims and they always accommodate with minimal wait time  Nice caring staff.

I used Squeaky Clean for the first time today and I'm so glad I tried them!  The three young men that cleaned our windows were focused on details.  They were polite, thorough and even vacuumed inside each window track.  I am going to use them again for sure!!

I went to a memorial service for my Mother in law today. I have to tell you that the way my Father in law was treated  by one staff memsbers was just appalling. My Father and Mother in law were married over 60 years. He wanted a simple service for her with just family. Somehow there was a miscommunication with the time. My Father in law was told 2pm but later called to tell us it had changed to 1:30. Since we arrived early and were waiting a long time for the service to begin, my father in law decided to ask what was taking so long. The girl said "you signed a contract for 2pm not 1:30" And proceeded to talk down to him.  I suggested to her, perhaps she could just appologize to him for the miscommunication. She appologized for HIS misunderstanding.  Later I discovered they refused to let him play the DVD he had created of their 60+ years as they only play the DVD's they make for you with the pictures you provide to them! REALLY?!! He spent a lot of money for the service and the plot at their mortuary and this is the treatment he gets? He was not allowed to have the service the way he wanted for his wife. Very sad!
LOVE this shop!!!!  I show them a photo and they groom our schipperke, Morgan, perfectly!  I highly recomnend them!

I love this Starbucks. The staff is the best. I come here often with my daughter early in the morning. I have so many positive experiences i would give them more stars if i could. They usually have my drinks ready and don't mind my daughter re-merchandising their displays at 5am in the morning while i wake up.

Its an average buffet, food is good and the service well was non existent.  No matter server cleaned off our table between getting new food and gave whatever we asked for but don't expect them to ask if your doing Okay.

One side note was the orange chicken had orange peels in it which is rare to find at a buffet.
Very impressed with first visit with Dr. Toland and staff, the doctor took a lot of time to explain things to me for my vision concerns.  Would recommend this office for any eye care needed.
Every time I go in they at over the top friendly and go the extra mile to ensure I get what I need.

Great value!  Green fees include cart and range balls.  I think they offer other specials  regularly.   Mature trees on the course come into play more than I am used to in this area.  Looking forward to the next outing there.
I just had my windows cleaned inside and out.  He was super quick and did a fabulous job!  Highly recommended.  Will definitely use them again!  Top Notch!  Thank you so much for the great service!

I rented a BRAND NEW wheel chair from thrm to go to the Air Show on Saturday April 2nd I wheeled the chair up a handicapped ramp and the wheel broke, nothing I did caused the wheel to break but yet they wanted to charge me for the wheel and repair. The guy says "they don't break themselves" Well it may be a warranty issue because the chair was brand new. I WON'T RENT FROM THRM AGAIN! So I missed the Air Show that only comes once every 2 years, I paid for the rental and got nothing out of it!

I had only been in Sun City a few weeks when I experienced an eye hemorrhage which frightened me to death. Urgent Care said I needed to go directly to an eye specialist. I looked online and picked Northwest Valley Eyecare. It was 15 minutes to them closing and I was not a patient of theirs. Dr David Toland gladly took me in and did a complete exam throughly explaining what I was experiencing. 
A month later I made an appointment for myself and my daughter for an exam for new glasses. Dr Toland is so professional and his office is first class. The office staff is friendly and very helpful. We even purchased our eyewear there and found the price reasonable. I would highly recommend Northwest Valley any day!

The only reason they got a 1 was because the cashier was pleasant and helpful. 
Came in to the store and had a free bag  coupon of dog/cat food of any brand in the store.  I stopped at the front upon entering. I asked the cashier and she said the coupon expired almost projecting a what are you an idiot look.  I found that she was correct, I explained to her that I received the coupon in the mail this past weekend. She was very condescending and rude. I asked if she was going to honor, and she said, and I quote. "THE COMPANY DOES AND WILL NOT HONOR EXPIRED COUPONS. ".  I asked to speak with a manager, and she said she was one of them in the store.  Well I asked for a higher one. After waiting a few minutes and watching her walk all around looking for someone, this man comes around the corner, immediately puts his hands on his hips and says , what do you want.?  I can't make this stuff up. I asked if he was the manager, and he said yes.  At this point, I am getting irritated. I asked him , no introduction etc...I asked him why everyone was so aggressive in the store, and he said, I don't know what your talking about..  I asked him to put his hands down 3 times as I found it an aggressive stance towards a customer trying to explain a bad experience. If he was the store manager, I can see why his subordinates acted the way they did. 
In the end he said the same thing his cashier / manager said. Never apologized and I wanted t walk out, but my dogs needed food and I was there, because I can't find the better brands in the grocery stores. I spent $64.00. The store didn't deserve my business,but my dogs deserved the food.  I will be seeking another store.

This is the worst store ever.  The staff sucks so much.  Never enough checkers.  Management is not only terrible but you never see them.  They always say more than 3.  bullshit its more like more than 10.  Albertsons is even better.  The stupid puck kid on express tonight needs a reality check.  Rude, rude but he is a product of his parents need I say more.  Dont waste your time or money will never be back

I have been coming here for years with my family. Great selection of eye glasses at reasonable prices. Glasses aren't over-priced but it's also not the cheapest place either. Well worth the price though. 

Dr. Toland is a fantastic optometrist. He takes his time, listens, and really goes out of his way to make sure that you get the best care possible.  His staff is polite, friendly, and treat you like family.  

If you are looking for honest care and a great selection of eye glasses at a reasonable price, come to Northwest Valley Eyecare.

This has be the worst Chinese food around. Everything tasted the same, whether it was orange chicken or Sesame chicken. Just awful we won't be going back. They won't miss us the staff just about ignored us. Try Tolleson chinese it's great!

Since we got our pumpkinator!! This is her prefer place to shop! She likes to strut around thinking she owns this place,  she is a member of the Hospital, have had her hair cut down at the groomers, and had a couple of classes at the obedience school. We enjoy it here, and will continue to be a regular!

I've been to a number of auctions in both Texas and Illinois, and I can say that this is one of the best auction houses I've seen.  Tons of stuff--mostly great with some crap thrown in for diversion I guess--but they run a well-run auction house.
I had a license to do auctions in Texas for a part of my life and do have some knowledge of how they should be run and this one is good.
Just prepare to spend from 8 am to maybe 3 or 4 pm if you want to see the whole thing.  It makes for a very long day...not that you HAVE to stay all day.  You can just stay for the portion you are interested in and leave or figure out how to time it anyway.
The girls who answer the phones and greet you at the window will help you as they are very courteous to all I find and very glad to help.
However, a friend who was with me wanted a baby carriage for a doll she had as a child.  She got an antique turn of the Century one for $75, so when I got home priced it for her on the net:  $250.
Yes, if you have the patience this is what you can sometimes do at these auctions, so just hang in there and adopt the Patience is a virtue philosophy.

Well, how do you review a mortuary? I don't really have a lot to compare it to.

For what it's worth, these guys seemed very professional, and the entire affair was dignified. Our service didn't seemed rushed, and they were on hand to help out any way they could. That was appreciated.

The grounds are very nice. Big pond, manicured green lawns. It was very Sun City, if you know what I mean. Still, a very nice staff, and overall pleasant.

I came here last week and I was super sore the chiropractor was so sympathetic and helped to me to feel relief. I would recommend this place if you need a good adjustment he is amazing, and he has the best Customer Service Rachel is very sweet and very kind,  and at the end of adjustment if you're nice Rachel gives you a little bit of a massage at the end it's a great combination to fit together this office is very wonderful and I would recommend it to anybody. i'm sure I'll need to come in here again

I've come here a few times and if you have patience, you can find some bargains, but the entire auction could be run more efficiently.

This is a family run business and the entire family works in it. Ron Brunk is the owner and he likes to control things. It gets done his way or arguments break out within the family. In a way, it's kind of amusing and they do make some good jokes. A lot of the people who go are regulars and the Brunks joke with them often.

They also have some really interesting items come through their doors and there are great bargains to be had.

My complaint with the place fall into three categories:

1. The place needs to modernize and move faster. People should not have to spend their entire Sunday waiting on the snails pace of this auction. It runs what equates to three distinct ring of patio junk, collectibles and furniture. Ron Brunk prefers to do everything in a linear fashion - which is why it takes from 8-4 to do the auction. He has several people who he lets call, so why not run multiple rings? 

2. Some of the attitudes of the owner/staff and the way they often stop and berate people for their bids. The nature of auctions is that buyers want to pay as little as possible -pennies on the dollar - but they don't need to have the auctioneer stop the auction and basically call us all cheapskates. I've also seen times when it appears the auctioneers bid against people. Maybe it's left bids or something, but it's not very transparent. It feels like they aren't happy with the bids and are driving them up.

3. No order or published list of lots. Going in, you have no idea how anything is going to be sold or in what order. Looking at a table and chairs - they might be sold as one lot or two lots or all chairs sold a X the money (ex: $40 x 4 chairs) - so your costs might jump based on the mood of the auctioneer. At other auctions you know what's going when and in what grouping. This is more by how the wind blows and the mood of the caller. This also adds to the time you have to spend there waiting and waiting and waiting ... like a recliner? It might go early in furniture or late depending on where they feel like starting. Why not let people know their plan?
