Sometimes they get into a repair and find more problems that is normal but it can really make some people pissed!! I liked the service and they dropped me at home and picked me up when close to completion. Nice flat screen tv in lobby. However they did forget to adjust my steering wheel to center after alignment. I reached out to them and waiting for response to complete. It only takes 3-4 mins to adjust my steering wheel so I don't see a problem....

     Well I was wrong to trust an Auto Repair Business!!! I gave them 4 Stars and I would have given them 5 Stars if they did the alignment right the first time. I emailed the location May 10, 2014. I really expected the Manager to respond back and I was fair by giving them 1 WEEK!!! I NEVER heard back!! It was all over a 3 minute steering wheel adjustment. I'm a member of Jeep Forum and I put my story on their website and was told/showed how to adjust my steering wheel. And YES, I was done in 3-4 minutes!! Big O Tires on Boswell in Sun City just North of Bell Rd. does NOT CARE about customer service!!!

I love this thrift store plaza!! I've been going there for years !! I use to go with my dad and nana when I was 10 & at age 25 I still adore it! I bought an authentic vintage Gucci wallet for just $3 as well as a few fossil Wallets / bags for under $4
Great food and reasonable prices. Fun place to hang out and sing karaoke. The best restaurant in Sun City.

I have taken my dog their 2 times.  Each time I have had to ask for the nails to be trimmed, the glands drained and the sani shave on the bum area.  Excuse me.............isn't that all part of the grooming.  The price is high and the work is horrible.  They shaved off a good portion of the tail hair when I specifically asked them NOT to cut the tail hair or the ear hair.  Last time the back nails were trimmed but the front were not.  Won't be going there any time soon.
I love the Lutheran thrift store! Hands down the best thrift store in Arizona. The director Pat, runs a tight ship and is super friendly. Great staff and great deals.

Getting ready to see Dr. Justo for my yearly eye exam!  I've been a patient of Dr. Justo now for 12 years!   He is very knowledgeable,  patient and very thorough!   When you see Dr. Justo he always greets you with a warm smile and a hug!   From the moment you check in to the moment you leave,  you are treated by kind,  compassionate staff that clearly enjoy what they do!   They have a lot to offer!   I've been to both locations and get the same high quality care each time!  See you soon!

Just shopped at this location, I did not enjoy my store visit. May i suggest that on Senior Discount Day, you ensure ALL self scans are functioning. Also, when the self scans are backed up, have a sign up directing customers to stand. I was chastised by another customer for standing in a line for the scanners to the right. She was in a line to the left. She then felt the need to tattle tail to the selfcheck cashier. The cashier rudely told my husband and I that we had to moved to to the end of another line which would have put us behind several people that had just got in line. Another customer jumped to our defense. I told the cashier they should put up a sign indicating where to line up. She retorted, this doesnt happen that often. I pointed out there was a out of service selfscan and she ignored me. No apology for the inconvenience. Just scolded for their error.

I had a terrible experience a few weeks ago when I took a non-working hearing aid in to be repaired. I was told I'd have to wait, which I didn't mind. After about 45 minutes I was told by the receptionist that the manager (technician) would not be able to see me as she was leaving for the day. It was 3pm. She was the only technician in the store. I said I wanted to speak to her before she left and was told that was impossible. I made a bit of a scene and demanded 5 minutes and said I would leave the aid with her. She did come out to find out what I thought was wrong with it and had an appointment set up for the next morning. She said she would fix it. The following morning I came in for the appointment and the receptionist didn't know my name or what I wanted. She still had the aid in the same plastic bag she had put it in. It hadn't been touched. The technician had taken another client on my appointment time and I was told I'd see another person. That was okay with me and I finally got the customer service I should have been given initially. I wrote and called the main office and they never responded.  DON'T GO TO ZOUNDS. They only want your money and are incredibly rude when you need service.

The food here was very very good the service was excellent walked in sat down at a table the portions are absolutely huge one of the best cafes I've ever been to I would recommend this place to anybody

I just had my dog groomed this morning and it was an awesome experience.  I would highly recommend this place the people are friendly and the groomer seemed to really like dogs and her job.  He looks fantastic and smells great.  They didn't try to make me feel bad because I knew he was matted.  I also like that he was done at about the time they said he would be done.  My dog did not seem traumatized from being at the groomer either like he had at a different place.

This place is a little gem for a cheap menu, friendly service, good selection and a small cheap salad & soup bar.  

Daily specials are periodically prime rib, & Ahi tuna.   Breakfasts a good, quick and cheap. 

This place is not the Ritz or Gordon Biersch... but they dont charge like it either.  very innexpensive.
Lyla, a Bichon has been going here for the last 6 months and is by far the best groomer in the area. Clean and professional.

Ever have to wait in line and watch one very slow pharmacy tech move at a snails pace and see two others just standing around doing nothing?  And you're standing there behind a long line of people who are also waiting to pick up a prescription?  You wait patiently and then, miracles upon miracles, it's finally your turn.  And you find that the prescription the doctor called in for you four hours before isn't ready yet?  Didn't even say it nicely.  Rude people who could care less about what they're doing.  I swear there was one man who may have passed away waiting, he sat there so still, I wasn't sure he was still alive.  I will be taking my prescriptions somewhere else to be filled.  I am so tired of the unfriendly way I'm treated at this store.

Buyer beware!!!!   They sold us a 4tion Rudd four years ago and we've been miserable ever since!   We've had them out to check for problems and one of their service men actually told me that they don't operate as well as they do after the first year.  And we spent 5k with them!!!

They recommended a product, we bought it & now we're stuck.  Our only option is to buy a NEW 5ton unit or put up one of those 1 ton wall mounted units downstairs.  

We trusted them.  Please don't make the same mistake.  Get several opinions!!!  There has to be better in the Valley of the Sun!
Starting the year right with our families annual eye exams. Dr Justo's staff is wonderful here at AZ Eye Institute . If you want the best. . go to the best.

Such a quit place. We were greeted immediately and our food came out quick and hot. The price point is not bad for those on a budget or fixed income (joint is located in Sun City) and the atmosphere is homey. Breakfast is what we had this morning, the short stack is huge is circumference and my steak and eggs were on point. Reminds me of eating breakfast at grand moms house.
This is THE ONLY place I trust with my car. I have been going there for over 5 years. They are honest and do quality work. I would not hesitate to recommend them to my family and friends.
Total scam.  Quick to make initial visit, pretends to fix things, promises warranty, takes your money, and then you won't hear from them again.

This place was tucked away in a small shopping center in Sun City.  It's more of a place I would go if Sprouts or TJ was out of what I needed.  They did have a nice little selection of teas, essential oils & gluten free items. Their prices were on par with other health food stores which was nice.  Large variety of supplements (majority of the store) I personally don't go to health food stores for that so it doesn't really have any benefit to me...if that's what you are looking for & are in the area then check it out.

This place had a quality product and always has a deal going on. The people are friendly and attractive and the chairs are comfortable. 
They sit right next to Jays if you need incidentals.

Great neighborhood bar and cheap prices. An older crowd where everyone knows your name. They have a dance floor and live bands  on Saturday nights. It's an amazing place,  get there early for a seat. They don't offer food but they do have  frozen pizza that they will cook when you order it .

I took my mother to see Dr Justo to have cataract surgery on her eyes. The staff and Dr Justo were amazing! The surgery staff was so professional and took such good care of her. She was ecstatic with her eyes after both cataracts were removed. She only needs readers now and could not be happier. I highly recommend Arizona eye institute all three locations are superb.

We've been to Bobbie's 2 times in this past week. The 1st visit was on  Sunday morning after church. The place was packed and we waited only about 10 minutes. We all ordered breakfast and it was great!! I had the Greek omelet and it was really tasty. Service was fast and friendly.

We came back for lunch later in the week and again it was terrific. Some ordered breakfast, others sandwiches and everyone was very satisfied. Again, the service was fast and friendly. We definitely will be back again!!

Such a great group of medical professionals!! Dr Justo and his staff are attentive and professional, I was immediately greeted as I walked in the door and everyone is always smiling. It doesn't feel like a stuffy medical practice, it reads more like a spa and very welcoming. I can't say enough wonderful things about the care I have received, bye bye crows feet and forehead wrinkles!!

This place has horrible service. We walked in and a woman was yelling at us from her office. "Can we help you?" She kept yelling. I couldn't see her because the view to her office was blocked by a stand with flyers and shit. We were finally helped by an old banker who sits in the first outside desk. She was rude, didn't ask us to take a seat and messed up the transaction. She then tried to sell us something and when we said no, she hurried us out. Luckily, we were able to make some changes to our documents so that we did not have to go back. 

Your branch has horrible service. If you would like to discuss this interaction if more detail, feel free to send me your conta
Best place to get great flower in Sun City! Always come here and get great service. The deals are great for first time customers.

The service -- if it can be called that -- at Bobbie's has been steadily declining for quite some time. My husband and I decided to give the place one more chance. What a mistake. After being shown to a table, we sat there for at least 10 minutes while the wait staff cleared tables, stood by the cash register and talked, checked on the few other patrons who were there and just generally ignored us. We finally got up and walked out and in doing so passed by a group of four employees who were standing near the entrance talking.  None of them even looked at us.  This irritated my husband even more than he already was, so he went back and told them we were walking out and why. One woman responded, "Were you sitting in there?" and another said, "It wasn't my job to wait on you, but I'll take care of you now if you want to sit back down."  We declined the offer and told them we would not be back. They obviously could not have cared less.

This is a body shop in Sun City. They were friendly, informative, and helpful to me as they did not give the services I was seeking. 

If I ever need body work done, I will bring my truck here!
Great Bank! Ask for Anna when you go inside. Not only is she beautiful, but she'll save or make you a lot of money. Great customer service!
This place has great meds the staff know what they are talking about there i defiantly reccomend d this place  shatter is really really good

That review by Jake must be from a competitor... I have used Sun City Mechanical for 10 years.  Gary and the employees are extremely courteous and professional.  I recommend them to all my friends and family and they are very happy.

They have replaced my water heater twice, fixed various plumbing issues, and checked my AC system many times and have been great.

Give them a call, you will be pleasantly surprised by the service and price.

Sadly I had to use their service recently,
Was involved in an accident and my insurance recommended this establishment. From coming to tow my truck, keeping me updated, to allowing me to drop off my rental at their location. Everything was very smooth, very nice customer service. The only issue I had was when my truck was repaired, I noticed the steering slightly sticking. Automotive agreed and called my insurance about it. However, my insurance had their own opinion. 
The only reason why I could not give them a five-star review was, they should have noticed the steering sticking when the truck was at their facility. But other wise, it was a easy and great experience.

Today was my worst experience with Fry's at 107th Ave & Grand Ave.  I wanted to have my bread sliced only to get to the bakery where no one was serving.  Two other people were waiting as well.  After 10 minutes I used my cell phone to call the store to request service.  Another 5 minutes and no one came.  I called again and requested service.  Finally an employee came to help us.  It was NOT her fault but that of management who requested that the ONLY person in that department came up front to cashiering.  I find this unacceptable and when I checked out I registered my complaint with assistant sales manager Rico.  Not sure it will go anywhere and that the store will correct.  If I had more time I would have gone to the Fry's market on Happy Valley.  The service there is great because the clients are not seniors because I think younger patrons would  not tolerate such poor service.  In addition, the store is dirty and in dire need for remodeling.

Dean is most congenial, professional and performs a good service. Although I was not present during the cleaning of our tile floors, once arriving home, I noticed the floors were sparkling and brighter. I would reccommend Stainpro to others who are seeking their floors cleaned.

Ok...I'll jump in here....
A very friendly staff.....fast and efficient....We've been several times and never been disappointed....

Eww! Food was bland and tasteless and the service was slower than molasses on a cold winter's day. Took us nearly an hour to get our food only to be disappointed. I don't see the hype here. This place sucks. Don't eat here! Unless of course you don't have taste buds then you won't care.

This dispensary has high end products! Their wax is to die for I love Sweet science and defiantly recommend going there for some! They have daily deals also to help you out thru the week. Overall a well organized shop!

Upsetting that customer service is not a priority for this business. Dean washed the carpets in 15 min and charged extra for an area rug (this is understandable). The next day carpets felt like there was a film on top. Reached out to him that day and he asked for my address. I assumed he'd be scheduling a re visit but 5 days later nothing. Reached out to him again and turns out I'll have to pay him again to fix it....

I'm not sure if they are ok or not. They said everything was clear when they scoped my sewer system. The problem is that my realtor hired them and didn't check prices. I paid 237 to have the scope done. I know it's cheaper elsewhere. Check prices

Ethan is great! !!! Always helps me out with suggestions and has great knowledge. Love that you earn points and that the flower is actually worth buying. Great edibles as well.  The specials they run each day are with the dropping by. Quick in an out unless you want to take the time to shop, they don't rush you out. Love them and what they got going on!! On my way home nice location :)

The food here was amazing. The portions were way bigger than expected too. The service was perfect and the restaurant looks very clean. We were seated quick, got our food quick, check came as soon as we asked. I don't live real close but the drive is worth it!
Sarcastic employee. Ask a simple question and get an answer accompanied by rolled eyes and condescending attitude. Last time I will pick up a pizza here.

I bought 2 grams looked a little funny weighed it out I got a 0.8 and a 0.9 !!!!??? Never coming back even tho they offered me a free gram  it's not worth the gas And the flower is subpar at best hopefully they don't approve reviews on here or else people won't see this

I love to have breakfast at Bobbie's Cafe.  The Manager always greets us and we value his friendliness.  The food's yummy, the service is ok, the location is very convenient and the prices are really reasonable.  Kudos from me.

Sergio from Sun City Mechanical just left and while he did not have any good news regarding my leaking toilet, he was a pleasure to deal with.  On time, very personable and helpful.  Showed me the problem and the solution  (new toilet)  Will be back next week to install.

Just moved into the area and needed an oil change so I made an appointment to come in at 11:30 Monday. When I arrived they did not have my appointment in their book, they did call around to see if it was at another location which it was not. They said they would try to fit me in during the day. Then when I presented them with a free oil change card from a different Big O location they said they couldn't take it. The two people that were there ( one was Bruce) really didn't seem to care at all very matter of fact. With all the business that I have given Big O between me and my children over the years will now go to a competitor that is more customer service orientated. I would not recommend anyone go there for service and based on previous reviews I am not alone.

DONT TRUST THIS COMPANY! They marked my Groupon redeemed on their end when they never even showed up. Then fighting with Groupon for 3 days for a refund. When Groupon notified merchant, StainPro sent a company DESERT DRY FOAM acting as them!! StainPro gave them al my information and I got a call that they were outside my door.  THIS WAS A SCAM AND I SENT THIS INFORMATION to the BBB.

would not recommend to anyone. unprofessional, money oriented. I bought the living social deal and the guy tried to make me purchase $120 worth of additions. I didnt. he finished three rooms and less than 300 sq feet of tile in no more than half an hour. That should say it all. plus he had his shoes on the whole time...

Great agent.  We called her to get a quote on our house and to consolidate our insurance.  Heather gave us a quote and came out to our house.  She took a photo inventory of our valuables which no agent has ever offered to do before.  She knows how to provide customer service.  We are very pleased with Heather and would recommend her with no hesitation.

If you like Louis L'Amour, James Patterson, pulpy grocery-store serial bodice rippers, mystery, & thrillers, this is the place for you.  Authors are identified by their gender (Women v. Men). 
There's a handful of self help and health books (heavy on the diabetic cookbooks and prostate problem guides), some audiobooks and a few "craft" books (one ancient How To for pine cones, ahem).  The shop has a good vibe and caters to the trade paperback crowd (hence the name); when it's hot outside and you want a frothy read, this is the place for you.

Gave one star to get my point across.  Long, long time shopper at Tuesday Mornings in Glendale and Sun City, like 17+ years.  I have NEVER been treated so horribly as with the new manager in Sun City.  Their registers were down and they did not want to let us in the store.  But all she said was "The register is down."  Lights were on, when she opened the door, the cool blast of air felt great for those few seconds. Does it not matter that customers drove 30 minutes or more to shop at their store.  How ungrateful is that? Apparently its' "Policy over People".  It's 11:00 am, and 109 degrees today as many of us stood there suffering in the heat as the employee, manager and her kids (who were eating ice cream in the store) watched us suffer in this heat.  All she said was the registers down.  So, I guess eventually it will come back up right.  I suffer from heat related illness and get sick in the heat. 
My husband had to drive me there. How about learning to communicate, "The store is closed due to problems with the register."  I assumed that the register might come back up and wanted to wait in the store. So that's policy, so ok, now we know, no register, no store.  Planes aren't even taking off today in Phoenix due to the heat.  But don't let them in!   Its Policy! Why didn't she just say that. But I have NEVER had a manager go off the deep end as this manager did today.  She was the most unprofessional, neurotic manager I have ever seen. I really left because I was fearful that she might do something. But her going off the deep end was just not acceptable.  As I left I said "She's a raving lunatic", and the old red headed employee yelled, "No she's not!".  Screamed at by both of them.  Wow, got home, called Customer Service and left a message for management.  Both of them should be fired, YESTERDAY!  No wonder they have so much turnover in that store, they are not stable!  Are the poor, paid next to nothing employees so afraid of management that they can't think outside the box? I would have bagged what people wanted, taken a name, phone number and said come back in 24 hours or they are back on the shelf.  But, to people like these employees, its a job, there is no longer good common sense or good customer service or knowledge of how to manage and give great customer service.

Heater did for me a Insurance for my car in the beginning she was nice but after while that I need help from her she give a feeling like she don't need to help me just call the another company !! 
I'm very upset !!!

Since moving to Sun City last July (2017) I have really liked my shopping experience. I compare it to another, in Phoenix. On Grand, there are lower prices, they have sales on the things you actually use!, and everyone has always been friendly and helpful.  (I think if you are friendly, you will find that anyone else will return that respect.) I do find that they cater more to the older generation on Grand. That's fine by me, as I'm in that class!
The parking lot is different. But I guess the store just has so much land. You know? It's like they have tried to put extra parking places! They do seem extra narrow, or close. 
But, overall, I really do like it! It's fun. It's interesting. Always.

What a find for a good old American Breakfast!  Right at Bell and 99th Ave.
We went for breakfast, but their lunch/dinner menu looks pretty good too - the place ought to be featured in Diners, Driveins and Dives - tho this is certainly not a dive.

I had country fried steak (made with certified Angus Beef) with sausage gravy, two eggs, fresh fruit (or hash browns) and toast for $7.99.  Jo-Ann was more conservative - two eggs. toast and hashed browns for $3.99 ($1 more on the weekend, I think).  The food was excellent.  Nothing fancy, just good food with decent serving size at a great price.

Some lunch/dinner choices - 1/3 lb Angus Beef cheeseburger for $5.49, Chicken Cordon Bleu with sides for $8.99, Fish & Chips for $7.49.  I'm ready to go back!

And don't let the "Sun City" stop you - this morning the ages were all over the place from teens to seniors.

If you are looking for an eye doctor, I highly recommend Dr. Emilio Justo and his team at the Arizona Eye Institute. I have struggled for years with red, itchy eyes and everything I tried over the counter was pointless. It never got better. I recently read about how the Arizona Eye Institute had opened a Dry Eye Center of Excellence, with the latest in testing and treatment. It never dawned on me that dry eyes where my real issue, but after reading about this center, I realized this could be the answer. Dr. Eugene Shifrin was able to diagnose my dry eye down to exactly how many tears, and the quality of tears, that I was producing! Since I began my prescription I feel like I can see again, without a constant blur and pain that dry eye was causing me. I highly, highly recommend Dr Justo, Dr. Shifrin and the Arizona Eye Institute it is worth it to see if your problem can be a treatable dry eye condition!
We had the salad buffet in the middle of the afternoon a couple weeks ago. We both had stomach aches later that day, pretty sure it was the broccoli salad it had a funny taste. Never again!

I paid Josh Sneed who uses a few different phone# (480) 652-9627 (480) 758-8570 (480)389-2173 $200.00 back in May to order a part for my oven and never came back, he claimed it was back ordered, then he wouldn't take or return our calls, so we asked for refund if he doesn't have the part and he said he doesn't have the money. My oven is still broken, Josh won't fix it or refund money. Don't hire this guy, he will take you're money and never do the repair. I'm still waiting for him to return my money.

Until he returns my money I will make sure I get his name and information out there so he can't do this to anyone else.

Okay... heres the deal, this place is legit, the people mke the party and this place has the people... not only is there flower awesome, if they have some dry stuff they legit tell you before buying it, of course dicounted,  key... they care... paitient for life

On Saturday morning, I made the trek to Book Trader and was greeted by a cranky old lady who immediately asked if the books I walked into the store with were 'trades'.  Following a reply, she spun on her heel and briskly walked to the back of the store without another word.  

Book Trader boasts over 50,000 almost new/used paperbacks and audio books to choose from.   Books are half of the listed price and if you bring in paperbacks to 'trade' you'll receive store credit good toward future purchases.  Literature was grouped into the following sections (probably based on the popularity of their Sun City clientele)--huge section on Westerns, romance, classics, mystery/suspense, true crime, biographies, fantasy and LARGE print books which were a mix of everything.  Despite the extensive inventory, you won't find many books regarding sports, self-help, cooking, humor, magazines, or anything intended for people under the age of sixteen.  

After selecting several books, another more friendly customer service person processed my purchases and even offered me some hard candy from a small dish.  I politely declined the peppermint/butterscotch/fruity candies and left to complete the rest of my weekend errands.

I have been coming to this array of Thrift shops for 12 years.  There is about 5 shops here now.  

Well laid out, high volume turn over.  A lot of Sun City type of stuff.  Great for 50s 60s70s clothing, items etc.  Back when stuff was well made. 

Helpful friendly staff.

Great customer service! Products like Sweet Science and Amy's baked. 
My mother bought a SS vape and had a problem with it, defect. Amy was great. Sweet and great customer service as the maker of these products. Can't say as much for the store purchased at. 
Yay for this kind of business, they want yours.

Came tonight to watch the band, and had, hands down, the best night out in a long time. Friendly staff, cold beer in a chilled glass or mug every time, clean facility, and the middle aged and older crowd were out to dance and have a good time. Will enjoy coming back here again!

I was seeing the staff here for two years before I made a move. This office is superb. The staff is well groomed, professional, has a real sense of caring for me, the patient, and they are always on top of my needs. The other patients that are seen, have always been very kind and courteous in the waiting room. I have never felt discomfort or a feeling of discrimination. There are many suggestions that any of the doctors can help with in recovery. I really did not want to leave this office. It means a lot to me. Some of the art on the walls, I gifted to the Dr, Uhrik. I'm going to miss the people there because, they really cared about me and, was listening. I was not treated as a drug addict or, anybody who was there other than for the simple fact that I needed help in managing my pain. Many doctors, with my insurance, will not prescribe certain medications for a lengthy amount of time. Due to my alternative look, I am sometimes discriminated against. Recovering from motorcycle accident, two years ago, I have been trying to avoid surgery and, also, not trying to take too many narcotics. Being with this pain management center, I was able to achieve both. I'm not fully recovered from my accident but, I can at least do the actions that it takes in order for my injury to recover because, of the prescriptions from the center. I'm able to wake up without pain and, do my daily duties without my pain levels spiking too high. I'm able to enjoy my hobbies. Yes, the pain is still there but, I don't want it to run my life. Dr. Otto Uhrik will make sure this doesn't happen. This is a step that, unfortunately, is taking a long time for me to get past but, with help like this, I know that everyone, including myself, will always recover more comfortably and, perhaps avoid surgery and extremities. Thank you my team.

I'm very disappointed with chase bank. I deposited a check for $55 and another for $16 making it $71 total. They decided days later that this was a duplicate check which it wasn't it was 2 separate checks! Anywho they took out $55 and gave me a $12.95 fee. The lady I spoke with tried to say the check was a duplicate because it came out to be $71 apparently they can't count because 55+55 doesn't make $71. That was just a ridiculous accusation!!!!!afterwards they told me this was there error and to call back in the morning after it's posted in my account and they will reverse it. At this point I was irritated because they should fix there mistakes right there not make the customer wait but I decide to just keep it together and call back tomorrow. I call back the next day and they reverse the fee but tell me they can't do anything about the $55 THERE ERROR! They can't do anything about it. They tell me they re sent the check and I need to re deposit it. Okay chase bank I will re deposit it in another bank and close this one. I'm extremely disappointed. Never banking here again.

Love this place. We were unexpectedly surprised at what a special place this was. Met some amazing people sitting at the bar. Tina the bartender was awesome. Place is extremely clean and comfortable. We will back.

This was the previous post, however I am adding to it. Sun City Mechanical made me very happy again this morning. Sergio, the plumber drained my water heater, checked all plumbing in the house. Sinks good shower good etc. Glenn also arrived a little later --he is the AC tech. He tested all my air-conditioner equipment so yes I am ready  because here comes 110° weather soon. Thanks to you all at Sun City mechanical. Thank you for always your assistance and help----Sun City Mechanical. Very happy with this company. They installed my air conditioner and heater about six years ago. I am on their service contract for both plumbing and AC, heater check yearly. I just had new faucets put in my bathroom - beautiful job they did.

We've been taking our very old Border Collie Mix to Pawlor Pets for a few years. I wouldn't take him anywhere else. Friendly, caring and clean. I love the excellent service and highly recommend you try them. You will be very pleased.

We ate here on Tuesday 03/06/2012. The service was poor the food was okay but I have to say they really made me mad. My wife ordered the chicken parmesan with the sald bar. Then found out that what you don't eat you can NOT have a to go box. I can under stand them not letting you take your sald home but you can't take you left over chicken parmesan??? That's just crazy I would understand it was a all you can eat but it's not. I will never go back again.

I called SCM last week when my elderly mom had a leak under her bathroom sink.  They got over there the same day I called and took very good care of her.  They had their own restoration company to dry out the carpet, replace drywall, fix everything that got ruined in the flood and even handle the insurance claim.
I called them because they are who we use at my work and I felt I could trust them with my mother and they wouldn't take advantage of her.  She couldn't have been more happy with the technician who came and the entire process.  Thanks SCM!!
We love their pizza, always fresh, always delicious. The staff there is very friendly and accommodating. We go there almost every Friday night and we've never been disappointed

Best service by Tommy and Carol!!  This place is clean and always entertaining!  A diverse crowd that will always keep you amused.  If you are a regular or a newbie, Tommy always makes you feel warm and fuzzy, and is easy on the eyes, if you get my drift ladies!  Carol is about the best bartender I have ever seen, friendly, professional and sweet as real sugar and real sexy too!  Not to forget the rest of the crew, Tina & Helene will always put a smile on your face!  Go there anytime and once you do, you will return!  It's one of those kind of bars that you can just say "Cheers!"

Horrible. One of my parents was there for PT and rehab after a serious surgery. They treated them like a dog. They don't answer the call light for over an hour or more causing patients to soil themselves when they're are not even incontinent! I'd give a zero stars if I could. It's disgraceful and such a horrible way to treat the sick and injured. Terrible place!!!!
Top quality meds and great specials.  I love the strawberry cheesecake truffles.  Great location.  The employee's are great.
I am working with Steve here. He is keeping me posted on our truck. I like that he keeps in touch with our company.  It's nice to come here for estimates. Everyone is friendly.

What a great website!  And it doesn't lie!  I was so happy to receive credit for most of the books I brought in and was extremely grateful that you took the rest of them off my hands anyway.  It's wonderful that you donate those unwanted books to non-profit organizations!  Your selection of "gently used" books is by far the best I've seen in any 2nd-hand store, and the way you've organized your shelves made locating my favorite authors very easy.  As a final note, I'd like to thank the pleasant staff for taking the time to help me find everything I was looking for.  You will be seeing me again, and I will be recommending your store to all my friends!

Kacy Reid, M.D., Orthopedic Specialist

My flavor place for breakfast on Sundays.  Also had lunch a few times n services n food was excellent with the price.  Always called in early if we 6 or more in our group.  Try their biscuits n gravy outstanding with the price.

This little Thrift store is located in an older Shopping Center neighboring with four other NON-PROFIT Thrift stores in the same location. This is really quite convenient for a one-stop thrift rummage quest!

This shop does have that "funky" eau de thrift store scent...but, the friendly service and thrifty finds make up for that. Good prices and nice 50% off sales make this worth checking out...

We found Bobbies only because someone else told us about this place. I have driven by several times and never noticed it. A great family style restaurant that is a little bit of a hole-in-the-wall but in a good way. The food is great and the prices are very reasonable. An ideal place for brunch. This is where the locals eat. The best keep secret in Sun City, so don't tell anyone.

Absolutely some of the most incompetent staff I have EVER encountered. The patients are not in there by choice, & it seems that neither are the staff...or so they act. People that are sick, ailing, or dying are miserable already. Why would someone whose job is to make the patients comfortable feel like it's necessary to make sure those poor patients hate the rest of their life? I would absolutely NEVER recommend my worst enemy there!!!!

I became a customer of Purtone hearing aid center in 2013. The location in north Phoenix on Cave Creek and Beardsley is where I always had my appointments. It was bought by Moore Audiology. Two hours before my last appointment the office manager at their Sun City location called me in a panic telling me that location is closed down and she didn't understand how my appointment had been overlooked. She said customers from that location were going to their Sun City location. This customer will not. I don't think I like the way they run their business. I was just about ready to buy new hearing aids. I would rather give my money to a business that actually cares about their customers.

I have had cataract surgery for both eyes done here. I would recommend this place to anyone, even those with a fear of surgery. The staff are nice, great at what they do. If I ever need any further eye surgery this is where I would return. As for some other post I have read about wait time, one should remember things come up durning a surgery that were not foreseen. I would prefer a Dr take the time needed to ensure all surgeries are done safely and to the best of their ability.  My first time here was a bit more wait time, but not anything I would find unusual. The second time was faster than I expected.
Love this place great bud and amazing staff the edible are so good the brownies 400 indica my go to store

This store is tucked away in a corner shopping center along with about four other non-profit Thrift stores. It's worth visiting if you want to visit several Thrift stores in one visit. The proceeds go to a good cause.

 I have been to this store a few times, I personally have never found anything I couldn't live without. The store has several different rooms to wander through, so be sure to not walk past the other sections of the store, because the layout is a bit like a maze.

They have a lot of over-priced ceramic knick-knacks or 8-track tapes, plus clothing in one room - not sure of the clothing prices. Restroom is closed to the public.

Tony the manager at Sun City Midas auto repair went above and beyond his service, he backed up his warranty and had parts driven over a hundred and fifty miles to our broken rv. Thank you for your service so very much, ! Happy Larson's

I've golfed almost every course in Arizona (and about 50 or so out of state) and this was the  worst customer service I've experienced--and it's not even close.  

1.  Pro shop staff person didn't even look up at me until I was signing the receipt.  Not even when speaking to me directly.  Not that big of a deal, but a harbinger. 

2. Cart staff was friendly on initial encounter, but then had a major attitude out of nowhere with my playing partner when he asked about using a credit card.  He didn't end up purchasing anything and she rudely says "Then why did you ask!?"

3.  We were second tee time out of starting at 10 and playing behind a threesome.  They were slow, turning at over two hours.  They weren't playing bad at all, just taking a very long time at the tee boxes and between shots.  We told the rangers and one of the guys explained their policy (we were fine with the explanation).  Here is where it  gets weird....

4.  Get to our 12th hole and a different ranger comes up.  States that he asked the threesome in front of us to never return to their course (a big jump from asking to speed up a bit).  He then states they made the turn in 2:10 and that was okay.  My playing partner says that this would be okay if it wasn't a threesome and the first tee out, but that they should be playing a little faster.  Ranger actually tells my partner to he's "b1tching" and that he must "be a golf expert."  My playing partner gets p1ssed and they go back and forth a bit.  Ranger then exchanges cuss words with my guy and says that he is now going to sit there and watch us tee off.  Ranger that makes another comment and actually flips our group off as we leave.  Pretty unreal.  

I have a feeling that we might have been treated a little differently because we weren't members of this club.  Strange, because this place isn't that great.  I've played some pretty high-end clubs and never felt out of place. I never understand why private clubs open to the public to raise money and then treat them this way.  I could easily be a potential member previewing the course...just bad marketing.

DO NOT HIRE THIS COMPANY TO DO ANYTHING!

I scheduled an appointment on Monday (11/28) for Thursday (12/9) from 12-4pm since that was the earliest he had available. I took the day off so that everything would be off the floor and ready to go. On Thursday, I wait around until 3pm when I decide to call him because I have yet to hear from him. When I call, he said I never had an appointment. I was upset that I took the day off just to here he wasn't coming and has no idea why he doesn't have me down for my appointment. After a conversation on the phone we were able to set a time for the next day (12/9) from 4-6pm. 

He calls me at 8am this morning to get a picture of the building I live in to find the best parking and within a few minutes states he doesn't have the equipment long enough to reach. My door is 20 feet from the closest parking spot. How can you tell me you own a carpet cleaning service and not have the means to do so. So I try to call and text him to find a solution and no response. I am 100% disappointed in this entire ordeal. I would not recommend any kind service from this company. I want a refund!

I had my lines around my face done and my lips injections of the new restylane silk by Roxanne. She did an amazing job I love that I don't see my lines around my mouth anymore and I have a defined lip line. There was some swelling but I had no bruising. I love love love it totally recommend it to anyone who wants to get rid of lines around your face.

Wonderful experience from start to finish! My local Honda dealer recommended this shop. Getting a quote was easy - Just walk-in during business hours. They type up a quote in a few minutes. I was originally told it would take 5 business days to complete but it was fixed in 4. The quality of the work is impeccable! My car looks brand new (in the spot they fixed). The best part was their text message update system! I got a text for every step of the process so I knew exactly what was going on with my vehicle at all times. When I went to pick up my car they even handled the return of my rental car for me. And they washed and cleaned the inside and outside of the car so it had that "new car smell". I could not be happier!

This man Josh Sneed is a thief.  He defrauded money from us using the same tactitc reported here and elsewhere online.  Under no circumstance should anyone hire this dirtbag.  What a low life.  Wouldnt it just be easier to do your job?  Now you have another person to add to your list of people that you better not run into.

I've been here maybe 6 or so times over the last couple of years and it has ranged from okay to pretty good.

Yesterday, it would be a stretch to call it okay. I ordered the grilled trout with green beans. I was told "no, no substitutions for baked potato/french fries". Although rather grudgingly it was okayed to give me some extra green beans in place of the potato. 

I eat a lot of fish - both at home and out. This was the fishiest fish I've had in recent memory. I wouldn't order again. The green beans was a decent sized side - even considering it was somewhere in the vicinity of double order - mixed with onions and red peppers. Although I used my napkin to lap up the extra grease - guessing the onions and peppers were cooked in (too much) oil.

Service was good. If you want a roll that comes with your meal, you need to ask for it - that is the policy. The roll was not great, but it was quite warm and good. The "butter" looked like Shedd's Spread or something equally . . . ummm . . . "delicious". 

The prices are good, but . . .
meh.....but what do you expect in a retirement city. Try little bit of italy, far better.

I have now visited Spectra Eye Institute on three separate occasions. Twice for cataract surgery and just recently for the YAG laser treatment on both eyes. For each of my visits, the staff was extremely courteous and professional. I thought my processing time was appropriate (and it was consistent with what my doctor's office said it would be).

I would highly recommend this facility for laser/cataract surgery.

Came to the Shop for an Estimate about an ugly deep Dent in the Hutch Door from my Mini-Van.
They recommend to  replace the whole Backdoor and with Paining the Price was unexpected high. The Manager saw my worries and gave me the Phone Number from a Guy who is able to pull out Dents without damaging the Paint. To give it a Try I called the Guy. He made an Appointment on the Property from the Shop.
These Guys gave me a free Ride to my Home and three Hours later they picked me up and drove me back to the Shop, where my Car Backdoor was fixed almost flawless and miraculous and for 1/10 of the Cost in the Shop.
I could not be happier about the Service of this Fix Auto Comp.
For sure I'll recommend this Shop for such great Customer Service.

Just had an oil change and tire rotation done. Clean shop, was able to make an appointment, fair price and I was out in about an hour. 

The nicest thing was that they didn't come to me with a laundry list of items I needed to have done. They made a suggestion on one item as I checked out, but no hard sell in the office.

Josh Sneed is a thief using the DBA a4ordable appliance.  He defrauded us out of over $700.  Under no circumstance should anyone hire this person.  He will take your money for parts and disappear.  He actually caused additional damage to a machine he worked on as well.  Report him to the police.  People like this guy always get caught.  Enjoy prison...again.

So, this is really good if you're looking for old fashioned, heavy cooking. I happen to love that kind of stuff so I found it to be great. The hot roast beef sandwich is really good, covered in delicious gravy and served with mashed potatoes (with the skins in it). So good. My grandmother got the meatloaf. It reminded me of the meatloaf my mother used to make. Really good.

This is one of my favorite little senior spots for some good food, reasonable prices and staff that treats you very nicely. Their manager is always walking the floor and making sure the patrons are being attended to and happy with the service. Their breakfast veggie omelet is a favorite of mine with fresh spinach and cheese on top with country potatoes on the side. I recommend stopping by later in the day (serve breakfast all day) because Sal works that schedule and he really puts his heart into cooking a wonder dish. I had to take a picture yesterday when I was there because it was just so fresh and prepared perfectly.

This is the worst golf course I have ever seen.  It is almost taking advantage of golfers.  I have never seen a course this bad before.   Its not like playing golf here.  The course is dead, with huge brown dirt showing all over the course.  Tree roots growing out of the ground.  This course is a mess.  I went into the club house at the turn and asked the guy at the desk why the course is in such bad shape and do they plan on watering it anytime soon.  He just laughed at me.  You could not pay me to play this course again.  I sincerely hope other golfers read this and never play at this course.  If I could have given it a negative 5 star rating, I would.

If the course management wants to contact me, I will leave my information.

Richard

760-397-7458
This place is fun karaoke night is fantastic n sometimes just to hang out is fabulous if u haven't been there is time to it a try u will love it
This is a great thrift store in a plaza of thrift stores.  Fun way to spend an afternoon.  Lutheran thrift  is my favorite.

On a scale of five stars, this establishment and Steve rate a ten.  I received two estimates to repair my car; one $651.75 and another approximately $20, the price I would have to pay for touch up paint from my Cadillac dealer. I elected the touch up route, and Steve was nice enough to perform the work for me. In addition to saving me a significant amount of money, the entire process displayed what outstanding customer service is. From the moment I was met at the front door for an estimate, until I drove off with a repaired car,I was treated as a friend. Not even in my home state of Iowa have I received such treatment. I can't say enough nice things about the staff, the quality of work and the sincere  hospitality!!!  Thank you, Roy Park

We have been taking our poodle mix there for over a year and we have been very happy. Everyone is very friendly, from the receptionist to the groomers. Most importantly our dog really likes everyone there also.

this place used to be called A&D (auto dynamics or something like that) and after A&D got horrible yelp ratings; suddenly, at the same address is "fix auto"  ----did they just change their name or get new ownership???;  the new named body shop has a great write up guy named steve;  very professional and accurate;  however, the body shop mechanic seems to have been kind of  careless; after I picked up my car, I found three things broken or missing from under the engine hood;  the rod (that holds up the engine cover) was gone, mind you--it had already been compromised but why throw it away?;  a bolt was removed from the battery holding steel rack (allowing the battery to move around under the hood) and the engine coolant reservoir was missing the cap that keeps the coolant from evaporating or splashing out;  [customer service was good and the work done was average; price was good;]  I would not have degraded the review if the body mechanic had not messed with the stuff under the engine hood;  mind you, I presume it was him because who else would have access to the car?  also the body mechanic has to disconnect the battery as part of the work he has to do;

So pleased with my care at Arizona Eye Institute! I had a very thorough eye examination by Dr. Cox. The front desk was very friendly and caring and all the staff were very professional. I picked out some gorgeous Juicy Couture sunglasses in the optical with the help of the wonderful opticians Kim and Lisa. Just love them! Thank you I will be back!

I took my 2008 BMW 328i here to get fixed after a car accident. Here's a list of the great things that happened here:
1) I dropped my car off and they had already coordinated a ride to the rental car company. I was in and out in 20 min at Fix Auto.
2) They kept me in the loop on when parts were received, installed, and painted (yes - there's an app for that). I had left front headlamp and fender damage.
3) When they let me know my car was ready, I was able to drop off the rental car on site. They handled the check-in for me. 
4) They kept in touch with my insurance company (USAA) and even verified that my deductible was waived because it was the other guy's fault.
5) When I took my car home, I noticed my left side rear window wouldn't come back up. I also noticed a right front parking lamp malfunction on my car. THESE THINGS WERE FIXED AT NO COST TO ME. They could have charged me to do the work and used the old excuse that these items were not related to my left front accident damage.
6) They were always friendly, always courteous, extremely knowledgeable on how to treat a customer, and explained the mechanical problems in a way that anyone could understand (talking about you Grant). 
7) I had milk stains from my son in the back of my car. I tried 3-4 different products over the years to get them out. Those stains were gone when I got the car back. Again - a service not directly related to my car accident. BTW - same goes for the rims that were dirty as crap before the accident and SPOTLESS when I got the car back. I haven't had my car looking like this since it was new. 

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEIR SERVICE WITHOUT HESITATION! (Sometimes it's all the little things that add up to a great review)
Great place to watch Packers games on Sundays! They had a make your own Bloody Mary bar and complimentary nachos. Loved it, will be back!

They moved and are now at 99th & Greenway (I think it's Greenway--it's the same center where Dollar General is and they are next to Dollar General).  They are in what used to be a dinner/night club place.  

I love their food; yes, it's average good, but you know what it is and they had Creamed Chipped Beef on Toast yesterday.  For me, that's a wow.  And they are always glad to substitute fruit for fries.  I always go there when I'm in Sun City.  People there work very, very hard.  A+= for me.

Today I went to Bobbies only to hear something from the staff that has really changed my whole opinion of this place and the way it is run. 

Never again.....

We've only been here a couple times, but we have had good food & service each time. 
This, to me, has been a 4-Star Sun City cafe. The food was served fast & hot. Serving portions were quite ample. I hade the turkey bacon melt ($7.49) and my lovely bride had the California Croissant sandwich ($8.29). Both were very tasty and the croissant was really big enough to share. 
Out server, Pat, was attentive, fast & friendly. 
We'll be back.

Had a hankering for salad bar, so came here for the first time.  The salad bar was standard fare. The lettuce was 2-3 days old and brown around the edges. The soup was broccoli cheese and it was good. When i brought my salad plate back to the table, there was a curly hair in my salad dressing.  Gross!  I ordered California Pannini for takeout for my husband ,  and ot wasn't grilled on a Pannini machine, it was cold. He said the slaw was good. Probably won't be back.

Found this place on Yelp while looking for a good place for breakfast near Vistancia.  It turned out to be a GREAT breakfast place and SUPER price/performance.  Prices are excellent and portions are sizeable.  Just like an old time diner.  We'll definitely make this our regular weekend breakfast spot.  Looks like they'll be moving a mile south on 99th in about a month.

This is great restaurant for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The food is extremely good and everyone is extremely nice and helpful. I definitely recommend coming here to eat. I loved the food and working atmosphere here!
Prices have increased severely.  Service has decreased.  Food not as high quality as I was used to.  I still like this restaurant, but they do need to improve to their former standards..
A bit bare for winter season in AZ. Price was $39 for noon tee time. Bring water - have not seen any on course. May replenish water at the turn.

I've been with State Farm "Heather Westphal" for a very long time, she is very helpful and easy to work with. She such a great person she feels like family and her staff is wonderful as we'll. there so warming, helpful and understanding. i love working with her that i added my house with her as we'll. My son and daughter in law feel the same way once they met with her. they also added there car and motorcycles with her. she is a blessing in our life. Thank you HEATHER!!!

Believe the 5-star rating! I've been working with Grant, and he and his team have certainly earned it.

After a nasty rear-end collision, I chose this USAA-preferred repair shop. My pride and joy -- my pretty little car -- came back to me looking even better than new. I asked them to paint the replacement spoiler to match the body color (which they did), and fix one of the "teeth" on the grill (which they did for a very reasonable price). 

And all that is great.

But, it's their *true* lifetime guarantee on their work that will ensure I choose them again if I need it. Months after the accident, Grant and his guys have worked with me -- on two occasions -- to work out a few minor, but pesky, noises in the trunk area. Both times, they've been exhaustive and thorough figuring out what's causing them, and fixing them, quickly.

Though most people would just learn to live with these quirks, Grant understands "car people" like me ... because he is one. He's told me more than once that he won't let me drive away less than completely happy with the way it sounds (or *doesn't* sound, in this case), and he backs that up.

I'll pick up my car tomorrow, for the second time, with no rattles or annoying noises (having been provided a rental car in both instances!) because they truly stand behind their work. That's a rarity, and something to REALLY think about if you're considering your repair options.
Always pleasant tellers. Been bankning with this bank for over 5 years and this location is very friendly and I kind of will go out of my way to come it.

I went for a scheduled interview. On arrival I was told by the administrator I came at a bad time. There was no interview process being no nursing director. The floors were dirty and staff proudly displayed their tattoos. I'll keep looking. After 18 years experience in hospital ER ICU and Telemetry I have witnessed the lowest levels of nursing.
Great staff, Hearing specialist knows his stuff, Thomas, was able to answer all my questions and helped us feel good about our purchase.
Amazing customer service! They don't treat you like a number or just a customer-it's more like a friend/family. Highly rec!

Great Bank for my business account.  It's nice that it's close to my salon and has an ATM outside so that I can make late deposits.  Most of the ATM's are inside grocery stores and I don't like that.  Very convenient.
We love The Speak!  Great people. Cheap drinks. Always a fun time. Try it. It'll soon become your happy place too!

This is a wonderfully well stocked health food store. Gluten Free and bulk available.
The staff is also very helpful. I will be back for sure.

so many signs up NO BATHROOMS, you know they do have bathrooms, and this is SUN CITY, you need to have restrooms that the public can use. You have enough volunteers to check it and make sure it is clean , even if it was unisex.  The old location had rest rooms for all the stores but now that they are in this location , they need to have something available for customers to use.

So they sell specials on Groupon with the only restriction being good after 1 PM any day but when I called they had a 12:52 for my Sat group but wouldn't let me have it because they send off front and back tees from 11:30 till 1 so they agreed they should have never offered it on Sat but still wouldn't give me the 12:52 for customer satisfaction. I guess these 1 star reviews say it all!

Excellent customer service!  Mark, Tim and the entire crew went above and beyond to making my repairs on my Auto. They picked up, serviced and treated myself and others that referred me with respect and honesty. 
  I recommend Automotive Dynamics to everyone.

This is a budget American Style cafe. I know what kind of food to expect and I certainly wasn't expecting Michelin Quality Cuisine. 

I ordered the trout because the menu said it was fresh. I received mixed vegetables that were over boiled and soggy. Fish that was edible but over cooked, dry and seemed more like from frozen and not good. I also received GREY-GREEN mashed potatoes. Right away I asked the server why the potatoes were green. After asking the cook she said potatoes turn green from black pepper and potato skin. 

This food was mostly inedible. 

The server removed my plate with most of it remaining and didn't say a thing.

I took my two dogs here for a much needed grooming. Everyone at Pawlor Pets, from the receptionist to the groomers are so nice and friendly! They definitely care deeply about the animals they groom. My boy dog is very timid and nervous, and can be aggressive toward other dogs. The staff took great care in making him feel safe and at home. Best of all, my pups look (and smell) wonderful! Thanks Pawlor Pets!

GREAT low key bar always filled with friendly people and always some entertainment. Great pricing and even better bartenders. Awesome shuffleboards. A fabulous place to just relax , enjoy and have a good time with ample seating and space.

Excellent service at Spectra Eye Institute! 

Hubby was there for cataract surgery  by his opthamologist. And I was there as his driver... He was asked to be there one hour ahead of the appointment.. Not long after arriving he was called to the desk to begin the process. In all, we were there only two hours.

Every person we had contact with at Spectra was efficient, courteous and caring. This included all the nurses and clerical personnel. Nurses spent time explaining the surgery and the aftercare.  The waiting area was spacious.

A good experience - Hubby was very pleased!

After work today on Christmas Eve..I come into the store, tired in a hurry lost since I haven't been their before. I walk up towards the cashier. Who is helping a customer talking. I have already made eye contact with both of them..since it wasn't a customer it was an employee. At this point they still haven't said anything ...no greeting..I ask where I could find the spa special..robe etc...she said oh yah we been sold out..I said oh ok...and before I could ask if they had anything like it. They turned their heads and starting talking again. 
Keep in mind customer service sales..nope
It wasn't even close to closing..
If you are in the area don't miss  the Speakeasy.   Great people and great drink specials.   Karaoke And Live bands!  If you don't know it's there you will miss it.  Also shuffleboard.

Perfectly on time & clear with those directions to my uncle when he underwent a laser eye surgery.

The nurses and front desk people were kind and patient.  Maybe because we went during the summer it wasn't as busy as other yelpers have said.

When they discharged my uncle Chelsea his nurse was sure to repeat anything he didn't understand.  She listened to his questions and made sure he knew how to care for his eye.

Now after a great recovery we will be back for his other eye.

Making the appointment was easy. Dean called me 20 minutes before he came to let us know he was on the way during the time told to us. He did 3 rooms, stairs and a landing for 125, pre treatment included. We live in a smaller townhome. Great service and nice guy. Would use again.

I like the description as good as it gets this place is definitely that great people great product I really enjoy the honesty that they always offer and leaving reviews is a great way for me to always want to come back and make sure I get the best product i can

We took our malipoo here for the first time since moving to Surprise. Our girl looks so damn cute! I love the hair cut they did on her and she really seemed to enjoy herself there. Our dog is typically a grumpy dog but they said she was a sweetheart which means she liked them! I highly recommend this place and the price is just right as well!

I hesitated giving the shop even a one star. I had a flat tire and mistakingly  brought my car there after being told by AAA the tire is repairable, big o tires said they could not repair it and I needed a new tire. After speaking with my husband within minutes I called back and told them do not do a new tire and put the donut back on and they told me it was too late I would have to pay for mounting either way because the tire was already on the car. When I picked my car up I had grease all along the door as well as all my engine lights were on and cannot be turned off. I had to leave the body shop and go to the dealership where they could fix my light and my sensors, which this shop was unable to do. It turns out they put too much tire pressure in my car and this is the reason why my sensors would not turn off. After explaining the reasoning why my lights would not turn off they advised they were having problems with their air pressure machine and this could be the reason why. I then went to Discount Tire to see if the tires could be repaired and they told me absolutely it can be repaired. After calling the shop in speaking with the Store manager at the location named and Bruce he scheduled an appointment for my husband to come in the following day to see him and only him and that he would take care of everything. When my husband got there he was not there and the guy there stated he was advised if we wanted our money back he would take the tire off the car and put the donut back on the car. No compensation for any of the trouble or problems that occurred with this shop. We did not have time at that moment to do this we already spent too much time just to get a tire fixed. We have went there for several years because they are close by as well as several friends in the community. I have made it my duty as well as my family to be a vocal advocate against this body shop. At all of the recreation centers in Sun City which my family is highly involved in. As well as a corporation that I am employed with, the treatment from the shop was unprofessional, careless, deceiving, and unloyal. We suggest if you want to be valued as a customer and treated with dignity and respect as well as having your car cared for do not go to this location. I have went as far as talking to my attorney in regards to this matter in determining my decision on which way I am going to proceed with this company. As my credit card company suggested  to make sure we have pictures which we do . As well as  several Discount Tire employees  willing to speak up in regards to this matter .  This is how they  treated both myself and my automobile. I would not trust any of their work. Or I would I trust the loyalty they have for their customers

All-time favorite dispensary! Amy and Al's edibles are the best hands down! Meds on all shelf's are good and that's hard to find foot meds that's aren't the dispensaries "reserve"! Keep up the great work!

Very helpful, quickly found everything I was looking for. Offered to order in things I wanted but were not readily available. Great selection of things I can't find elsewhere. Very friendly. Will be back for sure!

This place is basically a pain pill dispensary. They rarely address what is causing a person's pain and for a person having surgery on something other than your back they have no idea what to give you for pain
Great customer service! Never a long wait! Good product!

The "boss man" CONTINUES TO TELL ME I Don't  KNOW WHAT I WANT OR WHAT I HAVE!!! He told me the first time I would not find a smart car for the price I wanted to pay, I left and FOUND IT FOR WHAT I WANYED TO PAY!!! okay, I wanted to give him a second chance due to wanting to upgrade to 2017 convertible, this time he tells me I BOUGHT A RENTAL CAR! I did not I told him it was a fleet car!! He shook his head and said, "NO, I KNOW IT WAS A RENTAL CAR PREVIOUSLY JUST BY LOOKING AT IT!!!" REALLY, this is how you want to treat the second chance that I gave you?!!? I wouldn't buy a turnip from this man!!! He's a pompous ass!

I take my Mother out to lunch in Sun City often. Mercers has always been our 1st choice. One gets tired of the same all the time. So we ventured to Bobbies. Have been there now a dozen times, each time hoping to find a better experience. We are usually greeted by no one , and I mean all we get is the question "two?'" No hello, how are you, etc. We are lead to the table menus plopped down. Then waiter, or waitress comes , and we literally had one that just came and said, "drink" that was it, again no hello, nothing. We are regulars at Mercers and really wanted to be at Bobbies, but no one remembers you and the sevice is awful. The waitstaff really act like they could care less about you. I have to say that Mario the owner has recognized us once or twice but that was it. When you go to a diner you don't expect aaa rated food, but i do expect good service. They really need to go to Mercers and see how the staff there treats customers, that come back . We are done at Bobbies.

Was greeted and seated very quickly upon entering the place, that was it.  Only wanted water and salad bar for the two of us.  Never saw the waitress again.  Waited 8 minutes for her to take our order, and the place was not busy at all.  So we left.  First time in the place and won't return.  Went down the strip mall to Bit of Italy for lunch.

This breakfast was incredible. I love the way they make their omelettes, they don't just fold and stuff them, they mix the eggs with the ingredients. And their potatoes were delicious! Scalloped style. I'm so glad I stopped in. I will be back. And you can't beat the prices! Not a single complaint. My server Suzi was attentive and on point and super sweet. This place is a gem!
Had a dead battery. Randomly went to this location as it's just down the street. They replaced the battery and had me out of there in no time. Everyone was super friendly. I will go there again.

I had a leak in my rack and pinion. They took me out to the shop and showed me the problem, explained everything to me and made suggestions on getting it repaired. Kevin was very professional and saved me a little more money than the original quote. They have a large sign displayed over their counter stating they will never charge you for parts or service you don't need.  I am a single women and always a bit leery about if I am being taken advantage of in these situations but I felt very comfortable with their honesty and service. They also gave me a ride home and back when service was completed.
A great restaurant for breakfast, but the food takes forever to get to you. The service could be improved. Overall, a very good restaurant and I would recommend it for a great breakfast cafe.

Bought Yokohama tires on recommendation of Mgr at this store approx 18 myths ago.  Had changed original equipment tires for first time on my 2008 camry.   The original equipment delivered 59k miles.  Yokohama tires cost 640.00.  They only gave 25.9k miles, wore uneven etc, poor tire.

Management prorated them out, gave me 240.00 against new set of Big O brand.  Long story short, had to pay another 400.00 today.  Big O will never see another penny from me.
Lutheran Thrift Shop has a new location: 10615 W Peoria Ave., across 107th from where they used to be. They took over the location that was Jan and Dean's.

I bought a groupon for stainpro and set up my service for 8/3 between 8am-12pm by calling Dean. On 8/2 I called again to confirm my appointment, after seeing the other horrible reviews on this company. I left a VM and called back again later on after not hearing back. I tried calling again the morning of 8/3 and again no answer. Dean called me back about an hour later and left me a VM saying that he didn't have an appointment for me today, but had one for me next week? That is strange because I had to be out of my previous rental home by then. He stated that he didn't know how it might have happened, but he could fit me in Monday next week. Lol. I told Dean to forget about it. I'll get my money back from Groupon and find a real company to help me.

A bank that refuses to make change for a customer, rude service, uncaring and theworst experience I have ever had in a bank the nice thing, was that Wells Fargo was happy to give me the change that I needed, time for a new bank

Great staff and great experience, Dr. Justo was very thorough with my eye exam and I absolutely love my new Jimmy Choo sunglasses I got from Kim in the optical. I will definitely be recommending this clinic to my friends and family.

It's hard to ruin breakfast, but they have succeeded.  We ordered two separate items -- me: scrambled eggs, crispy bacon and fruit in stead of hash browns.  My husband: a ham & cheese omelet, fruit instead of hash browns.  Both of us ordered toast.  Sadly the best part of the meal was the toast.  Husband didn't get the fruit but it was canned and looked awful so he didn't complain.  I didn't eat it.  Our eggs were rubbery leading me to think they are using liquid eggs.  My husband said the ham was too salty to eat. My crispy bacon disintegrated in my mouth. This restaurant changed hands a short while ago and it's pretty clear they've made the decision to use prepared foods rather than fresh.  In fact, my husband noted on the menu that that word "fresh" next to the selection of "fruit" had been whited out. The staff was pleasant and attentive, but it took so long to get our bill, that we went to the counter and were politely scolded being told we needed to wait until we paid at the table.  Won't be back unless new information comes to light.  Sad.  Used to be pretty good.

The waitress today was very rude! Because I hadn't finished my outside coffee she wouldn't even say hello - how ya doing, just 'NO outside beverages'! We all left and went somewhere else! We have been coming here for several years so she knew us also! We won't be going back there!

i just love this little store. it ranks high among places i like to go and spend hours lost in my own head, dreamily paging through countless old books. the selection is marvelous, and the prices are fantastic. i'm sort of a sucker for used bookstores anyway. i mean, how could there be a BAD one? i never bring anything to trade because i keep every book that i buy and have a pretty impressive little collection, but they seem to give pretty good deals when you do bring trades in. you can also just donate, which i suspect happens a lot given the location of the store.

I saw the review below and just thought it was ridiculous. RIDICULOUS. 

Elderly people work here or volunteer. You expect customer service that you'd receive at a high-end store. No. People die and their things that are usually in good condition are donated and are resold at really cheap prices. No, the people there will not be making sure you're finding everything okay, you're on your own... and that's how it should be when you're thrifting.

I usually find great things. Glasswares, books, shoes, purses. They have amazing furniture that is so cheap. They have many half off days and various sales throughout the week.

Just make sure you go on a weekday or Saturday and before 2pm.. all the stores in this plaza close at 4 and are closed Sundays.

I am so impressed with Dr. Justo and his entire team! I recently helped a very high-needs client attend to his long-neglected medical needs. This client needed cataract surgery in both eyes, with a cataract in one eye being especially complex. Dr. Justo and his staff did a fantastic job helping this highly anxious (among other issues) individual feel welcome and at ease in their office. Equally important were the thorough and detailed explanations of the pre-surgery requirements, surgical procedure itself, and aftercare expectations. I was particularly impressed with Sherrie, a Certified Ophthalmic Assistant, who worked hard to develop a rapport with my challenging client and ease the client's many (and sometimes contradictory) concerns. Sherrie also went above and beyond in following up on the surgery and aftercare. Before choosing this location, I called numerous doctors to inquire about pricing. In addition to their excellent quality of care,  I was impressed with their upfront attitude regarding cost. We were provided a detailed cost sheet on our first visit. It was a fair and reasonable cost. Overall, I just cannot sing their praises enough! My client, who was fumbling through each day due to near blindness, has just blossomed since the surgeries! Being able to see again has positively changed this individual's life in a matter of days. On behalf of my client, thank you, Dr. Justo and team!
They helped me out by coming to my house, putting air in my tire so I could drive to the store & get it fixed. This location goes above & beyond.  Fabulous tire place!

Fun place in Sun City! My fiance and I were in Sun City visiting his gramps and were in search of a nice local bar with fun energy...we found it here! The owner was super nice and friendly. They had great live music and the jukebox had a great selection of music, which I set up a great selection before the live music went live...we'll be back on our next trip to Sun City!!

DO NOT PURCHASE A LIVINGSOCIAL DEAL FROM THEM!

I had an appointment scheduled for a Wednesday between 4-6pm.  I received a phone call that Wednesday morning from Dean stating he had double booked himself and would need to reschedule.  No problem.  He asked if he could come two days later, on Friday, at 3pm.  I said sure, I can go in work early to make sure I'm home by 3pm.  Friday at 3pm rolls on by.  I call at 4pm, Dean answers.  I tell him we had an appointment schedule and he asks if I am "100% positive" that we have an appointment.  I tell him yes, I rearranged my schedule to accomodate him.  He says he will try to figure something out and call back.  20 minutes later, he calls back and does apologize and reschedules again for Monday.  On Monday, Dean shows up.  I ask for the hallways and stairs to be done as well as he had previously quoted me an approximate price of $45.  He then took a look at the area and stated it would be $85.  Now, I hadn't gotten my carpets cleaned in a couple of years, but I am a neat freak (no shoes on the carpet, vacuum weekly, etc.).  I asked about a discount as I had to endure all of these scheduling issues.  Dean stated he was not charging me the $20 travel fee and an orange stain from my dog eating carrots.  I asked why there was a travel fee at all, as I live in Avondale and it is one of the areas listed on the livingsocial deal.  I was told that no matter what area you live in, there is always a service fee.....um ok.  Needless to say, the whole job (5 rooms, hallway and stairs) took no more than 30 min.  Dean had his shoes on the whole time and the orange stain is still visable.  Do yourself a favor and go with another carpet cleaning company.
Just been here a couple of times using the ATM machine. I do like the fact the ATM machine is visible from Bell Road, just in case something might go wrong.

I dealt with this company at a very painful time in my life, so I've waited to write this until some of the pain of dealing with them subsided.  They were horrible to deal with.  Here are some of my complaints.  
They promised to post photographs online of items to be sold.  They never did.  
I had gone through everything to be sold, yet they said some was unsalable, and discarded a large pile of my husband's collectibles items.  I had to sell the items I retrieved  later online.  
They had marked vintage headphones at $2. They later sold online $80.    
They reminded me repeatedly how inconvenient it was that I was living in the home; even though I had opened all but 1 bedroom and bath to them, and had gone out of town for 5 of the 6 days they were in my home.
