I was not given an accounting of what individual items sold for; even the high ticket items.  
Truly, one of the worst experiences I've ever had.  DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!

I was on my first leg of a 5,000 mile road trip.  I went here to get my oil and coolant changed.  The guy who check me in took a look at my car as it sat in the parking lot.  He told me that he would check the radiator fluid, but it probably didn't need the $150 change.  Sure enough, he came back in 45 minutes with my oil changed, a nail removed from my tire; and with the good news that my coolant was good for 100,000 miles.  Instead of jacking me for $200, I walked out that door spending only $40.  

Many mechanics (especially ones who work for national companies) have a well-deserved reputation for trying to get customers to spend more than they need to.  That wasn't the case here.  The people were honest, friendly, clean, and efficient.  If you're near this particular Big O, then it's well worth your time and piece of mind to get your car serviced there.

WOW! An honest contractor. We were in a hurt, because our water heater quit working while we were away. I couldn't get the pilot light lit following the instructions as printed on the unit. Had a friend stop by and he had no luck. Call my Nieghbor and he said I've used these guys for years and have always been satisfied. So, I call them and told them my problem. The staff was  extremely courteous and very helpful in making sure they got someone out here today. They gave me a reasonable time frame and even called prior to getting here. The water heater is about 10 years old so I figured I was about to get the big one. Instead Sergio ask a couple of questions, and quickly fixed the problem. I now know the instructions don't really explain about warmer temps. here in Az. So problem fixed and cost was much better than what I expected. They have my vote and will get my business in the future. Great job!
Came in for the first time and I loved the service I received and the flowers are wonderful. Stop by get yours.

I am a relatively new customer to Papa Murphy's take out pizza. I recently moved to Sun City. My neighbors across the street brought two HUGE slices of pizza to our home. Later, the lady told me the pizza was from Papa Murphy's, that it was made fresh in their place of business, and you took it home and baked it yourself. 

So, my husband and I went there about two nights later. Got the pizza and brought it home to cook it. IT WAS FANTASTIC!!!! Who knew that I could cook a pizza and have it looking SO GOOD?

We are Papa Murphy's converts now! Never again will I order another pizza to be delivered. Those pizzas were too greasy, but that's just all there was, or so I thought. A Papa Murphy's Pizza is really good, just what you would expect from a high-end pizzeria. But it came from my kitchen!
Great customer service ! I have to practice on baking the pizza. Couldn't get the crust to be crispy !

Very caring doctor and staff. I took my grandparents in for an eye exam and Dr. Justo was very thorough and took his time explaining everything. I will definitely be recommending this office to my friends and family.

First  time playing the course  . It just came off overseeing . The greens were smooth  a little slow about a 7 . The course  was in good shape but was cart part only. The counter person was friendly and we got free balls to hit the pace of play started  very slowly but ended 4 hours and 15 minutes.  Cart girl came every 4 or 5 holes

I have been coming to Dr Urhik for about 4 years.  The staff is SUPER friendly. They listen to my pain symptoms and try to prescribe what is needed to help.  I have been in less pain ever since coming here.  I am so grateful.
A great place to meet. Great view out the window to the West of White Tanks mountains. Meet all kinds of great folks. I'm sure the new location will be special.

They have excellent gyros. I've been there several times in the past year for lunch and the food and service has always been very good. Looks like a local favorite. Prices are a bargain. 

Looking forward to trying other menu items instead of the gyros which are a sure thing for me. They have a small bar which customers where enjoying each time I was there. A freindly place for a quick tasty meal. The decor is almost nonexistent but the food is good. It has an outdoor seating area for the cooler weather months.

I'm from LA and come here every time I'm in Sun City to visit my mom.  This place is a 5 star in my book; the food is straightforward and incredibly good: always fresh, never a formula and that basic homemade good stuff.  And it does have a range of cusomers.  You won't be the youngest or oldest here.

My league conducted league play here.  I'm pretty much a novice golf player, and so this course was good for my abilities.  Other than 1 hole, as long as you can hit straight you're OK on this course.  There are no sneaky bunkers at the bottom of a hill before the greens, that you can't see from the tees.  That one hole I'm talking about is a par 5, and has a dogleg right, with a water hazard jutting in.  The good players simply hit across the water hazard, but alas, I'm a novice and so I need to stick to the fairway.  I played during the summer, and so the green fees were $29 with a cart.  There are no refreshment carts, but the course provides ice.  The only problem I had was their carts are gas powered, and some of them  sorely need a tune-up.  But if you're up to playing in the heat, then you pretty much have the course to yourself.
Great place! They always take care of me and have the best quality medicine for the price!

I finally decided it was time to get a professional opinion on my hearing situation, so I researched companies, products and Doctors and finally decided on Moore Audiology, I inquired online and within a matter of minutes had an appointment set up. I met with Jason at their Del Webb location and I was surprised at how enthusiastic and knowledgeable Jason was about my hearing needs. I had researched many different hearing aid brands and had some idea as to what I was looking for. Jason took the time to discuss my needs and expectations and we were able to find the perfect product to get my hearing on to a new and better level. Jason is very knowledgeable in this field and has brought a new realm into my life. My experience with Moore Audiology has been exceptional. My thanks go out to Jason and all of the staff at Moore Audiology, what a life changing experience they have given me. Looking forward to a great future with them. Great company, employees and products.

Great company, employees and products.

Supposed to be 118 degrees and they had two places where you can get a drinking from a warm drinking fountain,  no cart person (called in sick). How hard is it to at least run out a few Gatorade jugs on some holes? Didn't seem to care much when asked about it either. Nobody in the restaurant to get something to eat at the turn. My local crap course has more to offer. No ranger to speed play, had three twosomes playing in a row,  seemed like if you weren't a regular old fart, they could care less about you. Extremely disappointed.

WM has rlly good flower, delicious edibles, and great deals every day. Tasty Tuesday n Free Gram Friday are my favs :-)

On top of good product, the staff here is so kind and helpful!! I couldn't ask for a more well-rounded consumer experience. I end up going a few times a week bc white mountain takes such good care of their customers n patients

I purchased a home in surprise in may of this year in april the seller had sun city mechanical come out for an inspection.  The tech said the ac was working.properly and the drain was completely clear upon an inspection of the home i purchased the inspector found rust at the drain and said the ldrain line had a clog we went to the seller and they produced a reciept from sun city mechanical.   Not even 30 days after.move in. I developed a water leak in my bathroom   i had called my home warranty. They came out. Checked it. Fround the trap for the drain 100% clogged. With this leak. It damaged my walls.  I called sun city mechanicaland even so much as went to the office. Showed them the damage( clogged trap) and pictures of my damaged wall. They sent the lead tech out a few days later and said. They are not responsible. Tech wasnt even there 5 minutes. I have called them back numerous time. With not getting anywhere with them.  I would never and i mean never reciament sun city mechanical to anybody. I also have filed a report with the bbb.    Buyer beware.  Dont use sun city mechanical
Great environment, awesome staff and great product as well! Love coming here! Would recommend this shop to anyone!

Scam artist!!!! Convicted felon that will rip you off. DO NOT USE JOSH. HE TOOK our money $400 and we never heard from him again. He also used our bathroom and we found both windows unlocked after he used our bathroom. LOOK UP HIS INFO he has scammed hundreds of other people.
Love the daily 10 dollar a gram specials & the Potcorn is always a favorite. Staff is awesome and I never have to wait! Would recommend this to a friend for sure!

Have read about this place several times in the paper as one of the better places in the NW Valley to have breakfast, so I finally made the relatively short trek to try it out.  What a disappointment.  Nothing unusual about the menu.  Eggs unremarkable, somewhat cold as judged by all three of us.  Pancakes overly cooked, tasteless, and not at all "fluffy," again a unanimous opinion.  And the potatoes were undercooked slabs of substance that looked microwaved.  Service was rushed, but pleasant.  Coffee good.  But certainly not worth the trip.  Won't return.  Don't understand the repeated good ratings.

Best place to get a car! Owner-Perry-is very helpful, honest, and helps you with whatever you need. There's no city sales tax, so you will save around $400-$500 going through Perry and Easy Street. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Every Tuesday Morning I have been in has good finds at great prices. Love shopping here and finding new odds and ends.9

I have been taking my cars here for years and I have to say the service here is over the top. From rides back and forth while my Mercedes is being worked on to saving me hundreds on repairs. I recommend this Big O for all your automotive repairs.

My husband and I love this place.  Great live bands, dancing, and fun.  Awesome drink prices,and very chill. I love going casually dressed talking to people of all different ages and having a darn good time.  Best little bar in town and not to mention they are super clean.
Another excellent automotive experience with A.D. Did exactly what they said they were going to do and inspected my auto for other wear. No up selling and service with a smile!

I have a mentally ill brother that was asked to leave about 6 months ago. Since then he has been stable on his meds. Yesterday he forgot that he was bared from the store. One of  the the workers bolted with extreme anger yelling out my brother. I interviened and said thats not very Christian your acting like a devil.
Left the store and mentioned to Carol. All the man had to do is just ask him in a loving way 
1cor. 13.to leave. Meanwile he sends a sheriff deputy to bar us both from shopping at that store. I know the Lord commands us to iove one another. But if this represents the Luthern church. I want nothing to do with mean Spirit anti-christians. We all must go through the judge ment seat of God.
I KNOW the local fire houses LOVE the pizza! They eat it at lest once a month. Super fast and easy for them.

New to SC, whereas, I was referred to Automotive Dynamics, "AD" via Next Door. Made an appointment, took my car back at the appointment time, waited for the job to be done in there nice clean lobby. 45 minutes later, my car was done, quoted price was $10 less. Nice to start relationship with AD. Very busy business, excellent management. Management and staff demonstrated high level of professionalism.

Wife has been waiting 2 months for this appt. and now the laser is broken.  She has been fasting for 24 hours!  

They are now saying they aren't sure when the machine will be fix or if it will be fixed today.  Lots of pissed of people in the waiting room.  The snippy little receptionist is telling people to continue to not eat any food.  

Wife is feed up with this place - cancelled her appointment and is demanding her $3000 up front money back!
These guys are horrible. Understaffed, short change every treatment and add treatments that aren't necessary. They hurt our fathers recovery rather than help it.

This place is amazing outlet for medical marijuana they have great selection and awesome people their customer service is great I really like the way that they are honest with you about the flour and about the quality
My Favorite dispensary in Phoenix! Thank you guys for the awesome work! The Flower and Edibles are also super amazing with awesome deals as well! Thank you guys again!

Wanted to try this place for a while! Finally had the opportunity this past week end, we actually went there twice in the same day! Wife and I ate here after Church for breakfast. We had eggs, home potatoes, bacon, pancakes, and a small order of biscuit and gravy. Food was great, biscuit and gravy was one of the best we have had! Gravy had a very good and unique taste? Kind of tasted like chicken sausage gravy? We cleaned our plates and brought home the daughter a cheese burger. That  same night we came back for dinner, wife and I really like the way, the burgers looked. So I had their bacon burger deluxe. Burger was very good, their 1000 island dressing was also better than usual! Over all we had a great time, family loved their burgers and we will start coming back more often.

I very highly recommend Arizona Eye Institute for all of their amazing services. The staff are wonderful!   I feel like I have formed friendships, and that they care about me every step of the way. They really make you feel like part of their family. Dr Justo is a top notch doctor and surgeon. I also just had fillers by Roxanne, and I am blown away by how amazing she is as a person, and her talent at what she does.  I know that I am in the best hands and receiving the best care. I would recommend them to everyone I know!

I'm under the assumption that there is not yet a review for this place because of the age gap in retired customers that frequent this place, due to its sun city location. That being said this place went through some legal battles to get this place rolling in sun city but well worth the wait! To start there 7 to 7 hours 7 days a week is awsome. Reasonable prices and 10 gram happy hour specials daily. The staff is super chill and very professional. The quality of bud is where you would expect it to be, on point. There's usually some exotics on the shelf too. The setup of the place is laid back but modern and super safe location and atmosphere. Wide varieties of mmj from edibles to flower, definitely worth driving to if not convenient for a stop by.

We drove a ways to find this bookstore and was not disappointed. Found many books in the series I was reading! When I had looked for an author and had given up I finally asked the nice lady who worked there and she took me right to them!! I loved the organization of their books, my husband who reads a lot and can not always find ones to read that he has not already read walked out with quite a few! I know we will be returning!

I give it 3 stars because of the decor.
Just looks like your usual run of the mill diner.
I ate there last week for there friday fish fry.
The service was decent, The fish was good and the prices were just right.
I will return, I promise.

I don't really know how many stars to put here.  We requested a quote for a Mitsubishi mini-split for our garage. Electrical ready to go.  They quoted a different inferior unit so we called them back and asked for the Mitsubishi quote. It was hard enough to get the first quote and of course they said "sorry thought he had already given you the quote".  Well it's been two months now and no call, no quote. So as far as stars, maybe it should be ZERO since they don't care if they have a new customer. Guess they just don't need the money. They are off our list.
A spacious business, good items, reasonable prices, and nice volunteer staff.

After having eyelid surgery by Dr. Emilio Justo at the Arizona Eye Institute, I brought my parents in to see Dr. Shifrin for their eye exams.  We were greeted warmly and with a smile at the front desk.  Check in process was a breeze.  The technician and Dr. Shifrin were both very thorough and we felt that was the best exams that my parents have had!  Highly recommend recommend Dr. Justo and his entire team at the Arizona Eye Institute!

I am pleased with Sun City Mechanical to give prompt and quality service at reasonable pricing.
Isidro has been an excellent service person w  a few plumbing issues over the past few years.
Thank you.
Anita
Awesome neighborhood bar! Love watching the games on Sunday while sipping on a bloody mary! Friendly people and crowd, lots of parking! Great place to catch up with friends.

Stumbled upon this place by accident. twice!!!

First time i went inside one early evening just because of their great gyro deal.   GOOD FOOD and found out it was a full bar!!!! 

Next time I walked there one evening to get some food and found it was KARAOKE night, 8-10 and all the seniors make great singers.  

good prices and good food and beer

I don't recommend you go here if you don't have Medicare. The anesthesiologist refused to be in network with my insurance per my insurance company. 
I was sent there because my eye surgeons office was out of network. I was never informed the anesthesiologist wasn't in network. I was only told Dr. Nierva, the anesthesiologist, would bill me separate. My surgeons office or Spectra never said he would not be covered under my insurance. Then my surgeons office said they write it off all the time but apparently that is also a lie.  I am being billed $6000 for just Dr Nierva because he conveniently refuses to be in network. Thats double what my part was for the surgery. This is a scam! 
I have heard from a few friends this is something anesthesiologist in the Phx area do. I advise you to always ask and then ask your insurance company also.

These folks have what you ask for according to what you describe you wish their products to relieve. Want to sleep and decrease pain; they explain understandably, what works. A great bunch of employees who don't push you towards what, 'needs to move'. They get to know you and they're hard to forget! Daily specials, points system that adds up a reserve of useable money on future purchases, and easy going folks comfortable with severe disabilities. The best first-time customer reward set-up and employees stay. Familiar faces on a first name basis you can always trust. To those who wish to talk about the Science of it all, they're all prepared to explain in the greatest detail. Love this place; clean, fast, orderly, polite and axccommidating every time.
Dr. Justo is great. But after cataract surgery i never saw him again. Appointment wait times are excessive and staff unfriendly.

Best pizza and super nice employees! Always greeted with a smile and pizza is ready when I arrive. Love the fact they are so close to my home. Also, the prices are excellent too and get extra off with the coupons.

It was that time again.... Just had another birthday and a wanted a Restylane filler touch up.  Once again Roxanne, the Director of Nursing at Arizona Eye Institute, worked with me to get the perfect effect!  I just love the results!   People can't believe I live in an adult company!  And that's just the way I like it!  I can't recommend Arizona Eye Institute enough...it's such a warm comfortable atmosphere.  From the moment you arrive and are greeted by the staff to the doctors and nurses, the service is top notch!
Bought livingsocial deal...well worth it.  The owner was friendly, efficient, and made sure I was satisfied with my cleaning.  Definitely would recommend to others!!

Excellent Customer Service: 
Today I needed assistance with putting on new wiper blades and air filter. Went to Automotive Dynamics and was greeted by a attentive professional Service Manager. Asked him what they would charge to install my wife's blades and air filter, no charge. Installed them and thanked me for stopping in to see them. I asked the Service Manager if he was the owner, he said no, but I can tell you he performed as a owner. Thank you. A.D will be back for my auto needs.

Was there for two visits. Both times service was wonderful and the people who work there treated me great. I had cataract surgery on both eyes and can see again. First appointment was 5:45 and second was 7:15 and was in and out within two to three hours.

Chase bank's joke of a  "loss prevention"messed up on depositing a check in my account and then had the nerve to put me to work contacting the other bank to fix it!! What a lazy, incompetent bunch of fools! Save yourself much time and frustration and put your hard earned money elsewhere!

Great Atmosphere and Amazing Bud's just like High Time's No other place in this town has Bud's like Tru Med Dispensary I will spending all my money and referring all my friends to White Mountain Dispensary

Great customer service from Steve and all. Unfortunately this was the second time I was in need of their expertise. Repair was completed and vehicle ready when promised....looking great!  Highly recommend to anyone in need of their service as I find them to be very trustworthy and honest. Great job guys!!

Worst service ever- they told us to be here at 6:45 and my dad's surgery was scheduled for 6:45. We have been here for 3 hours and still not been called. Very rude receptionist and nothing to keep patients from staring at walls. No literature and no tv. If they expect people to wait up to 4 hours they should tell patients this prior to their arrival. Yelp wouldn't let me give 0 stars-- avoid this place if you have a life.

I hired this company to help with my elderly mother's move. She had used them in the past (about seven years ago) and had been happy with the experience. The day before the move, we called to confirm and the call went to voicemail but the box was full - couldn't leave a message. Ok. Moving day shows up and no movers arrive. We tried to call, couldn't get through. We finally get through 2 HOURS AFTER the movers were scheduled to show and they say something along the lines of 'wooops, we'll send someone.' An hour later, two people show up with a landscaping pick-up truck (not a moving truck as promised) filled with s**t. It wouldn't be able to fit a fraction of the furniture. My mother is in tears, we're scrambling to find another mover last minute. Incredibly irresponsible and costly - both financially and emotionally. Stay as far away from Jan and Dean's as possible!

My car has satisfactorily been serviced on three occasions by Automotive Dynamics. They were recommended to me by another satisfied customer. I appreciate that Kevin and Mark take the time to provide me detailed information of my car servicing, any future issues the technician might have found, and any suggested manufacturer servicing. The communication is friendly and informative and the service great. And, I always feel my car runs better and is safer after it has been worked on by Automotive Dynamics. I would and have recommended Automotive Dynamics to others.

The best auto and customer service I've ever experienced! I had cosmetic damage to the passenger side of my car. I took it in on a Sunday & had it back in my possession by Wednesday. I was quoted at another auto shop for over $3K. Bob was able to fix my car good as new for under $1K. 
He kept in contact with me and gave me options that suited my budget. I would recommend this place to any and everyone that's looking for good auto work without being scammed or ripped off. 
To add the cherry on top, they offered a free detail of the interior & exterior of my car. (:
Please see photos for before and after work.
It's Friday I got to come and see my tenders at White Mountain so they can help with my medicinal needs.

My husband and I saw that this place had a salad bar, so we decided to try it out.
Once we we seated our waiter came and took our drink order, and brought them to us. We sat there for about 5 mins while he was cleaning two other tables, the place was not busy and we had our menus closed just waiting for him to take our order.. Very annoying.  Finally I asked the hostess as she walked by who our waiter was we were ready to order. It was the same guy who took our drink order and taking his time cleaning tables instead of taking care of his customers. He took our orders and I asked for the check and boxes right away as I could tell he would be slow. He told us we could not get boxes cause we got the salad bar, I clarified that we were not using the boxes for the salad, he said those were the rules. Our food came quickly and it was all good, though he never asked. When we were finishing eating he asked if we could please hurry and sign so he could go home. We will never go back. Unfourtunatley the service is always awful in the sun city area.

The entire staff has been EXCELLENT to work with. Each have been fun, polite and patient! Mind you, they've been assisting me, a 50yo, wearing contact lenses for the first time! Dr. Naz has been a true gem! I found this wonderful office via the Google search of Optometrist in Sun City.  I lucked out, in a big way!

The speakeasy used to be a fun place to go, the new bar tenders who were there last night were the most disrespectful ignorant people. I won't be going back there. They have no respect for the patrons who visit that place. My friend said the same thing I had no idea how awful that place has become. People I speak to now won't even go back. Waiting on Tommy and Jamie to open.
Excellent gyros. The meat is always tender and moist. I've eaten plenty gyros across the country and this is some of the best I've had.

CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP. You have to rate a place within its price bracket. For the price, the food was average good. And this was the cheapest full breakfast we have every had in the United States, and that says a lot. 

We had been to a another breakfast spot and found a 30 minute wait and called around to find another with less of a wait. We were on a tighter schedule than expected to get to the ball game in Surprise. We always forget how long it really takes to get out there. North Scottsdale to Surprise Stadium = 50 minutes to an hour with no traffic. Then add traffic. Yikes. Anyway, when we called this place, which would conveniently be on the way to the ballpark, they said no wait. All right, done. 

So we ventured on over and found parking easy. We went in and waited about 4 minutes until a booth opened up for us. First impression was not fabulous. The hostess (likely owner) was pretty dry and all the wait staff got into a big discussion at the front about what tables were going to be covered by whom. Ok, do that somewhere else. 

Once seated, we ordered coffee (well needed at this point) and tooka look at the menu. We were astonished at the prices on the menu. This was more like the 70's menu. The items would all likely be about the same and the prices were that cheap. A Belgian waffle (which they did not serve the day we were there) was $3.99, pancakes and eggs $5.49, huge omelette with raisin bread $6.99 served with potatoes, bottomless coffee in a thermos on your table $1.50. Needless to say, our breakfast bill was like $15 (including tax) and we both had coffee and struggled to finish our breakfasts. We can rarely get out the door without paying about $25 -$30 with tax and tip. 

The food, was in very big quantities. That is a plus to the senior citizens, but is a little less important to me. I feel quality outshines quantity any day. The food was all just ok. Nothing special. Nothing to write home about. Everything was cooked appropriately and all, but I just was not wowed. The pancakes tasted much like bisquick and I am spoiled that I make my own from scratch and tend to expect that of restaurants. SG liked his ham and cheese omelette. The meat and cheese were generous and the omelette huge, as previously mentioned. I was not impressed... but I am not a ham and cheese fan personally. 

So, if you are in the area, are happy with a good (not great) breakfast in big quantity and cheap, I highly recommend this place. If you are a foodie, especially a breakfast foodie, check out another spot. If we had had more time, we would have. Now, this really seems to be the only breakfast place out near Surprise Stadium, so that is something to consider too. We may be back if we are tight on time and headed out that direction.

Arrived at Spectra on time and proceeded to registration. Was asked to pay my co-insurance upfront. I showed the registration person my remaining out of pocket maximum and explained that there were 2 other claims outstanding and that if I paid the coinsurance that I would be overpaying and would end up be due a refund from one of the providers. I asked politely to just bill me for the coinsurance once the dust was settled. She spoke with her supervisor and the request was denied. While the amount of money was insignificant it's about the point that this facility will not simply bill me after insurance has paid.  Looking back I should have walked out and let them explain to the surgeon and upper staff why they had their time wasted. Next time I'll choose a different facility. You should too.

If you enjoy a trashy strip mall bar with plenty of seniors this is your place!  Drinks are cheap enough but we're much too young for this atmosphere.  I may suggest my mom and her lady friends go here and pick up a nice man to bring back to the retirement community.

Worst service ever! They told us to come early and we waited for another 3 hours. Staff is very rude. And they don't really care about their patients. If you can have surgery somewhere else, I recommend to go to another place.

What a ripoff business, they charged for transmission fluid changed/washed, 7k miles later I had it checked and it was black. The transmission fluid was never changed!!!!  Nothing is wrong w/my transmission if you wonder if I don't know they totally overcharged me. The bill for services done was over $2k and I'm checking now to see if anything else was charged for services they did not perform.

I had a delicious french toast that had a tasty crunchy topping (maybe rice krispies) topped with bananas. The staff was very friendly and it is a great place to stop on the way to Surprise Stadium. The only downside was the very weak coffee.
Excellent and friendly service. Dr Nez is very friendly and knowledgable. He makes it very comfortable for the patient. Support staff is also world class and very attentive.

Love their weed and wax here, great quality for a really good price, been going here for years now !  Love this place! 
Happy smiling faces and always something great on sale. Do yourself a favor and try the 400mg brownie!! 
Thanks White Mountain. Staff your the greatest

Recently went to Bobbies Cafe and I have to say that I am impressed with the changes they have made it's been a long while since I have been there happen to be in the area decided to give it another try and the food and services were way better than I remember.

I have to say that the fish n chips meal is now one of my favorites nice big pieces of cod cooked just right practically melted in my mouth they give a good amount of food and for the price you just cant beat that my kid's had the kids meal chicken tender meal with fries they ate every piece of the food witch hardly ever happens.

While we we were waiting for our food the manager came to our table and welcomed us to bobbies was very friendly making sure we had all of drinks and gave the kids some coloring pages too pass the time  overall I was very impressed with the food staff and new management and my when I got my check I couldn't believe how cheap it was very affordable prices I will definitely be going back maybe next time it will be for their breakfast!!!!!

I will not be going back to Essential Eyecare. I was there in August and ordered 2 pairs of expensive glasses. I was not given an itemized statement of what the charges were for when the glasses were ordered. I was only given a tape with the total charged to my charge card. When I asked for an itemized statement I was told I would receive it when my glasses came in. That is a bad business practice. A customer should know exactly what they are paying for before the purchase and not after it's already been charged! When I received the itemized statement I discovered I was charged $25 for a frame warranty. If I would have been made aware of this charge I would not have purchased the glasses. Of course, they claim I was told this but I was not. Shady billing process.

Crooked conman.  I paid josh sneed 425 for roof and interior drywall repair.  I was too busy to check his work so I paid him up front.  Huge mistake blocked my phone number and never answered my calls to finish work. Dishonest loser. Needs to be arrested asap.
I highly recommend Spectra Eye Institute. Everyone was friendly and very professional. Everything was explained to me and all went very well.

Come with a damn book and be ready to wait!! Second and last time here, the wait time is crazy and the customer service needs a lot of work- the bud tenders are pretty good once you get to one but the lady at the desk is just plain awful!!

was given a strain recommendation to help muscle tension and pain and it works beautifully . 
The people at the counter definitely know their strains. I recommend white mountain dispensary for all your medical needs
Ohh yeah.  Great place to get your grub on.   Just talk to Benny.   He will hook you up.   Try it for your self.

Just secured a spot here. It was a last minute rental with lots of last minute decisions. The process was quick and easy.  From first impressions, the place is well kept and monitored. Thanks, Chris S.

We found the perfect place for Friday fish fry at Memo's Bistro. The fish was delicious with an awesome batter. The potatoes and coleslaw were exactly how we like them. Our server Kaitlyn kept our plates and beverages full. Price was very fair. We'll be back each Friday. Sincerely, Karen &  Art (Karts) Huseonica, Sun City

I had called Bell on Christmas Eve, I was in Sun City West visiting my Mom.
When we  had returned home and the Heating system was not working. I was giving  a 2 hour time frame.  In 15 minutes Jeff the Tech called and said he'd be there in 15 minutes. I had outstanding service. The problem was very minor but a few adjustments and everything was ok.
Bell Heating went "above and beyond the call of Duty"!

I visited Monty's on my way out of the state.. Once I stepped inside I'd wished I wasn't leaving and that I owned an SUV instead of a 2 door sedan... They have so many amazing things that I wish I could have purchased. The ladies there were very friendly and helpful. Was greeted promptly when I entered the store and felt very welcome. If I ever decide to move back to AZ I will definitely stop in and purchase a few things.

Today was my first time in this place - burger was awesome!  So I took spouse back in during evening hour for the all you can eat fish.  Slaw was outa sight good.  Fries were crispy & fresh.  The fish was good but tasted as though it was frozen, not fresh.  It was good but not a Wow.  

It was crowded & busy.  The gentleman, I assume he was the owner, made sure he spoke to each and every person in the place.  It was pouring down rain....he & his awesome staff went above and beyond to make everyone comfortable and safe.  I am somewhat handicapped & he was genuinely concerned about my welfare, we appreciated that.  The parking lot really sucks, hard to get into & out and double whammed by the flood from the rain.    But you gotta try this place!  Awesome place to eat and very reasonable.

Staff was polite but looked like they had been working hard all day.   

Place is old I had the ribs which was 'ok', and wings.  Wings were good!

They do all you can eat fish fridays and all you can eat ribs on sundays.

Very Americanized Filibertos level Mexican food. Everything is absolutely drowning in cheese to hide the rather bland flavors. Prices were average for cheap Mexican food. The salsa was terrible: tasted like tomato sauce poured directly from the can and mixed with way too much oregano, absolutely bizarre. Service was friendly and fast.

In Peoria for the weekend from KY. Benny's was suggested by resort staff member. WOW what a delight. I had the Mexican burger and it was delicious. My GF had Korean tacos and they were equally delicious. Great little restaurant with very affordable prices. Benny's would be a weekly dining option if I lived here.

4 stars because they showed and fixed issue (replaced capacitor) within 2 hours. About 10 minute actual fix.. Much props for that.  Service dude was great.  Happy they didnt tell me I needed a whole new unit.   Was not so happy to find out after that the capacitor costs under $30.  I was charged around $300 for everything.  Again happy to have AC running so quickly and was really ready to praise this company.  Still grateful but can't help but feel a little red..  Not burned.  But will not blindly automatically call here again.  But much respect for prompt summer AC service.

We have done business with Bell A/C for years. Dealing with Dan Jeff and Mike we have never been disappointed. Every time I've needed them I was more than satisfied , I've referred them about a dozen times. I'm always cautious on recommending an AC company due to if things are extreme it can be very expensive. Over half of my referrals were second opinions as we are in the real estate business and when people are quoted thousands of dollars they call us to make sure they're not getting taken advantage of. EVERY SINGLE person I've referred to them for a second opinion has called me back and thanked me. We refer a lot of contractors and not only has this been the best air conditioning company we've dealt with but out of all our contractors we've had the most positive feedback from those we referred to Bell AC.
Great atmosphere and solid BLT with an egg on it... We didn't bowl this time but I can't wait to come back for a few strikes. Very friendly staff/waitress! Thanks for a wonderful breakfast memos!

I recommend buying any appliance from this store over any chain store. This is a classy and independent business. The service and experience there is fast and intelligent. The Vent-A-Hood I ordered from them years ago still operates like new and still looks new. I plan on returning in the future should I do remodeling again. A very tardy thanks for the excellent product!

Have eaten here a few times thanks to the friend who recommended it. I have always gotten the hamburger and fries. Hamburger has the grill smoke flavor and the fries are crisp on the outside and creamy inside. Shared this order with my girlfriend and our hunger was satisfied. Weight Watchers trick. Has outdoors dining also.
Great place with great FINDS ! Super nice people, too ! Love that place !

Alll food is fresh and delicious. We will come back many times for breakfast, lunch and dinner. I had rosemary, garlic chicken and my husband had the shrimp dinner. Both dinners excellent. Price very reasonable. Service outstanding.

John the owner is the best!  Always friendly, anxious to please and will try to accommodate any dietary restrictions.  Best burgers ever, crisp fries, pulled pork is terrific.  He's just added calamari and makes his own dipping sauce.  I love it.  Our favorite whether eating in or takeout.  Can't recommend this place enough!
Still 5 stars. Got a hot dog for the first time and it changed my life. If you like Chicago dogs, try it Polish style. So good!

Had breakfast there this morning.  Ordered 2 scrambled eggs, hashbrowns & bacon.  The bacon was not eatable.  I tried 1 piece but couldn't stand the taste. 2 eggs was more like 1.  Sourdough toast was good.   Staff was friendly and attentive even though they were very busy.  There were at least 2 tables of 15+ each.

Contrary to the last poster....the sign in the picture clearly says "Bennys".  It was prob changed w/ the new ownership.  Based on the review on Blogger from the Arizona Burger Blog...this burger was rated well!  Here is the link:  http://azburgerblog.blogspot.com/2009/10/bennys-burgers-bbq.html


They also have Online Ordering!  Great for local business people that are time strapped and want their order ready when they arrive or for take out!

This owner also knows a thing or two about good eats!  I know from experience!

As far as Starbucks go, this one sucks. I went in and placed a coffee order. The bearded idiot behind the counter proceeds to tell me what they don't have instead of telling me they can just go ahead and brew the coffee I'm asking for, which is decaf. A coffee business that has no decaf coffee available is like an ice cream shop without vanilla ice cream. Went to NY West Bakery and had my coffee and a muffin. Beats the dried out, crappy bakery products Starbucks try's to pass off.

I went in looking for a meaningful gift for my good friend and her daughter, (5).  She had just delivered her baby, (32weeks), still born.  Art has been so healing for me; I wanted to share this with them.  

I knew I wanted a Winsor & Newton Cotman Watercolor Pocket Box and painting journal for the mom, but I wasn't sure for the daughter.  I picked out cheap watercolors and a cheap journal.  The guy who worked there asked me a few questions about why I was buying and who I was buying for, then he asked if he could make a suggestion.

He suggested a watercolor set that was cheaper than the Windsor, but comparable in quality.  (I can't remember the name.) The colors were so vibrant!  He also helped me find the perfect art journal that would be able to handle watercolor.

I thoroughly appreciated the suggestion, and my friend even noticed the quality in her daughter's set.  She even explained to her daughter that it wasn't like the other cheap watercolor sets she already had.  

I really wanted the gift to convey my love, and it did just that.  

Thank you!
Asked for a Don Draper style haircut. Did it well with a good length to play around with. For $11, will definitely return.
Very disappointed.   Two carne asada tacos with Pico and guac. Sounded good but meat was cold and flavorless.  Pico and guac were flavorless.
Don't underestimate the power of being hungry !! It's reminiscent of times ago - but good taste !! If yr craving burgers & fries / bbq & onion rings --- stop on by!
This place is good. The owner and staff are friendly and the food is always consistent.

They are the best and beyond compare. 
I have 7 dogs frome a chihuahua to a great Dane and I would not trust anyone other than Diamonds in the Ruff  to groom my furry friends.

I'm no stranger to McDonald's and I understand that I should not expect much in the way of customer service, however this particular McDonald's may be trying to set a record for underwhelming customer service.
Placed an order at the counter for 4 sandwiches and 3 orders of Chicken Nuggets - to go.  After 20 minutes of watching others come and go, I inquired.  Was told "we're working on it".  When the order finally came up, no beverages with the nugget happy meals - I caught that one.  Got home the large order of Nuggets was missing so I returned to the restaurant.  Explained the shortage, showed my receipt.  After a 2-3 minute "employee huddle" I was handed a box of nuggets.  Not a word said, no sauce, no cursory "sorry", nothing, nada, zip.  So now I get home and 2 of us are eating after everyone else is finished and at least one of us has a cold lunch.  More often than not, this franchise continues to screw up.  I kinda feel sorry for a store that's this inept or mismanaged, but I have not choice but to just say "no" to this location.

Burgers are big with fresh veggies. Good flavor and made to order.  Nice hardy fries.  Clean and employees are friendly.   

Don't sit under the TV it will feel like everyone is staring at you.

We priced the same machines from Trane with four contractors for apples to apples comparison.  Bell was the least expensive of the four, with the top two being quite close to one another  except Bell also included duct cleaning in their proposal.  We stepped up to pretty sophisticated machines and control devices with variable speed components everywhere we could so it wasn't an expensive exercise to buy two sets.  The work was done on time and as proposed and works exactly as expected.

From a little boy up my dad had always taken us to this barber shop . I have always enjoyed going here because the owner JJ is a very polite person he always makes it a point to talk to his customers and engage them in a congenial conversation. The haircuts he gives are exceptional and the atmosphere is wonderful! This is an old time barber shop so if you are looking for a small town type barber this is the place to go!

Overpriced cars with hidden problems, this is a Lemon lot! He buys dealer trade ins that are fraught with issues and then sells em for inflated prices. 
I bought a car from them and they promised to warranty it but later said the sale was as-is. However, every vehicle sold in Arizona, regardless if claimed to be sold as-is, is covered by a 15 day 500 mile warranty. 
Shortly thereafter I had to replace a coil pack, the check engine light came on, the transmission and engine began having major problems. It would cost thousands to repair. They refused to do anything to help and claimed they never gave a warranty. 
I filed a lawsuit in small claims court for $3500.
Be aware that consumer rights allows a person to sue a dealership if they fail to comply with Arizona's Used Car 15 day 500 mile implied warranty law. You can file a small claim for about $50 to sue for a max of $3500.

After two other A/C companies with 5 star ratings told me on 07/07/18 they were "too busy" to come evaluate my broken A/C at 7pm on a Saturday I was getting nervous.  My husband, my infant, and I just sat inside sweating with the 115 temps outside.... we considered staying in a hotel but shout out to Bell Air for coming out within 2 hours and fixing the problem.  It was a capacitor problem and yes the markup of the part replaced was way beyond market value but I realize companies need to make a profit and they were courteous, very timely, and fixed my problem on one of the hottest Saturday nights so far this year!  It was totally worth it to sleep in comfort in my own home!!! Would use again if needed.
I love this place and am grateful that I can take painting lessons from talented artists.  I have learned a lot and most of the supplies are priced very reasonably!

GREAT DENTIST!  Dr. Fox was recommended to me by several of my friends and neighbors.  True to their recommendation Dr. Fox has been the best.  I have seen him several times.  Recently I broke a front tooth in half and it couldn't be saved. Dr. Fox gave me several options and I chose getting an implant.  Wow the magic of modern dentistry.  In 2.5hrs beginning to end he pulled the tooth and gave me an implant and a new tooth.  Unbelievable!  More than that 3 days later he called to see how I was doing.  You can't go wrong by selecting Dr. Fox and Fox Family Dental.  BTW I actually live most of the year in CA but I get my dental work done when I'm in AZ.  He's that good.

My wife and I were looking for a new place to try for lunch and, after reading the great reviews for Benny's, decided to try it. Pretty disappointed. My teriyaki mushroom burger was just ok. The bun and mushrooms were fresh, but the patty was very overcooked. My wife's BBQ ribs were just ok too. Sauce was tasty, but the meat was very dry and overcooked. Could hardly eat them. The fries that we both had with our meals were nothing special as well. On the positive side, the customer service was very friendly. But the food was so bad that I doubt we'll be going back.

Just moved to the neighborhood so we want to search out all the independents. We saw the reviews and knew this had to be one of the first stops.

To be honest, I don't understand the reviews. 

The place is small but had a steady stream of customers. We took a table but had to move as the smell of the trash was overwhelming. Which explained why those tables were the only ones open.

Then the flies.  I understand it was a warm December day but propping open the door just lets in flies. I kept swatting them away waiting for our food, deciding if the food was that good, we'd just do takeout the next time.

I ordered the Hawaiian chicken sandwich combo and my hubs got the pulled pork. They brought out the sandwiches first as the fries weren't ready. Mine came in a plastic basket. His was just wrapped to go. No basket. Then my fries came out. Then finally his. Timing apparently isn't everything.

My sandwich was.....really not all that great.  The chicken breast was pressed to about 1/4" thick and overcooked. The bacon was burnt black from the flat grill with a press on it. Both bun halves were burnt black.  Not grilled to toast.  burnt. I spent enough years as a cook in mom's restaurant to know the difference.  The fries.....came in a paper boat that had traces of something else in it probably from handling other foods. And they use some off-brand ketchup that was sour to taste. I was not a happy diner.

My hubs didn't fare much better. His pulled pork was moist but bland, he couldn't taste a good rub or smoke. It came with a bit of sauce. He did ask for more sauce and they gave him some which wasn't bad along with some Chicago neon relish. He ordered the sweet potato fries and they were the run-of-the-mill fries. His bun was burnt as well so maybe that's the standard

I debated going two stars but the place was busy. Maybe we hit a bad day. I am willing to give it the benefit of the doubt. But in this day and age when there are loads of burger joints to choose from, we will keep looking.

Visited this place after seeing they offer flounder fish, my favorite. The place is old looking and the inside smells of old nasty cooking grease, really needs to be updated and a thorough cleaning. The flounder was horrible, nasty tasting, no fish taste at all only the breading and mush, no structure to the fish at all. Will not return unless the place does a complete clean or remodel.

Been here before and Bennys always delivers great service and food. 
Brought my nephew here for the first time and he had the double burger with bacon and cheese. He was more than pleased, he loved his burger and said it was one of best he's had.  
Bennys is a great place because of the service as well as the food. We'll definitely be back for more delicious food.

Four stars because I've only tried the burgers here and not the BBQ or anything else on the menu. I went here today with my one year old son for lunch with my grandmother and the place was PACKED! We moved through the line pretty quickly but it stayed consistently busy. (This was at lunchtime. 12pm) the owner I'm guessing took our order and said we could choose any size drink we wanted and they would find us where ever we sat, to deliver our food. The burger was great and big for being a single and the fries were perfectly done. Some crispy but not over done. Over all this place was good but what really stood out to me was that in the midst of the busy rush of customers the owner took time to bring my son a child's size ice cream to our table free of charge. It's the little things like that, that make these kinds of restaurants great!!!!

Ordered a roastbeef sandwich and got a philly beef steak and took it back and waited another 10min for them to remake the same sandwich I had returned...Never again will I go here till you have robots who work for you.

This is a cool little neighborhood burger joint. The food is really tasty, competitively priced and comes out in a hurry. They also have daily specials which make an already good burger a little more special. Their fries are cooked perfectly! Not those mushy, barely fried fries. These are nice and crispy on the outside and perfect for dunking in catsup. 
The counter help are always very friendly and helpful. 
I'm glad this place is in my neighborhood!
Don't pass this place up.  The food is fantastic!

Horrible service!! Fraud for sure!! Extra amounts billed to Insurance 
hippa violations you can hear everything thru the rooms. The office girls are very unprofessional as well as the doctor. She belittled me several times. I will never go back to her or her office

The food is made fresh just for you and you definitely feel like a valued customer!  Staff is always incredibly helpful and friendly, in fact they are always looking for a way to go the extra step to make your experience the best it can be.
Nice mom and pop type shop. Had the pastrami, but it was a burger and pastrami. Pretty good. Onion rings and fried cheese curds. Tasty.  Give them try. Large menu selection.
Excellent as always! My favorite drink is iced vanilla latte but I've tried many. Service is awesome! Keep it up Starbucks! I've visited you from STL MO to Peoria AZ.
Very slow service and pricing is high for what you get and the pumpkin latte had a bad after taste had to dump it.
The worst atty I have ever spoken to and would not recommend him to anyone - he is rude and inconsiderate - needs to loose his license

Old school barbershop that provides over half a century of barber experience. Interesting atmosphere (military aircraft) that will provide many memories and stories. The barbers have traditional haircut skills and accel at them. If youre lookin for a lineup or patterns, try someone else. Cash only is the only con, but most "real" barbershops have and always will be cash only. Always happy with my cut.

I put "burgers" in my GPS and randomly picked a location nearby. I am happy that I ended up at Benny's. My husband got the triple burger and he said it was delicious. My pulled pork sandwich was really good! We will be back to Benny's for sure!

This burger shop is great. Since the new owners have taken over they have expanded the menu. The mango guacamole burger is excellent as well as the fried pickles. 
The service is always good and the food always comes out hot!

EVERYTIME I go to only THIS starbucks is my drink ALWAYS wrong! Then they argue with me because they made it right but it doesn't look correct AT ALL. Don't argue with your customers make them a new drink. 
I normally get a green tea lemonade, pretty simple right?! Well not for this store specifically is ALWAYS wrong with my drink and today I watched them make it. They NEVER even measured my drink in the shaker how they are supposed to they just eye balled it into my cup, so it was also not shaken up how its supposed to be! This starbucks is the only one who CAN NOT get this SIMPLE drink down.

This place is a hidden local hot spot. The beef brisket sandwich was moist with the right amount of barbecue sauce and the Hawaiian chicken sandwich was delicious and something with a different taste. Definitely recommend for local BBQ

I would not recommend going to this car dealership. The so called owner, Mike, advertises cars online like an individual owner on craigslist but actually it's a business. The guy buys cars from dealerships and flips them at least that's what he says. Not only does he deceive you in that way but also states that the car is in Sun City making you believe that it is owned by an elderly person and details the car to make it look nice and shiny. As we were looking at the car and had an appointment while we were viewing the car the owner comes and tell us his sales guy took a deposit over the phone for someone else who drove the car earlier in the day but the owner told me I couldn't see the car until the afternoon. Then he admits he wanted to sell me the car himself instead. Crock of shit!!! I would never go here if I were you. Oh and the address he tells you to meet him at is different than the address in this posting but is the same place. Shady car sales..hiding address too.
Jose is a great guy and he and his wife serve up some delicious homemade authentic Mexican.  You won't be sorry you ate here!

Love this store!  The woman that runs it is soooo nice and gives detailed information about everything so I know I'm getting just the right item.  Not only is it good to see the paint colors in person, but the prices are better than the internet and no shipping!

This is the only place we ever consider when we board our dogs! Very clean and you can tell that everyone working there loves animals. We have never had an issue with our dogs not wanting to be taken back into the lodging area. They love it there, they are treated well and we love them!

Memo's took over the former La Petite Café in the Bell Rec Center building.  We have eaten there several times, and the food has always been good, though the menu is fairly limited.  The owner/manager (Christie) has always been very friendly and talkative and greets each customer individually.  She runs a tight ship as to service.  Our only poor experience was one Friday when she was not there and the two girls running the place took forever to serve the customers .  We waited 25 minutes for a simple dinner order and another 20-25 to get a takehome box and the bill.  Other than that one instance, whenever Christie is there, things are run well and the dining experience is excellent.
The restaurant is quite small (only seats about 40-50 people, and is located by the bowling alleys in the rec center, so it can get crowded at times, but we have always been able to get in.
We live quite close so we eat there often.

Best groomers ever! The owners are just amazing and make you and your furrbaby feel like family used to live in the area and recently moved about 40 minutes away and will continue to drive here for all my dogs grooming!! He looks perfect every time I pick him up and wags his tail like he has been at the spa all day  thanks Denise! You guys rock!

Love Bennys it's just  down the street. Everything is fresh and made on the spot be sure to give them time to have everything prepared this is not a fast food in and out. They need time to do their magic. Also everyone is very friendly.

Originally Posted 5/4/2013

*Under new management* 

I went a few times this month and I'm quite impressed with it's transformation from what it was before. It's under new management and new improvements are being done to the place that make it feel like a great place to eat at. 

Burgers are juicy and filling. They have several optional extras to add into your burger to customize how you want it, which I like... I had a Double Hickory Bacon Cheese Burger with fries and it was awesome! They have some others things to add like cheeses, sauces, or even a fried egg! Onion rings... fried zucchini... I've tried the medium hot wings.... they were surprisingly good! Ribs were good... BBQ sauce they use is really good! My boyfriend had the teriyaki burger, the pulled pork sandwich, and the works hot dog with fries... and he said he would definitely come back for it. Oh geez... almost forgot one of the best part... the milkshakes are DELICIOUS!!! Tons of flavors to mix and match... I tried all different mixtures chocolate/pineapple,  chocolate/peanut butter, strawberry/banana, and of course you can get vanilla, chocolate, jamocha, or whatever. This burger joint has such a variety... 

The staff is few, but nice. I think it's family owned. The new manger came around and greeted us to make sure everything we had was great. He mentioned that they'll be keeping the same menu, but will be adding more things to spice it up like sweet potato fries and a Hawaiian burger. I'm pretty excited!

well, I have only went there once, and since it is close to work I will try one more time. The pulled pork sandwiches might of been good, if they weren't left overs from yesterday. But the service is excellent, and I am hoping it was just a case of them making way too much meat for the Sunday crowd.

A nice family run business that aims to please.  Prices are on point and service impeccable.  A bonus is that they are near  my home~

Went on a Saturday when the "kids" were helping out..such a wonderful family.

Next time I will make an appointment.  But waiting was not a problem.  Nearby is an Ace Hardware, bread outlet and a consignment shop....

EVERYTIME I go to only THIS starbucks my drink is ALWAYS wrong! Then they argue with me because they made it right but it doesn't look correct AT ALL. Don't argue with your customers make them a new drink. 
I normally get a green tea lemonade, pretty simple right?! Well not for this store specifically is ALWAYS wrong with my drink and today I watched them make it. They NEVER even measured my drink in the shaker how they are supposed to they just eye balled it into my cup, so it was also not shaken up how its supposed to be! This starbucks is the only one who CAN NOT get this SIMPLE drink down

Not bad burger...nothing special but not bad.
Had a shake which was okay, too.
Prices are very good for what you get, and the help there is very willing to assist you with all your needs.
For a decent burger or whatever you want on their menu--for a good price--this is the place to go if you live in this area or find yourself over here.
Korean steak tacos, the bomb... Pot stickers, sooo good. They have a great variety... Hot dogs, burgers, wings, desserts, salads and ribs! Can't go wrong

Great place to eat! Fast service good food! 
Found this place while visiting and stopped by! 
Clean bathrooms too!

Wonderful!  I had my fill of assembly line dental clinics that try to sell you unnecessary services (root planing, would you believe!) and plant you in a room where the dentist breezes in for a few seconds.  The moment I walked into Dr. Fox's office I was treated like a human being.  Everyone is pleasant and attentive.  Dr. Fox went to great lengths to introduce himself to me the first time I was there.  Everyone is very professional and they all know their stuff.  Michael the hygienist is especially good, as others have said.  Never has anyone been so gentle to my sensitive mouth!  And Dr. Fox himself is tops!  He explains what needs to be done in clear understandable language -- and with a sense of humor!  I highly recommend Fox Family Dental for everyone, especially if you've been depersonalized elsewhere.

I will never use a place like this. I called to try and get an idea of how much cremation arrangements would be for my 23 week stillborn son. I was obviously still grieving as I was speaking to the man (in no way a gentleman) on the phone, unable to hold back tears. I mention something to him that I was told by the hospital and he LAUGHED at me! I lost my son. How dare you laugh at me. I have never been treated with such a lack of compassion. I would avoid these unprofessional people if at all possible.

Good food. Fast courteous service.  Very hospitable and just good food.  I had the Chicago polish dog to be 'different' but it was very good and the fries were yummy. Will come back to try out the menu with friends. :) not a lot of seating but we had no issues finding seats. Small place to grab a quick bite or stay a lil longer enjoying your meal or for take out.

I loathe you oh AAS for you tooketh all my finances.

Okay so I gave willingly.  Bad art store....bad.  Awesome for book binding supplies not to mention staff full of knowledge and free tips.  If they don't have the stuff, they get it shipped to their store from other locations in town without cost to me.  Other art materials seem a teensy bit pricey, but they give discounts to artists (and teachers).

I really want to like this place. The food was a solid 8 out of 10. I tried the pastrami burger and the chili cheese fries, my husband had a regular burger and fries. They use seasoning salt on the french fries which were nice and crispy. The cheese and chili are canned. The chili I can understand but I was kind of hoping for melted cheese. The place was packed!  The man at the counter was really friendly and helpful even bringing a small container of his guacamole mango salsa for me to try. The negatives are it smells greasy, like old grease, and I'm pretty sure our clothes will smell when we leave.  It was strong enough that we never got used to it, we continued to smell it throughout the entire lunch. It also doesn't appear to be very clean. The chairs backs are dirty looking and sticky. The tabletops and all the condiments had a sticky feel to them as well which could be from the amount of grease that is probably in the air.

I had been going to the same dentist from my first appointment until I was 26 years old. Then I got terrible, God awful toothache and my dentist said they could see me next week. I could barely stand to breathe it was so painful. Then, a friend recommended Fox Family Dental to me. I called on my lunch break and they had me in by the end of the day. I won't go back to my old dentist! Every time I visit, call, or need something dental related, I have had a pleasurable experience- and I have an irrational fear of the dentist! That has to say something for the amazing people at Fox Family.
Awesome authentic Mexican. Jose is a true gentleman, the food is the best!
Food was perfect can't say enough about the service. Dealt directly with owner . Great people.

I don't get up to this part of the valley much, but when I do this place will be on the lunch short list.
If you have a hankering for a good burger hit up this place. BBQ is not bad but Burgers R Us best fits this place.
Staff and owner are friendly and seem to appreciate your business.
Food is fresh and cooked to order Yea Baby!
Only fault I could find is parking. Like any good lunch place it's busy around noon and you might have to get creative when parking.

I need some drapes hemmed and a pair of shorts repaired. The repair to the shorts was difficult to say the least, but Kim did an excellent job and and I could not be happier. They are friendly and I will use them as needed and recommend them.  A nice shop with friendly seamstresses. A pleasure to do business with.

Ron Thornblade is hands down the best property manager I've ever worked with. He is extremely trustworthy, responsible and has profound integrity rarely seen in today's business world. He is honest and hardworking, and I would highly recommend him for any property management needs.

Prices are ridiculously high here.  I get that better bikes should cost more, but come on!

Service was lousy.  Walked in and was not greeted.  Was in the store long enough, and it was not busy.  No one asked if I needed help.  Aside from that, I felt if I did need help it was going to be the "know it all jerk ahole" kind of help.  

Have you ever walked into a business and just felt immediately, "THIS PLACE SUCKS?"  You catch a bad vibe, isn't appealing to the senses- it stinks.  That was my experience here.  

I've seen some of the same biking equipment at Walmart for about half the price.

This new Starbucks sucks. The drive thru ALWAYS has such a long line. The service is terrible. My order is the same everytime, a green tea frappacino with non fat milk , no whip cream and an extra scoop of matcha powder. As you can see my order is very very detailed and each time I ordered it they MESSED UP! Oh and let me just add that the parking lot was also terrible, its full of pot holes!

my first time there today!!! 

omg best hamburger i've ever eaten.. i had a mexican burger combo....great flavor, great service 

i am definitely going back as often as possible
Called at 6pm on a Sunday and our air was fixed by 9:30!!!! Really impressed with their prompt and professional service.
Dr. Fialkoff is a young and very thorough dentist. He also has a great sense of humor. His staff is professional and efficient.

I really didn't think this place was anything special. Their burgers taste like a Burger King burger. Everything was good, but nothing stood out as amazing or above average. I wouldn't go out of my way for it, but if I was in the neighborhood and hungry I might stop by again. For Sun City, this is definitely an amazing place because there is NO good food in that town!

I am a RAVING FAN of this restaurant. Their food is so great I had them cater my 60th birthday party. Delicious wings, ribs, buttered rolls and cole slaw with an asian bite to it. The owner John is a great guy that will do anything for you. He loaned me some racks to hold the food and the sterno burners to keep the food warm. Very reasonable prices. You really should try their Italian sausage sandwich, Italian beef, Its all good. Five stars for Benny's Burgers and BBQ.

Absolutely love this Starbucks.  The baristas are terrific, the Manager, Jelly is excellent.  Often times, my tea drink is handed to me before I pay.  I love getting to know the baristas by name and they take the time to know me.  I pretty much know many Starbucks locations ( airports, other cities when I traveled a lot.. I always look for the closest one) and this Starbucks ranks up there in my top  5 as far as I'm concerned.   [I was so happy to see this one being built within 1.5 miles from where I live.  It's a great walk].  :-)

Thank you Bell air conditioning. Mike did a great job today servicing our fan and condenser unit. He was patient. He took his time. It was clear he understood how to speak to clients who don't understand the technology of an air conditioning heating unit. I would recommend Bell to my family and friends. I've had Mike to the house last season.

We've been taking our cats there for over 2 years and Denise & Gill are fabulous with them. Denise is fast and both of them are extremely nice. We will keep taking our cats there for as long as we have them. If we had dogs, we would take them too.
Great people to work with and they're prices are reasonable.

This place is amazing! They have the best tacos I've ever had. They also have some amazing shakes. I would recommend the Korean tacos they had just the right amount of spice. The service is great and the wait was minimal.
A special thank you to Regency Mortuary in our time of need and compassion with the death of our Son Ryan.
Hot fresh food pleasant staff quick service made our dinner enjoyable. We will be making this a regular stop when we're out.

This location is absolutely terrible at paying attention to your order . I have tried it 5x with high hopes each time and each time they failed to get my order right. If you're in the area, I highly recommend the Starbucks inside the frys location. I am highly disappointed with this new location .

I like this place. I've purchased a couple appliances here, and I have not been disappointed once.

I think it's important to keep the mom-and-pop places in business. Chances are, the same appliances you'll find at the big box stores can be found and purchased here as well. And best of all: you may even get a better price. 

Delivery/installation available, if needed, for an extremely reasonable price.

Overall, I've purchased appliances from the big box stores before, but each time it's something different: long wait times, expensive delivery and installation, damaged merchandise, or an extreme hassle when it comes time to cancel an order or send something back. Never again if I can help it!

I'm glad I found Associated Appliance Sales. I will definitely be back!

I used to be a regular customer here. Recently, I stopped in for lunch. The only employee present was the cook. She was chatting with a friend at the counter. She ignored me for five minutes before taking my order. Since she made me feel like a nuisance, I will be taking my business where it will be appreciated. Que lastima...adios.

This is a tiny ACE Hardware.  We had gone in looking for some lumber.  Unfortunately they carry very little lumber.  There were some small cuts in the front.  Otherwise, I had asked an employee who indicate you can ask the people at the keys window and they have a limited supply but probably not any 2x4s. 

The employees were very friendly and willing to help.

On March 12, 2018, I put a contract on a house in Drive, Sun City, AZ 85351.  My agent is Brandon Tague of Home Smart and the sellers agent was Kurt Mayer of Coldwell Bankers.  We had the inspection done the next week and found there were some major issues, especially the electricity.  My agent reported to me that Mr. Mayer said he would have his handyman go through the list and fix everything.  I said no.

We sent him the BINSR stating that the handyman could fix everything else, but not the electrical.  For the electrical I wanted a licensed electrician to repair everything.  They signed the BINSR agreeing to fix everything the way I wanted.  

On March 22 I met my agent in the house to have some time to get some bids.  On the counter there was a receipt for me to pay to have all the electrical faceplates changed to white and rollers.  I paid the $125 to do this.  But as I was looking at the receipt I realized that the person doing the work was not a licensed contractor.  I asked my agent to look into this.  Later in the day he talked to Mr. Mayer who after yelling at my agent, hung up on him after telling him the handyman fixing my electrical was just as good.  He seemed to have hoped he wouldn't get caught and that the handyman was not licensed as he and the seller agreed to on the BINSR.  He finally called may agent  back and asked him we could resolve the issue.  I said there was no way except to have a licensed electrician of my choosing come to check out the work that had already been done.  We agreed and so on March 28, we all met Rogoz Electric at the house.  

Once Rogoz opened up everything, we found out that all of the electric had been done wrong and not up to code.  When aluminum wires are connected to new outlets, they must be done using a Cu/Al splicer which is a purple connector and requires a special tool that only elrctricians seem to have.  Otherwise the house is at risk for fire.  While we were there Mr. Mayer asked what the connection was so he could get them online cheaper.  Then after receiving the quote of over $2000 from Rozog, Mr. Mayer said he would try to find a cheaper bid.  I said no, that after trying to go the cheaper way with his handyman, I didn't trust him and we had to use the company I wanted.  We were all in the kitchen and Mr. Mayer went into a yelling fit at me.  He told me the owner wouldn't agree and that I should go "pound sand" among other not so nice things.   He was just irate and the yelling at me continued.  Within a half an hour of this tirade he texted my agent saying I had to pull out of the contract so he could get it back on the market. I had no intention of pulling out of a house. I wanted the house, had put in the money for all the inspections and all.  And we reminded him that there was a signed contract that he was in breach of by not going with a licensed electrician in the first place.  

At that point, my agent started CCing the broker at Coldwell banker, Rick about what was going on.  Next thing, we knew, Mr. Mayer was agreeing to use my electrician to fix everything.

I have to say I have never had such unethical, abusive and unprofessional behavior from an individual who represents such a major company. I'm horrified that this agent would have put me at risk by doing all the electrical incorrectly.   I'm also wondering if the seller ever knew he had to pay twice for the same work just because the agent decided a signed contract didn't need to be followed.

Bell Air Conditioning consistently comes through anytime we have had any AC issues.  2 of the times that they come to the rescue were during emergencies and they have proven that we can always count on Dan and his great staff even with such short notice(when it matters most)!

Great prices, better than timely service, & trustworthy staff--who else out there can beat that combo?!

I love this! Theres somthing about a place that does certain things and does them right without trying to be fancy about everything. You want a burger you get a great burger, you want some great chicken wings they got them here to, and for a great price. Its a place you can always go back to. My wife and I have been here 3 or 4 times and the owner knows what we like and how we like it and it seems he is like that with everyone. Once you go you wont regret it. Its everything you want in a restaurant. Its not a chain so get your tounge ready for some real food.

I've been here 4 times since moving into the neighborhood. My first experience was great. 2nd and 3rd, not so great because Levi waited on me both times. He is a young kid who seems to be on a power trip. I found the exchanges very unpleasant. He was rude, made unreasonable demands and is off-putting. I will avoid him & this store like the plague, in the future. Second visit there he repeatedly informed me that "every cut" he made on a piece of acrylic I purchased somewhere else was going to cost me $3 for each cut. I said I understood but needed it done. He then repeated himself at least 3 more times as though he was trying to discourage me from having it done. Each time I said I understood, was happy to pay and wanted it trimmed regardless. Eventually he did it but I felt he did it under protest & charged me 3 times the price an older colleague did a few days prior. Third visit: went back and bought the acrylic sheet from them to avoid any attitudes. I watched him interfere with the pleasant older gentleman who was helping me and took the job from him just as he was getting ready to cut it for me. Levi then came around and asked if I had paid for it yet. I said no, I assumed I would pay once it was cut. He said I needed to pay first. I said ok and started to walk to front to pay but he stopped me & handed me the sheet of acrylic to carry up front to pay for it, despite my hands being full of outdoor lights I was also planning to buy. I asked if I had to carry it up front just to bring it right back again & his answer was yes, without any offer to assist me with all the items already in my arms plus this large piece of acrylic I now have added. I was so angry now after 2 unpleasant encounters that I turned back to him to ask if he was the manager (since he was trying to act like a "boss") & he responded no. At that moment I was so angry I was going to report him to the manager but eventually cooled down enough to forget about him. Once he cut the acrylic for me he handed me the 2 pieces in the requested size. I asked if there was a leftover piece since the original piece was much larger than needed. He responded "well, if I you want it, I can get it". His response and facial expression conveyed he thought I was being cheap and petty by asking for the full item that he insisted I had to pay for, prior to cutting it. Strike 2 for me and I just won't deal with him anymore, so I'll avoid going. He is not an asset to this location
