This review is based off a house we purchased about a little over a year ago! When I was transferred to Phoenix in 2010, we were on a mission to find and move in a house right away. After going through a few people, and driving back and forth from SoCal for two weeks. I met Jason Buttons!! I called him on a Saturday, he was able to see me and the wife the same day. That was the start of a great relationship! We must have seen over twenty homes in a matter of two weeks! He answered and stood by us every step of the way. Even when I had to start my job, and the wife and daughter had to stay behind for a month until we got a home. He was always there for us!! Even to this day, we keep in touch and became friends! Great guy, if you ever need to sell or buy. He is the guy for you!!

Unfortunately a prime example of why it's tough to shop local. 

My first visit was so so. Service left a lot to be desired, I mostly felt like I was interrupting when asking for help or checking out.

My second visit was worse. I needed to return a pen which I found totally dry when I got home. They however will not take pen returns (or exchanges which is what I wanted). Apparently there is a sign but my frustration comes down to having a fake return policy. I am not sure what's actually returnable.

I want to support this local place but I can't support attitude and lack of standing behind their merchandise. I'm sure I'll get some response about overhead and cost of running a business but the reality is that if you don't stand by it just say no returns and move on.

My boyfriend and I came to eat here 10 minutes before they closed and the owner kindly let us come in and eat. He had great customer service. He recomendad us the spicy bacon mango burger and the Chicago hotdog both were really good but we personally preferred the burger it was really tasty. You couldn't taste the mango in it too much which was perfect for us. Next time we plan on trying the polish hotdog which I think is the one with grilled onions on top. That one looked really good. I recommend people to come eat here if you're craving a different style burger or hotdog.
Big shout out to bell I as they know I recommend them to anyone great company I'm very happy good job guys thank you !!!!!!!!!!  You guys are THE BEST !!

I'm from out of town, saw the reviews for AP nails and gave it a try. I get a gel. Annie did the gel and it was by far the worst job I have ever received. I get them rounded. They were all shaped different, the color didn't completely cover all the nail but did get into my cuticles & fingers plus the top coat was all over my fingers. Don't waste your $25?
Took off a star for using styrofoam and plastic. Authentic Mexican soda and food. Salsa bar is free, up charge for chips. This is a good, inexpensive  place to stop if you happen to be in the area.

This is a nice no frills sort of burger place. I got a double cheeseburger combo. Cheese was extra (70 cents more for mine) so my total was 10.30. I would say this is in the 5 guys category. The prices are better here but there aren't a bunch of add ons. It's a patty, lettuce, tomato, onion. You can add your condiments.

The fries were good, thick and crispy with some seasoned salt. They have a triple cheeseburger for 6.29 lol. I don't usually eat fries and soda so that might be an option if I'm hungry enough. 

The place was pretty busy and service was par with 5 guys. There are lots of other things available here but I reviewed it as a burger spot today.

Gotta give them props on the name though ;)

A group of 20 of us had an excellent Sunday Buffet Breakfast this morning.  Began with an Omelette station. The Chef was Rock N Rolling using 3 omelette pans at a time. The omelette was fluffy and delicious.  Also, choice of bacon, sausage, hash browns, biscuits & gravy. Chicken Fajitas, assorted pastries, fresh fruit salad, and deserts. Service was very good.
I believe price was $9.99.
We will definitely be back..
Job well done!
Excellent food. The Italian sausage sandwich is very good. Thumbs up from our entire lunch party.

Annie and Peter are both wonderful and very attentive. My wife gets her nails done here all the time. She won't even consider anyone else. I have been having them do my feet since my diabetes has gotten so bad. They take great care of me.

Jeff came on Sunday morning and did a temporarily fix on our A/C in 110 degree heat.  New A/C and furnace were installed by JJ and Ruben a week later.  We are completely satisfied with the professionalism these young men displaced.  Cannot make enough positive comments about the whole experience.

Great burgers and awesome customer service! Very friendly staff. Cleared our food, refilled our ketchup, asked us how we were doing, and gave my 13 month old son a free cup of ice cream. I recommend over other fast food chains.

My experience with Arizona art supply has been a very interesting ride!!  I was a art student taking lessons every Wednesday for 3 hours for over 9 yrs!! My whole class bought all our supplies canvas,oil paint,thinner,and so much more!!   The owners and managers are very difficult to please!  Very limited service, and the current manager has been sooo difficult since Jacky  started working in the Sun City location!! We (8 people plus a teacher had classes on Tuesday and Wednesday each week !  Arizona Art Supply asked our teacher,Marcy Perrier, to leave after teaching at the store for over 10 yrs!  The owners asked Marcy to leave and then informed me and my classmates that we could no longer welcome in the store!! The current mgr. Jacky is unfriendly to all customers that come in the store!!! Sad very sad !! I was also informed that if I posted on Yelp their attorney would sue us!! Unbelievable!!

My wife and I ate at Benny's for the first time tonight and loved it. We both had burgers. I had a Swiss, bacon and fried egg burger with fries and a Coke. Very tasty for both. Our new favorite burger joint. They also have BBQ brisket, brats, Italian beef, and so much more. We will be trying everything on the menu. Thankfully they serve Coke products. Comfort food at its finest.

Love Annie and Peter ! They have been doing my nails for 11 years. They used to have a nail salon in Surprise but moved to Bell and Boswell Blvd. I will happily drive further to come to them. They always do a great job and understand what you want. I have never had a problem with my nails and I know if I ever did, they would take care of it with no argument. Always a happy customer! :)

I've just moved to Surprise from the U.K, and took JJ's based on the recommendations on here. A bit of a trip for a hair cut, but what a hair cut it was....JJ is a proper gent, does an awesome haircut, quickly, and for a bargain price - and the whole time I got to watch a western on the telly! The decor is also spectacular (you'll have to go in and see for yourself!) and I personally will be back for more, as long as I'm in the area.

Thumbs up from me.

Great little place to enjoy a great burger and drink. Friendly service. A decent menu with a variety of items to enjoy. The food arrived quickly and was hot and ready to eat. The staff was friendly and you can easily note the great customer relationship. The server knew a few customers by name. Highly recommend enjoying some grub here.

McDonalds in Sun CIty, Bell Rd and Boswell. The Hi-C Orange Drink has out of order sign, for days. Managers say they don't know, indifferent, bored when we ask. No idea.
No outside handle on the back door for months. This is sooo inconvenient.,.
Told manager. No interest.

Very prompt and thorough service. I actually used them again for a second job that was also well done. I highly recommend.

CL

Great service. The staff was friendly and helpful. Quickly offering and bringing a high chair to our table. Food was delicious. They even brought small condiments cups filled with ice cream for our children.

Great Window Washers!!!!  I called Jim at 8:00am and he arrived at 11am (he said he'd try to fit me in- 1 day before Thanks Giving).  After quoting a fair price: he and his crew cleaned, removed screens, cleaned screens, checked for smudges, and washed some more!!  

Jim personally (with my request) would walk back to windows they'd cleaned to look them up and down for smudges, then make sure everything was perfect.  

You can't go wrong with these guys!!

I called Bell because of all of the great 5 star reviews posted here. My AC was not blowing cold air into the house and it was late in the day around 6:00 p.m. I called Bell and they were very courteous and responsive and had someone out to my home by 8:00 p.m. This is the reason for the 3 stars. 

I was hoping it was nothing too major, hopefully something like the capacitor and was fully prepared to pay upwards of $400.00 in order to get it fixed that night knowing full well that a capacitor costs no more than 20 bucks. Hey, I understand companies are going to mark up their prices and that is the price you pay for someone to come right away and get your home cool after hours. 

It turned out to be the blower motor and I was quoted a price of $1,840.00 and they would not have been able to repair it that night, so I gave the tech his 50 bucks and told him that I would get back to them if I decide to have Bell repair it. This turned out to be a blessing in disguise. 

The next morning I got on the phone and started calling different AC companies and did not let them know what I was quoted by Bell. There were some companies that quoted me around and above $1000.00, but nothing close to the $1840.00 that Bell quoted me. I found an independent guy who came over and did the job for $853.67. 

$1000.00 LESS THAN BELL!!!!! Are you kidding me?!!!!!

Again, I understand convenience and markups, however, this quote seemed extreme, almost to the point that I felt they were taking advantage of my predicament and desperation. I truly hope this was just an anomaly and not their normal course of doing business.

All I can say is amazing shop! They gave me a great haircut and a great price. I actually recommend them to my close friends now too since it is so hard to find a decent place to get haircuts nowadays.

Fox Family Dental moved to its current location in October of 2005 which will soon mark its 10 year anniversary. Our family of 3 started seeing Dr. Fox approximately 2 years prior to that, so we've known him for 12 years.  We can't say enough wonderful things about not only Dr. Fox himself, but his entire staff, two of whom followed him from his previous location near 35th Ave. and Thunderbird. He was one of many aspiring young dentists who ventured out to establish his own private practice...all they way out to Sun City. Was this a problem for us? Not for the care we knew we would receive! We live in New River which is a 65 mile round trip jaunt and we do so happily every 3 months. How many dentists have you been to that you would be willing to put in that much time and gas to go see? Dr. Fox is kind, gentle and incredibly knowledgeable. You can feel that his employees love working with him and are willing to follow his lead. He doesn't push to have procedures done which are costly to pad his bottom line and we trust him entirely. If he says something needs to be done, it is because it truly does need to be done. Case in point, our son (now 33) has really bad tartar build-up on his lower teeth (observable to anyone looking). We finally took Dr. Fox's advice and began bringing him in quarterly instead of semi-annually for cleanings. And if you're wondering why we are bringing in an adult male and why he's not making the trip himself, it is because our son has autism. This brings a whole new layer to Dr. Fox's awesomeness (did you like that Dr. Fox?). If you have a special needs child (or adult), you will not find a more patient, kind person to become their dentist. My son has always felt at ease when having any procedure done at Fox Family Dental. Previously, with other dentists, this was not always the case. He suffers from severe anxiety. The entire office is filled with caring individuals. Our son tends to stim constantly which can mean it takes him longer to get from point A to point B, and they never rush him. He is able to take the time he needs to get back to the examination/cleaning room. On our recent visit, we learned they have a cute small dog whom they are training to be a therapy dog. We were told that they've placed the dog in children's laps while they were being examined or having procedures and it did help calm the child. This shows that Dr. Fox is forward thinking and will use whatever tools he deems appropriate to provide you with the best care possible.  If you are new to the area and need a new dentist, or just need a new dentist, we wholeheartedly recommend Fox Family Dental. I'm happy to have finally achieved my goal of writing this long overdue review as Dr. Fox and his entire office are so deserving of an excellent recommendation. If you have any questions you'd like answered, feel free to ask away.

Went here for the first time, diverse menu, very clean, service was great!  Very friendly employees too!  I got the double hamburger combination, the burger was very good.  The fries were not as hot as I think they should have been. Otherwise, it would have been 5 stars.
We will come back for more!!!

I know, it is McDonald's, right? Well, this McDonald's shut down for weeks and revamped the entire restaurant (but forgot to update the soda machine like I have seen in many of the new fast food places). They did a fantastic job of creating a comfortable and inviting upscale fast food restaurant!!! Kudos to the designer!! I had a very relaxing and enjoyable visit here with my kid! Hey, they even give you a number and bring you your food! The guy even stopped by and took our tray and trash when we were done!! Nice!

Our Ac unit was shot. Had our Home Owners Ins. company get Bell out here.
The tech Chris was very good at his job, polite as well. All was taken care of in a matter of 24 hours.

So went to Benny's Burgers for the 1st time just because its right down the street from me and the wife wanted to try it out. 

We both got the pulled pork sandwich, it was kinda greasy but good. The frys were ok and my son liked his burger. 

The DB behind the counter on the other hand acted like he wanted to get my fist down his throat!!! He was dressed like "The situation" and had the hair of "Pauly D". He is lucky my fam was there or he would have gotten the beating of a life time!! 

Prob will go in again to try something else on the menu and to see if DB wants to rumble!!! (family not included)
One of the best Mexican meals I've had in the Valley. Really flavorful rice and beans and enchiladas. Looking forward to trying other items on the menu.
Average at best. Seems like they are playing off the name of another burger shop with a great name. Service was good and the fries were the bright spot of the meal but I wasn't impressed.
The employees here were very friendly, helpful and fast. I even ordered the wrong hamburger for my kids and they fixed  it with no issue. Really great customer service.

This place was terrible. Not a big surprise it's closed. Found a place called Build A Bike bell and litchfield  in Kohls parking lot. They were great to me and several of my neighbors and family members. High recommendation.

I just had a breakfast with a group of 18 guys. The service was great, and the food was fresh, hot and delicious. You sure do get a lot for your money. If you go home hungry it is your problem not theirs. I am pretty sure she is the only one working in the morning and I can't believe how well she handled all of us. When she served the food she knew actually who had what. I will be going back to this place for breakfast. It was very relaxing and just a nice place for breakfast.

Absolutely delicious! Benny himself was sitting by the front door to  immediately greet incoming customers and thank exiting customers . His restaurant was clean and was half full on a friday at 1pm. I got a mushroom and swiss, which is a great example of what quality the restaurant is. If you cant make a good mushroom and swiss, then the rest of your menu will be as bland. 

I was very pleased to say that it was one of the best that I've ever had!  It was delivered by a smiling young Woman ,who made sure that Inhad everything that I needed. The mushrooms themselves had an amazing sauce and were obviously fresh. The fries were perfect.

My only issue, and it's a small personal one, is that He uses the type of burger party where it is wide, but thin. I prefer a small, thicker patty.
But the patty was delicious and other than the size preference,  I had no issues with it!

His menu has loads of delicious looking sandwiches to try and I fully expect to be back to try many of them.

I was very pleased with my experience here

The reviews said it was good but not in my opinion.  I was a walk-in.  There was a half hour wait so I left and came back.  The lady was very polite but the pedicure was awful.  To be precise, the nail polishing was the worst part.  When I put my glasses on, nail polish was on the skin of the toes and in numerous places!  She did not clean it off.  The nail polish was just not smooth on the nail, sort of incomplete on the nail itself missing tiny spots.  (I know it was good polish because I brought it in).

We were hungry and in the area so we decided to check this place out.  I mean you cant really go wrong with a burger.  The service was quick and friendly.  My burger was good.  Nothing special but good.  Same with the chili cheese fries.   
If for some reason I'm in the area again i would be willing to return and try the BBQ.
Been to this place a couple of times and it's well worth it! Great burgers and fries. Had the double burger and it's huge. Tasted good! Friend had ribs and fries and loved them!

Due to the high Yelp reviews, I contacted Bell for an A/C tuneup, which while making the appointment, I was told was on special for $39. He started outside by checking the freon and capacitor on the fan motor and told me they were fine. When he went into the attic to "tuneup" the air handler, the technician (Jeff) found a bad blower wheel in my air handler. No surprise to me, I knew there was a slight vibration in the unit. At that point he came down from the attic, never completing whatever he was supposed to do as part of the tuneup. He gave me an (in my humble opinion) outrageous estimate for the repair ($578). He actually tried to sell me an entire new system. After he left, I called around for quotes and 3 other companies, also with great Yelp reviews, came in at the mid to low $300 range, which seemed a little more reasonable. Needless to say, I had another company do the job the next day for $310. Quite a difference. It was obvious Jeff's goal for the day was to sell a new system. I know many Yelpers are happy with Bell, and that's fantastic. But, have you been paying too much? Lesson learned by me... Shop around and get at least 3 quotes for whatever work you need done.

I was in a bind. My 8 year old kid busted the knee out in two of his (now down to three) pairs of school uniform pants in TWO days, leaving me with just one pair of pants that is acceptable to wear to school! I scrambled and bought a few more pairs of pants but they needed to be hemmed. I called around and no one was willing to get them done prior to "7 to 10 days unless you pay more." 

Sun City Alterations listened to my situation and told me to bring them in and they would get the job done at no extra charge! Besides not charging extra, they were charging just $10.50 for a kid's sized pant hem compared to $15.00 (PLUS for a rush) by the competition!! Now if you have a big job and you want a rush, don't expect them to make exception. In this case, hemming three pairs of kid's cotton pants wouldn't take these pros much time. 

The ladies were friendly and welcoming! Although I have to drive a few extra miles, I will for sure use Sun City Alterations exclusively!!
I liked the Korean BBQ dinner special. Come here for the food, not the ambiance.

This place would have 5 stars from me if it weren't for the tacky interior design.  I can't do half stars so this place will get my 4...  

I was visiting my father-in-law over the weekend for his birthday.  We stopped by Don Jose's before starting our day.  I was recommended the chorizo and the chile relleno burritos.  The chile relleno sounded really good, and was going to go with that until I saw the lengua burritos.  I LOVE lengua.  Could not pass up the opportunity so I went with the lengua burrito (which defaultly *is this a word?*) comes with onions and cilantro.

I ordered the lengua burrito with sour cream and guacmole in it.  It was SOOOO DELICIOUS.  I'm salivating right now thinking about how good this burrito was.  The burrito was a pretty nice size.  Bigger than a 1/2 lb burrito from Taco Bell, but smaller than ones at Chipotle.  The flavor.  The texture.  The combination....  It was heavenly, and filling.  The lengua was cooked perfectly.

The service here at Don Jose's was very attentive.  I believe the owners is the man himself and his wife.  They have about 4 sauce selections to choose from.  There was a dark red, a regular tomato/pico de gallo salsa, green salsa, and I forgot what else.  I loved all of them but I'm a huge fan of the green.  The burrito could go without the sauce, but I'm a well known sauce bandit so it was pretty saucey.

With the order, we ordered a California Burrito, Chorizo Burrito, 2 Ham and Egg Breakfast Burrito, and a Sausage and Egg Breakfast Burrito.  I took a bite out of the Chorizo Burrito, it was pretty good.  Greasy like how a chorizo really is, but the burrito packs a (heavy) flavor punch.

When I come back to Arizona to visit again, I will definitely have to make a stop to Don Jose's.  Not sure if I will go with a new burrito though.... Lengua has been on my mind since then.
Reminds me of the charbroiled cheese burger specials I use to eat IN L.A.  with them yellow peppers.. Mmm so good!

OMG...I just had the best experience with Bell Air. I called at 7:45 am and told them I needed my unit serviced. Was told Mike would be there between 8:00 and 10:00. Mike showed up at 8:45 and was so polite and introduced himself. Explained what he was going to do and got right to work. He got on the roof and checked things out and told me things were good. He explained about filters and looked at my dirty one and told me to change before it looks like that. He was so nice and represented the company so well. I spent hours on yelp last night and this is why I went with them. I will use them for all future air conditioning and heating issues. Thank you to Bell AIr.

I found this place about 2 years ago when we moved to the Valley from Northern AZ ..... I was looking for a dining room table set. I check their stock regularly because they are always receiving a new variety of choices for every room and every style. I have 'sold' items here ... and I have purchased items here. Always Fair Value .... Clean, Stylish, and Well Made Items. I especially love the Dining Room Set that I eventually found here. I'm glad I waited and hadn't purchased something earlier. The Set I found is perfect and the price was perfect too (Monty's called the seller when I made a lower offer, and they accepted) ........... 
I will be a forever customer and recommend to every one I know or to anyone looking for Used Furniture or Accessories.

Jim F. has never purchased an appliance from this store. What you need to know about him is that he has known Al and Leona Callender, along with a mutual friend who recently passed away, since their grade school years. I met them in high school (mid 1970s).  His "review" comes after a personal disagreement with the Callenders having to do with our friend who recently passed. It's really sad that Jim F. has stooped this low, maligning his friends' business and jeopardizing their livelihood. This review is hateful and disrespectful and has no place here.

I was very happy to find this storage location. Very clean, secure, reasonable pricing, & friendly place. Bill was awesome and very helpful. 

Ps.
Make sure to look at all the reviews there are 25 reviews labeled "Not Recommended" but are all 5 stars! This place is awesome

I think by far this is the fastest McDonald's drive thru! Who actually got the order right and the order was fresh! My hash brown was so warm it must of just popped out of whatever they cook it in.

I went in the morning for breakfast ordered three meals and had about 6 cars a head of me and I kid you not they were on top of their game! I was there less then 10 minutes and I was on the road again. 

Thank you for understanding the concept of fast food!!

I went to this McDonald's on my way to work and literally was in the drive thru line for twenty minutes! I received food, but it was not my order! The drink was diet! My hash browns were over cooked and my egg mc muffin was lukewarm! I ended up throwing out my whole breakfast! I don't usually take the time to fill out surveys but I did, I felt so annoyed to be five minutes late for work and wasted my money and time that I needed to report this to McDonald's. I received a phone call from the General Manager today and she apologized for the horrible experience and offered for me to come back in to have another meal. She understood that the way the drive thru line is set up that you are trapped and can't even leave if you want to, so disappointed with the situation. Anyway, I couldn't help but see before I left my review that the very first person on Yelp from 2013, literally three years ago complaining about the same thing, and of course there are others who have that same exact experience! Imagine all the thousands who don't bother to waste time but clearly this McDonald's has had this problem for years! McDonald's!! C'mon it is fast food!? No one should wait twenty minutes in a drive thru and get the order right! Honestly, I could have gone to JBs or Village Inn and sat down and ate breakfast within that same time; I know that because I have done it. This McDonald's needs serious help in customer service!

Went here for the first time, diverse menu, very clean, service was great!  Very friendly employees too!  I got the double hamburger combination, the burger was very good.  The fries were not as hot as I think they should have been. Otherwise, it would have been 5 stars.
We will come back for sure!

This is my new favorite Starbucks! The drive thru wait is reasonable. I love the screen on the menu when you can actually see the baristas when they're taking your order- it's so much more personable! 

The quality and level of service is always great! I'm so happy this location opened up. Perfect for my commute to and from work.

Before the remodel, this location had good days and bad days.  Since the remodel I feel all employees have a new outlook.  There are new faces and new attitudes.  There are a couple familiar faces and one of which is Enrique, he has been there for a while, he is always fast, accurate, and enthusiastic about this job.  I'm hoping by now he is at least assistant manager or manager.

Something to keep in mind when visiting is that this location is surrounded by not only Sun City folk, but snowbirds.  It's going to be busy, many of our older folk move slow.  That's not always the employees issue.

The food is very good. The only thing I don't like about this place is every time I order (I order the same thing every time) the price is always different...I don't think I've paid the same price more than once! The food is great though which is why I keep coming back but definitely peeved when he gives me the total

Upgrading this place to a 5 star after having their hamburgers. This place is clean, the staff is friendly and it's what you expect from a place like this. I would highly recommend getting one of their burgers. The chicken tacos are amazing as well as the wings.
Found this place on yelp. We were heading back home from a road trip and thought we'd give it a try. Super yummy and great friendly service. Highly recommend.

The employees that work here are very nice, friendly and helpful. However, the minute you walk in the door, you are hit with the over-powering stench of deep-fryers. Clearly a sign of poor air circulation. If you dine-in, expect to smell like you were working the fryers until you change your clothes.

The burgers are flame broiled and similar in size, shape, smell and taste to a Burger King Whopper. Even the bun is the same.

Nothing appears to be made 'fresh' here. Frozen fries, frozen this, frozen that. It's a small kitchen and a big menu. The food isn't bad, but it's not anything special. 

Had the wings. Was happy they served celery with the order. The wings were okay. I've had worse and I've had better.

Fries taste like they come from a generic bag of frozen fries.

It just seems to me that they order bulk frozen foods and 'cook'/'heat' them to serve. It doesn't appear they actually MAKE anything unique that you can't find at any other greasy spoon style restaurant.

This is not meant as an insult, but clearly as an honest observation. As I write this, the Yelp review is an average of 4 stars. I don't get it. I don't think people realize the potential harm they cause to a business when they give it 5 stars and set unrealistic expectations to new diners. There is no way this a 5-star restaurant unless the scale goes to 15 or you've never dined in an atmospheric restaurant with fresh, locally sourced, hand crafted specialties with excellent table-side service, easy parking and reasonable prices. At least, that's how I determine my ratings. I don't simply hand out 5-stars because the employees were nice and I didn't get food poisoning! But, based on the other reviews written here, I guess I'm the weird one. You decide.

Bottom line - Not terrible. Not great. And for the rest of your remaining day, you'll reek like a deep fryer after you eat here.
After a bad experience at Gentle Dental, Dr. Fox has a great office, with great staff.  Michael is a great hygenist!!
I eat a lot, I mean A LOT, of Mexican food. Don Jose's would be my only choice if I lived/worked closer. So amazing! The green salsa is the best ever!

This is my favorite Mexican restaurant out here.  The food is excellent, the service is quick and they don't put tomatoes in their guacamole which is great for me because I have a tomato allergy.  It is a family owned business and they are really great people.  I eat here at least once or twice a week.

Benny's was recommended to us by a friend who's never led us astray. We tried it today and we're very pleased!!  I had the spicy mango guacamole bacon burger (that's a mouthful to say let alone eat) that was incredible!!  Not too spicy but every bit delicious!  I also indulged in the sweet potato fries and they were crispy-on-the-outside and soft on the inside perfect!  My husband had the Korean steak rice bowl which was "just like mama used to make!"  
Next time my husband has his eye on a Chicago style hot dog. Go to Benny's you won't be disappointed!!!

This McDonald's is 100% than the one on Grand by Sun City West. Employees are nicer, and when you order they listen, and are nice to you. My order was correct, and it was served in a timely matter. The next time I want to go to McDonald's I will drive the extra miles for the great service. I will returned to this one.
The food was great and prepared quickly. The customer service was awesome. There is a nice casual cozy mom and pop feeling making it a nice place to stop.

We checked several storage facilities and found them to be not only the cleanest and best organized, but also the least expensive. Bill, the manager, took us to every available RV space and pointed out all the amenities on site including the free dump/water facilities. The rental spaces were organized and had plenty of maneuvering room. Bill was extremely friendly and helpful, and made our choice an easy one in choosing them to store our new RV. Thanks Bill! :D Brad & Mari
Attractively laid out and clean store ruined by the arrogant, superior attitude of the "help". Zero interest in returning.

This is an excellent nail salon! I was looking for a new one and read their reviews. They deserve the high ratings. It is very clean, tastefully decorated, has a relaxing atmosphere, friendly husband/wife owners, and reasonable prices. Annie did a wonderful job! I will definitely be back!
Had been looking for some good charbroiled burgers for a while. And this my far has been really good. I also tried the Korean tacos; not too shabby
Fast and friendly service. Average McDonald in the sense that the food taste as it should. Good location.

after reading the other reviews, i was very susceptible about going there, but really needed my cpap machine. all the worry for nothing. they were very pleasant, i didn't wait long and Mona was very professional but at the same time, very friendly. she took her time explaining everything to me and what to do if i had any questions or help after getting home and using the machine. i was dealing with  lincare before my insurance switched over and their whole operation and service was terrible.
Hard to beat the burgers and wings here. I have been here many times haven't found something I didn't like!
The repair work was done well.  The technician was timely and willing answer all my questions.   Job completed as expected.

I have had Bennys 2 x once today and once about a year ago. 

Last  I had a burger and frys. It is your typical flamed grilled burger with whatever you want on it. Think of Lennys perhaps, not bad but nothing stood out either. 

Today I had the brisket. I am not 100% sure it was brisket but what it was was good. Again nothing to write home about but nothing bad either. It was thinly sliced beef served on a buttered and toasted bun with bbq sauce on the meat. 

Service was great, the place was clean. I would go back but will not crave it.

Manager Bill answered the phone promptly. Elapsed time from initial phone call to placement of car in storage one hour and that included our travel time of 18 minutes to the yard. We appreciate the quick, professional and courtesy service.

Called them on the weekend due to HVAC unit failure and they were out within a couple hours! Professional, polite and no hard sell. In fact we only needed a minor repair but we decided to authorize them to do some maintenance work (that wasn't really necessary yet) just because they were so nice and we appreciated their quick response!

Love my new doc.  She is attentive and really listens and pays close attention to all details.  I appreciate her very much.
First doc in years that really listens and cares.  I talked with others during my very short wait, they all love her.  First doc in almost 20 years that got all of my meds right, the first time, even.  She is awesome and i have referred her to others.
I can't believe the positive difference in my skin, eyebrowns and eye lashes in one day.  I'm wowed.   I highly recommend her.
Great food. They have a good variety of items on their menu and their cheese curds are awesome! Service is great and every time we come here we never leave disappointed.

Into the twilight zone once again!!  I have written a review in the past, but noticed it was nowhere to be found! So after finding it on one of my list, there are two Benny's links? Guess this place in under new management, so yelp allowed them to start over. Like I have said on the other reviews, never had a problem with this place. Wife loves their country burger, reminds her of the Douglas Burgers in SoCal. I have always tried different items on their menu never being disappointed. I have had their burgers, Italian beef,  pull pork, and much more. Great place, will be back again, but not during lunch hour on the weekdays. Very busy!

I went here after doing some research and I'm so glad I did. My Chihuahua hates getting her nails clipped. She's always fidgety and anxious. Well I went here and we were done in less than 5 minutes (I really think it was more like 2 minutes. I was too in shock to truly notice). My pup didn't even flinch. Though she did poo on the groomer (I'm so sorry) because of her nerves, but I think that had more to do with my driving.  I will def be going back.
Delicious burgers and amazing customer service! It's rare to see business owners and employees go above and beyond to serve their customers. We definitely will be back again :)

Wanted to find a burger shop out here that reminded us back home, like a Fabulous or Douglas Burgers. So far this is the closest thing. Wife and Daughter loved their burgers especially their country burger. Daughter and I loved their chili cheese fries. I have had their Italian beef sandwich and their burgers! We have no complaints about them. This is not a restaurant!! So you are not going to have great service! We will be coming back often.
Awesome customer service!  Very helpful.  NEED more art classes!

This corner has finely made it. Bennys Burgers has made a good hit  here. They have great burgers and in many,many sizes . They have fish fries, salads, bar- b cue ,shakes, malts and much more. They also have a take out menu. Service is speedy,oh, the french fries are great also.
The place was amazing! Very clean, super friendly, all around a great experience. Will definitely be taking our dog back in the future! Puppy looks great and worth the money by far!!
It's not the best burgers but they were ok. No matter what order of fries you get they are going to come out small. Ok customer service.

Hands down the best AC service company I've ever had the pleasure of working with. The motor in my outdoor fan went out when it was 110 degrees out. I called Bell Air and they had a technician on site in less than an hour. My technician, Jake was professional, courteous and meticulous. You can tell he has pride in his work and cares about the customer. I've dealt with Scottsdale Air and others that talk to me like I'm a woman that doesn't understand mechanics. I'm an engineer and I appreciated Jake treating me respectfully and doing a great job. My AC is up and running in 3 hours of making the call. The gentleman who scheduled my service was also very courteous and helpful. Prices are very very good compared to what I've paid with competitors. Highly highly recommend Bell Air!! Thank you!
I ordered a strawberry shake from here and I gotta say it was delicious. I will come back here again! :D

YAY - A LOCALLY-OWNED BURGER JOINT IN THE LAND OF CHAIN RESTAURANTS!!!   My cousin recommended this place to me, as she loved the burger she had here recently.  So I stopped in.   Guess what?  I loved it too.  First of all, the restaurant was really clean.  My burger was delicious - reminded me of the old local burger joints that used to line main streets across America before the big chains.  The fries were especially good too - medium thick, golden brown.  Love them - excellent fries.  I thought it was a great value.  I went back a week later - and guess what?  THREE employees stopped at my table to ask how everything was.  You don't get that kind of service at McDonalds across the street.  I'LL BE BACK!

We stopped and ate here for the first time.  What a great experience.  The gentleman waiting on us did everything he could to accommodate my husband's need for a low sodium meal.  He even went back in the kitchen and personally prepared his food.  

And, the meal was delicious.  Plus, the cafe was very clean, as we're the rest rooms.  What we could see of the kitchen area was also tidy, organized and clean.  

Seldom do you find this type of service in a small cafe, but it was clear that the current management wants to be know as a reasonable, tasty and accommodating place to grab a quick bite.  They smoke all their Bar-B-Q meats right there.   We will certainly be returning!

Watched it get a permit, watched it being constructed, watched it's grand opening, and am now sitting here, sipping hot coffee, surrounded by mostly senior citizens watching the traffic fly by on Grand. What's not to love? Xmas stockings are up, xmas blend is on tap, cams tree is up too. There's even cams stickers on the window. Happy Days.

Nearly forgot. Service is quick (considering its first thing Saturday AM), it's clean, the staff are chatty and audible, the products are as expected top quality and to order. I don't have one single gripe.

Was looking for a inexpensive nail salon in my area. There were several listed within a 3 mile radius. After reading the good reviews for this place I decided to give it a try. All the great reviews were spot on. Good prices and very friendly owners. I went right at opening and got in without an appointment. But while there they started to get busy. So would recommend making an appointment     I was very happy with my pedicure and the time taken to do a good job. They take credit cards but give a slight discount for cash. Will definitely be a return customer.

A neighbor suggested that I try here for a manicure & pedicure.  She told me that they just seemed very clean.  I made an appointment and went there today.  It was very clean!!!  I had a manicure, pedicure & facial wax.  Annie took care of me and was such a caring, funny, helpful person!!!  I am a Senior Citizen, but I still like to have fun with my nails.  I told Annie that we should do a happy face on my big toe.  She asked if I would like a flower and I said yes.  She designed beautiful flowers on my big toes!!  The woman next to me liked my toes so well that she had flowers put on her big toe too!!   The prices are great too!  I will definitely be going back here and asking for Annie to help me!!

Guacamole bacon jalapeño burger with mango salsa... tickles my tongue just thinking about it. Chili cheese fries are a guilty pleasure.  Been here a few times and they always have something different on the menu.  It's very clean and the staff is fast and friendly.  Love supporting local businesses!
Don't need to show diamonds in the rough proof of vaccinations for them to groom your pet. You still need to Vaccinate your pet but proof is not required like some other pet stores.

Still wonderful!   Fresh burgers.  Tasty.   Friendly staff.   Clean.   This place is well run. And the burgers are about ten million times better than McDonald's across the street!  McDonald's burgers taste like they cooked the meat last week.
I ordered the Italian sandwich with fries.  Best sandwich I've had in a long time, very tasty.  Friends had the burgers and the said they were great!  A must try!

This Starbucks is amazing! I love coming to this store. It's out of the way for me to go to, but it is totally worth it! All of the managers are really amazing and friendly people. This place offers a true Starbucks experience! Don't hesitate to stop by and say hello to the amazing crew!

The service is the quickest I've seen, and the employees seem to truly care about the customers! I would highly recommend stopping by. They get my (SUPER complicated) drink out quickly and correctly every day.

I love this place.  The double bacon cheeseburgers are the best burgers in the west valley but the Korean tacos are FLAT OUT AMAZING!!
Seriously.  Order them and add some extra sriracha and be prepared for something you'd never expect from a burger joint

Loved the deluxe pedicure and gel manicure! Friendly couple own and operate, clean and got in right away. Would recommend getting in early or making appt. Was getting busy and only the two were working when I was there.

These guys are the greatest!! I've used them several times in the past and i wont go anywhere else. They even fixed my window ac unit that i didnt think was fixable. Im so happy to have it working again!! Its ice cold and im loving it!! Thanks guys for your hard work and dedication to keep me cool in summer time!! Always been there for me and you never disappoint me. Thanks

NO MILITARY DISCOUNT,  NUFF SAID, I'LL TAKE MY $$$ where they habe a little appreciation and would highly encourage others to do as well... HOWEVER,  Jimmy in plumbing is AMAZING, he should go find work elsewhere

My best friend invited me here for lunch. I looked them up on yelp and was excited to try it out. I walked inside the restaurant and the energy and environment was very friendly ! 
 A gentleman greeted me and my best friend and he had a great personality. I told him I wanted something healthy and he referrers me to the Korean steak tacos. He had great humor and a awesome personality. 
  Overall this place produces high quality food at a very reasonable price! And the environment and energy is very friendly. If you need a quick bite come here you'll love it

UPDATE on the FRIED PICKLES:  Paid something like $3.49 for fried pickles.  Well, I expected a small basket of them like everyone else serves, but no! Benny's Burgers took one small to medium sized pickle, fried it in batter and served it--for $3.49 or close to that price!  What a rip-off!!!!

I put up with your lousy ventilation, Benny, for the cheap prices and okay food, but being ripped off totally for your skimpy sized fried pickles is too much.  I am never coming back, cause I have run out of making excuses for leaving your establishment reeking of greasy smell...and now rip-off servings.  I think not.

We were looking for a burger place and saw the reviews on yelp! We both had a burger and fries. The burgers are made to order and delicious. Benny's also has fish, ribs and other delicious foods on the menu. So glad we stopped. Friendly staff, clean, good food and great prices what more can you ask for.  Oh and family owned and operated so you are supporting local business.

My friend and I ate at the memo's on meeker Blvd . We had salads and I will say worst salads we ever had brown lettuce and turkey was not good. We mentioned it to the waitress and she said I will let them know. We did not eat it and we were still charged for it. Lousy customer service and worse salad. It was the Cobb salad and taco salad.

The customer service is horrible here. The people serving the food dont look clean. The food is all so greasy and bleh. 
I would not mind if I dont go in there again.

I went through my home warranty company and there immediate response was impressive! Their service and professionalism was amazing. I would highly recommend them to anyone. I will be going to Bell Air Conditioning from now on for all my a/c and heating needs!

Really good bugers of many varieties! They use an old fashioned flat charbroiler which of course produces the absolute best burger flavor. They also have Teriyaki, Pastrami, Mexican, and many others. They also do a terrific Korean taco platter that is fantastic. Great BBQ including ribs and brisket, and fried flounder fish are some of the specialties. Home spun shakes also served here. I recommend this place!

Bell A/C is great, very professional and prompt.  They service my home as well as my office and are always very informative about what is going on with both of my systems and never try to upsell me with unnecessary products or repairs.  They also were life savers last year when we had an emergency on Labor Day at my dad's house, who wasn't even a customer at the time, and Dan sent over his closest technician to get the A/C back on and functioning properly.  It was a relief to know I could call someone that I could count on.  I highly recommend using Bell A/C for all of your cooling needs!

I've dealt with Valley Respiratory for about a year and a half now and have been thoroughly pleased. Everyone I've interacted with has been very pleasant and professional. I've always had questions answered and processes explained by folks who were obviously very knowledgeable. Ordering CPAP supplies has been exceptionally easy and I've received them rapidly. My interaction with Valley Respiratory has been 100% positive and I highly recommend them.

Excellent dentist office. Dr Fox is awesome!!! His staff is also wonderful. Staff and Dr Fox take the time to speak with you and give you options..very friendly and they even have a super sweet dog that sometimes visits patients. I've been here a few times and plan to stay with Dr Foxs dentistry. Unlike the franchise dentists I've previously been to, Dr Fox doesn't try to make you get unnecessary dental work. Highly recommend if you want friendly and personalized dentist care
Horrible attorney.  Directed to fiduciary, which just sucked money for him and fiduciary out of estate!  Probably cost over $50K,--unnecessary and CYA work!
I was looking for an honest ac company. One that would not snow me. Great work  thanks bell air.

Yelp led us to this place. I knew we chose wisely when we walked in and there was a big table of retirees finishing up. The owner treated them like gold and they all said "see ya next week". That's a good sign. While we were trying to decide, he asked if we liked spicy burgers and gave us a sample of what they put on it. We all enjoyed our food and the owners relationship w/his customers.

I was initially hooked up with Bell Air Conditioning through my home warranty company and they have been doing my maintenance for the last few years. They are always very professional, courteous and have never attempted to sell me any unnecessary repairs . My AC stopped working around 9pm last night and I called Bell Air but did not leave a message. Dan saw the missed call this morning and called me back, which was really awesome. He came right out and it was all fixed up before 9am this morning. Thanks Bell Air Conditioning, you guys rock!
Good authentic Mexican food at a reasonable price. The fire department loves it that's always a good sign!

For the money, the best burger on this side of town.  Worth the ride from anywhere in the Northwest valley.  Large flame broiled burger patties for a good price.  I am almost always pleased when I go here.  One exception was on a Sunday when I ordered "tomato only".  When I got home it had everything but tomato.  Must have be a dyslexic cook that day.  Recently remodeled and does feel nicer and cleaner.  On cooler days you can sit at a table just outside and watch the world go by.
Kim is a very nice person and makes u feel so comfortable, She made me feel very relaxed and I didn't want to leave.

I just LOVE this place!  I have several things in my house from Monty's and everyone wants to know where I got them! Great prices, great people, new and quality used items every time I go in there! Also I'm so happy they are on FB now because I live in Scottsdale and can't get to the shop as often as I would like. They post pictures on FB all the time and I have bought many things via FB pictures! Keep finding those wonderful items Monty's!
This place is located in the center of "Senior Land" and they chose hardbacked chairs with no cushions. I can't eat here--only get carry-out.

We called Bell A/C several years ago when one of our A/C units went out in the middle of summer. They were not the only company we called but they were only 1 of 2 that responded. They were able to come out that morning. We ended up having to have the unit replaced and they were more than fair on price and installation. Their customer service has been outstanding. I have no reservations about calling them whenever I have a question/concern or a service needed and always recommend them when someone asks about A/C companies. They continue to follow up on the unit they installed as well as the second one we have. I appreciate the effort they put in to make sure our units will run smoothly during the summer months.

I went there because of the reviews and I have to say I am totally disappointed I asked the guy behind the counter what the special is or what he recommends and he said Mexican food he was no help in selecting my dinner. The chicken enchiladas the sauce tasted like chicken gravy the rice  was like Uncle Bens  box rice  and the fajitas were as bland as his advice.

To add to my 2013 review...  I would still recommend this place! It definitely has that mom and pop feel. The owner is soo nice and makes sure we have everything we need.  The staff is always friendly. I love the pastrami burger and cheese fries! My hubby loves getting the triple country style with extra cheese and a fried egg. Once in a while they'll have seasonal specialty burgers like the guac mango bacon burger or items like fish tacos, so it keeps it exciting.  (I think they offer catering as well.) :) til next time Benny's...

I am new to the area... and am so blessed I found Fox Family Dental.  They are amazing people that work in that office.  It feels more like going to someone's home, its that comfortable.  They are gentle... caring... friendly...and I've never been anxious to go back for a teeth cleaning.  I would highly recommend them.
Wow, what gem on the westside! Diverse menu with quality ingredients. Highly recommend the Korean Steak Tacos! My family enjoyed it and we will certainly be back.
Mexican burger was fantastic! Food came out very fast. Overall, excellent lunch at a reasonable price.
I fly to Arizona to get my dental work done with Dr. Fox.  He has provided great dental care for me and my family for nearly 20 years.  FANTASTIC!

As good as it gets for a order at the counter type of place. I have eaten here several times, many different things from the menu, and never disappointed.  Servings are ample.  The owner is always there, taking your order with a smile.  Special mention are the beef tacos, and the Green Chile patter

Decent customer service when they are working and not Bs'ing ......."HORRIBLE FOOD SERVICE".....no reason I am the only person at the register, 2cars in drive-thur and have to wait 16mins  ....then to watch them make my order wrong and try to convince me its not...... on a quick break and didnt have time to argue........ I eat here because its across the street from my job, but I really hate this location.

Non chain real Mexican food in Sun City? Wait, what? 
Is this fancy pants? No.
Is this blow your mind creativity/complex flavors? No.
Is this a place that puts decor/ambiance above the customer service and food? No

What this place does have is:
Good quality home made food.
An owner who not only cares about his customers but works with what they are in the mood for.
Has daily specials.
Has a fast turn around.
Has a salsa bar.

Is a family run, family feel good food in a crappy location. Prices are more than reasonable. Know that your busy time will be lunch hour and then the 4:30-6:00pm Sun City dinner dining timeframe. 

Say hi to Jose'. He's the real deal.
This place needs some yelp love! I think they get jipped cause none of these old folks in Sun City use smart phones. Definitely a top Mexican restaurant in Phoenix. Great food, good salsa and cheap.

Bell AC is the best in scheduling our twice-annual maintenance with convenient days and times for us. They are always prompt and courteous. Today, technician Jeff left us feeling confident about our system as we prepare for another hot Arizona summer. Jeff was punctual, courteous, and very confident in his abilities. Before leaving, he reviewed our maintenance contract and made sure he was available should we need help in the future. Sincerely, Karen & Art (Karts) Huseonica, Sun City, AZ

I have passed it many times and finally stopped in. Greeted by a friendly employee behind the counter who suggested that I try the Burger of the Day. Spicy Mango Guacamole Bacon Cheeseburger. Combo meal ran around $9.50 for a real great tasting burger and decent fries plus a drink. Very clean on the inside and while I was eating lunch it became pretty busy quick. Will be back to try some other items on the menu.

I was wrong - they've just raised prices, not just for the winter.  Still, regular haircut is $9.  Not bad at all!  I've tried three of the four barbers so far - you can't go wrong.  Just take a number when you go in the door.

First chair is JJ, second is Robert, fourth is Bob.

I made a quick stop here to get some lunch and talk to the owner/manager. Unfortunately the manager was really rude. Opted to not have lunch there and won't bother to go back with all of the other reviews.

way too over priced.   And unwilling to realize and discuss.   Other places MUCH better then this.
Plus:  rummaging through their junk jewelry~

I needed to get my jeans hemmed and let me tell you this place is great! My jeans are perfect! Best prices around and fast and friendly service. I recommend this place plus all the ladies that work there seem to love what they do!!!

Extremely uneducated jewelers...go ANYWHERE else. In fact, run, don't walk. Went in for a simple gold/scrap metal buy, had to wait 30 mins to see the one person(out of three apparently) who was trained in testing the metals etc. Once he finally was available, he immediately showed his annoyance/distaste about most of my metals being silver. He then proceeded to look at them extremely quickly, and judged by 90% feel and inability to find a metal stamp that most of my metal was not real. I had to argue politely and put my foot down several times, as I HAVE PREVIOUSLY WORKED FOR A REPUTABLE JEWELER, and knew for a fact that the majority WAS in fact real sterling/gold as it was purchased through jewelry distribution companies (stuller, quality gold, etc) directly through the jeweler I worked for. As in, I made the purchase orders so I have no doubts whatsoever it is authentic. He also didn't have the slightest clue what pandora was, and that it is 925 silver. (Even if your clientele is of the older variety and you don't carry a brand, you must be living under a rock in the jewelry industry to not know what pandora is). I left with a check with my name misspelled and half my "fake" scrap jewelry, which I then took to another jeweler who actually took the time to properly test it and give it the A-ok. DIAMOND JIM's concept of customer service is truly appalling, and this establishment should literally be cleaned, sanitized, have its cases restocked and displays redone, and have its entire group of representatives let go, and hire new retrained professionals. Preferably a few who actually took a gemology course or two. The owner was not there, perhaps they behave better when he's around, but as a young knowledgeable woman who was not in their clientele demographic, the service was shudder-inducing.
Amazing food for a great price! I love this place. Not to mention the staff is very friendly. Definitely recommend

I trusted the reviews and made an appt.  they told me I had periodontal disease after doing a gum depth exam.  Then recommended a deep cleaning to aid this condition at $800.00.  The dentist then looked at my teeth and said I needed a crown costing around $2000.00.  I got a 2nd opinion at a dental college.  they have senior students work on clients and all is reviewed by a group of faculty dentists and students.  My gum depth test yielded completely different results.  No periodontal disease or need for the expensive deep cleaning.  Also no crown needed!   Treatment for everything is $485.00.  I think Fox Dental is ripping people off, telling them they need prodeedures they do not need!!!!  awful.
Got a great little sofa from here! Ladies were sweet and helpful! They offer new and gently consigned furniture, all for great prices!
Food is really good. Defiantly try the tacos. You Can try both the chicken and Korean steak tacos. Both are Amazing. Chicken sand which is good as well

Simply the best !!!! Period ! If u want a burger this is the only place ! We have been customers for years but had stopped going cuz the help sucked ! Especially the grouchy old lady ! Now under new management we have to pace ourselves to only once per week ! The owner is often there & such a nice friendly person. Who cares that u r there !

Need to make sure your unit is ready for the heat? Well look no further than Bell Air Conditioning! We set up an appointment and within days the work was completed! Mike was very friendly, conscientious, and knowledgable!  
Bell Air provides excellent service, extremely reasonable rates and a thorough completion of the job! (Mike even reeled the hose back up even though it wasn't reeled when he arrived!) Thanks Bell Air for your maintenance of our unit this morning!

Really great food for an even greater price! Food came out quick and was delicious!! Cute restaurant that's as authentic as it gets :) manager was super friendly as well! He had a ghost chili/Trinidad scorpion pepper extract that was a sort of challenge, and one toothpick tip dipped in it had me in intense pain but I won a bet with my friends! Was pretty neat and do the challenge at your own discretion :) definitely gonna come back again! Would recommend!

I would highly recommend Bell Air Conditioning! I had to call them on Memorial Day and the technician Jeff was so friendly and professional. We didn't feel pressured at all which was a nice change. He added freon to our unit to get it working right away and will be coming back next week to install a new coil at a very reasonable price. He even verified that the part was still under warranty so we will only have to pay for the labor. Thanks for the great service!!

Only been once. Got a Carnitas Burrito. It was quite good, but also quite expensive for the size. For the size, it realistically should have cost half of the $6 they charge, maybe $4. Good food of what I tasted, just need bigger portions or a price reduction.
This is a nice store, pretty big and very clean.  Like most Ace stores the staff is super helpful and friendly.

My girlfriend and I contacted Bell after calling a few others she had seen on Angie's list, I told her I used to live in surprise next to   The owner  in a home I had rented in Surprise, after calling and finding out that they not only had the lowest service fee that they also didn't charge us any emergency fee. 

Albert was our technician, he was incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. He diagnosed and fixed the issue within a couple hours. 

Great company I would recommend to anyone looking for AC needs.
Excellent Mexican food. The shrimp and tostadas are the best!! Family run restaurant. Good food friendly people. This is our go to spot for authentic Mexican food.

I ordered the Mexican Burger Combo after asking the cashier what was in the burger: pepper jack cheese, American cheese, grilled onions, and grilled green chiles.  I asked to have fried zucchini instead of French fries with my combo. She said yes, but didn't tell me she was charging me $.60 extra. 

My burger arrived with no green chiles. The cashier took my burger back and had the cook put grilled chiles on my burger. It came back with one piece of chile covering half of the burger. I then noticed there was no pepper jack cheese on my burger. 
The zucchini was from frozen and not fresh, but tasted okay. 
A positive note---they serve Coca Cola.

Benny's is a pretty decent little burger dive. I had the mango burger. It says spicy but it wasn't bad at all. Pretty good flavor. Good onion rings too. It was a good little place. I liked the char on the burger too. They were a bit skimpy on the sauces but the service was really good. The obvious owner or head manager was really cool. He suggested the Korean steak tacos, and I think I'll go back to try them out sometime. If they blow me away I'll definitely bump to 4 stars.

If it's a nice day I really liked their patio, the dining area indoors was pretty bland. But we were expecting much when we went. Decent price for what I got.

Was looking for something cheap and easy for dinner. I found it! Ordered a Brisket Sandwich for dinner. Came in 15 minutes later, and got it! Food was good (bit oversauced, but not terribly so!) and the fries were delicious. They gave a 64 oz to go cup, and told me that I could have any size I wanted with the combo so they just gave me the biggest! The two girls working were courteous and made me feel welcome! I'll definitely be back.

This might be my new favorite Mexican restaurant. Are you still always go to Caramba is but try Don Joses after reading the reviews. Nothing like supporting small businesses! The food was fresh and warm and tasted spectacular.

The greatest move I have ever made was selecting Jim,Owner of That Window Washing Guy. GREAT company. Excellent service. Jim And Buck did an outstanding job at our house.Their attention to details was outstanding. Great to talk to very professional and very concerned about taking care of their customers.

Thanks Jim & Buck, you will be highly recommended by us.

Ray & Lonnie

I've tried many services at Sterling Skin & Style and I have loved them all.  Of the different facials I have tried, the Signature Facial is by far my favorite.  My skin feels and looks good weeks after the facial.  I have also started getting my hair cut here and love the attention to detail the Carleton gives.  They have a handy location,  comfortable and clean salon and great prices.
This place is the best! The food was great and the manager/employees were very polite and attentive!:)

Called on a Saturday afternoon with our air conditioner not running. They were here within an hour. Adam was the technician, and he was fantastic. He was very knowledgeable, found the problem immediately and resolved it in reasonable time at a reasonable cost. Thank you Bell Air.
Dan was super helpful over the phone even though other calls were coming in. Derick came out within an hour of my call and got the AC working very quickly. It was 118 that day!
Who goes to a Mexican food place, asks for a carry out and then gets NO salsa in their order? I'll leave this one star here until I go the next time and I get salsa with my order. Grrr

Not sure why this place has 4 stars to begin with.  Friends doing reviews?  Anyway I would give it 2.5 stars.  My order was to go so I can't comment on how nice the owner is etc.  But hey we're here to talk about the food right?  We got ribs, wings, onion rings and zucchini sticks.
First the wings are not "jumbo" as they show on their website.  They are average size but totally lacking in flavor and quite dry.  We got bbq and honey mustard.  The honey mustard had no flavor.  I'm not even exaggerating.  
Anyway next the 1/2 rack of ribs.  About 3/4 of each rib was tender (not following of the bone tender but edible tender) and the flavor was just ok.  The last quarter was dry and not worth eating.  Zucchini sticks and onion rings were fine.
But i won't be going back again especially since we paid nearly $30 for this order.  Definitely not worth paying that much for food that lacked flavor.
Denise the owner has been grooming for 25 years. She truly cares about your pets as if they were one of her own.
Came here for the first time today and definitely don't regret it. Very delicious food for a good price and AMAZING service. Everyone is very nice!

Visiting Monty's is always an enjoyable experience.  The staff are friendly and very welcoming.  The atmosphere is calm and very inviting.  I love that their inventory is constantly changing.  There are always great finds at Monty's!
Very difficult to locate since it sits in back of several buildings in the SCW pavilion area. Recently a sign has been posted on Meeker Rd.

Needed a pedicure and could not get in to the regular place I go too. Since I am new to the area I checked Yelp and this place was listed so I called and left a message for an appointment. I was called back within 15 minutes and had an appointment in an hour. I was very impressed with the knowledge of the person that did my pedicure (owner) and he did an awesome job on my feet. I will be back and definitely recommend this business.

Restaurant would be a bit of a stretch to say if this place - more like great fast food!!! Service was great and the food was fresh and tasty.  Prices are great for a quick meal and it is a quiet place to enjoy the homemade meal.
Every employee is up having a chat session.  Nobody willing to help!  First time I've ever been inside an Ace where they were not helpful!

Very good food here. I had the pulled chicken sandwich which was the special for the day. The bbq sauce had a good amount of spice to it and the food was hot and fresh. I'll certainly stop again if in the area but won't go across town to eat here. If you are close by, I recommend it!

Very good company! Super pleased with service! Prompt respectful and most important HONEST! Not pushy and do not make a sales pitch! Appreciate the quick prompt service! Highly highly recommend! Jimmy was a GREAT technician! Definitely will use again when needed!

BAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRFFFFFFFF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


This place does not deserve a review.  But seems how someone reported me and had my original barf review removed here goes.

The inside is tacky.  There are ads on the tables, a dirty fish tank in the corner, and junk all over the walls.

I ordered adovada and my wife ordered a taco and enchilada.  The adovada came with two huge tortillas that were pasty and gross.  The adovada had a decent flavor but was not fresh, reheated, and stale.  The beans were runny and not worthy of consumption and the rice was plain as day.  All three of the salsas were disgusting.  The chips were stale and tasted like old cooking oil.

My wife said her food was disgusting and asked why would anyone serve this to another person.  She also said yelp did us dirty again with the four star reviews average.  Looks like a lot of them are fake to me.  But yelp has no way to properly filter them out of their system.  

My wife also asked why have three salsas if none of them are any good.  I said zero salsas are better than 3 horrible ones.  I don't know what is going on in sun city.  We were only out here on business and this place came up on her phone, but this is maybe one of the worst Mexican food I have ever had in my life and I have had a LOT of bad ones.  Even the horchata was disgusting and it came out of a machine!  

This place should be shut down and Don Jose should get into another line of work.  No idea how this place is in business.  It is pure taste bud and intestinal torture.  He should serve this slop at GITMO and would get more info out of the terrorists than waterboarding ever could.

Something tells me this glowing review won't make ROTD but it's how I feel after regretfully eating here.

BAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRFFFFFFFFFFFF!!!!!!!!!!

I took my sons little Yorkie Lady there today and what a nice establishment.  The owner was so kind and took her time talking to me.  Lady looked adorable after getting pampered!
Thank you!
Excellent place to take your pets. Do a great job, and my pets love going here. Denise is very caring, she even took care of my dog on a Sunday, her day off. Very accommodating.

We had been wanting to try this place for some time now,.. sorry we didn't try them sooner!
Excellent burger and fries, both very tasty.. Burger was cooked more on the done side and seasonings gave it great flavor,  ...Fries were cooked and seasoned perfectly....
We will definitely be back for more....
Wow. This place has so much to offer. I can't believe I passed this placed for so many years to find it's actually amazing. The food was awesome and so many options
Cute place.  Italian Beef sandwich was not very good though.

Yum! I have had this place bookmarked for some time since I live a few minutes away. So glad we tried it! The owner and staff are extremely nice and helpful - they even sent me home with a menu and let me know I could call in my order ahead of time to avoid waiting (but it's worth the wait!).

The food is amazing! Definitely one of the best hamburgers I've ever had. I ordered a single patty Teriyaki Mushroom Burger.  It was juicy and full of flavor! The french fries were obviously homemade, cut fresh and just cooked - so good! I also tried the fried mushrooms and they were awesome. 

The cost for the teriyaki burger, a triple cheeseburger, two fries and fried mushrooms was only $17. Sweet!

Check out Benny's if you're in the mood for an awesome hamburger at a great price!

Excellent service. The owner came by due to a mixup with scheduling, because they thought we needed a price for a new unit. We only needed an estimate on repair, and so he waived the diagnostic fee and sent someone back out an hour later. The person who came out quoted us a very reasonable fee, fixed everything we needed, checked to make sure it was working, and was very courteous and friendly. We'll keep you in mind in the future for any HVAC work. Thank you!

Extremely friendly & inviting owner. Waitstaff is courteous. Customer Service orientated. Food freshly prepared. Fresh ingredients. Made to order. Cleanliness is top notch. The atmosphere very relaxed. Authentic, delicious hamburgers. Served anyway you like. Customizable to your preference. Ribs, Calamari, Pot Stickers, Salt & Pepper wings are amazing.

To start, this place has amazing customer service. But after that you have great fries, onion rings, and shakes. 

I have yet to expand into the real menu, but so far with what I've tried the food is good and the mom and pop service makes me smile and want to come back.

I only wish that they were open later.

Chris came to my home fixed the problem and educated me all within an hour! I love learning about things in my home.  He really made this stressful situation more tolerable! Thank you so much!  

Alicia Hodges
Very unprofessional agent and especially the broker.  Just a mean minded person.  I had the money and they treated me like crap.  Greedy greedy greedy.

My AC/Heater quit working one day so I called a few companies and had them come out and troubleshoot the problem.  I also had them provide me with a quote for replacing the whole thing.  The first company said that a circuit board was bad and wanted over a thousand dollars to replace it. They said that I would be better off going with a whole new AC because there would probably be other parts going bad which were hard to find for my unit. They're quote was insane over $12,000 and they bugged the heck out of me by calling me 5 to 8 times a day worse than a car salesman.

I called Bell Air Conditioning and set an appointment for a quote.  Dan called me when he was 30 mins out and arrived on time.  He looked over everything and gave me an affordable quote. He was professional and patiently answered all my questions. We set up an appointment for the job and two of his techs came out to do the job. That morning the crew got stuck in a huge traffic jam due to a fatal accident caused by a wrong way driver. Someone from Dan's office called to advise me that the crew would be a little late.  The crew called me a short time after that and gave me the exact time of their arrival. 

These two techs were a couple of the nicest guys you'd ever want a meet. They were very professional, respectful, and hard working. When they finished they cleaned up just great. They briefed me on the new unit and thermostat and answered all my questions.  We were totally satisfied with the work and the new unit. I strongly recommend that you call Bell Air Conditioning when you have Airconditioning and Heating issues. Thank you Dan and crew.

Great Burgers!  Taste like you grilled them yourself in the back yard.  Friendly staff and your food is never made before you order!

YUMMMMMMM

Fabulous, honest, and forthright company...WOW!!! Jimmy Wilson was my service man. He is "THE BEST" as far as I am concerned he "walks on water." I called at 6 PM and Jimmy was at my house an hour later!! He fixed, checked out everything...all for the cost of their $50.00 service call. This is one hell of a company...and especially for turn around service time. I will deal with no other from this point forward trust me, except for BELL AIR. Thank you!!! Victoria Kollert/SCGrand

Very friendly and knowledgeable Staff, short wait times. 
Started with Dr Dai for primary care and now also for weight loss. 11 pounds gone in 2 weeks! So happy to finally find something that works. Highly recommended!
Big shout out to bell I as they know I recommend them to anyone great company I'm very happy good job guys thank you !!!!!!!!!!

I knew what I needed, but didn't know the name of the product or where in the store I might find it.   A very pleasant and helpful lady, Rhonda,  told me to just stay where I was and she went to the other end of the store and brought back just what I needed.....and it was quite inexpensive.   I had great experiences before.  This is my go-to hardware store.

Fox Family Dental is absolutely the very best. I have been going to them for fifteen years. Dr. Fox has helped me out of several dental challenges.  The office staff is friendly and always helpful. You can't go wrong with trusting your dental needs to Dr. Fox and his staff. Thank you for keeping my smile beautiful for a lot of years!!!
Friendly and knowledgeable associates, store is very clean and carries a good selection of SKU unfortunately they didn't have what I was looking for.

After getting a quote on getting our air condition replaced we decided to go with Bell Air Conditioning.  The guys came in all of them polite, at 8:00 AM on a weekday morning and by 5:00 pm had completely replaced my unit and had the new one up and running. 
The only reason I do not give them 5 stars is because there was an issue with the unit where it would run for a day and then cut itself off saying that service needed to be called. Mike one of the service manager who came out to check the issue checked different things and finally with him and Trane narrowing down what was happening with the unit they fixed the issue and I have had no further issues and everything is running very efficiently. My wattage use in my home has dropped by half and living in Arizona in the summer time that is a great savings on your wallet!
One other thing, the owner of the company Dan called and then kept in touch with me until the issue was fixed and I was satisfied and even extended all of my warranties for my inconvenience.
For fast quick and quality work and people who treat you with respect I would call Bell Air every time. 

Alex I.
Well, it is McDonalds. I don't usually care for fast food but I always go there for the coffee. I love their coffee!

Delicioso! Fast and friendly service at a family restaurant. Fresh. Most of the food is cooked from scratch when you order.  Standard decor, but the food is tasty, and excellent. Nicely spicy, but if you want flame-thrower hot, Don Jose's is probably not for you.  Try one of the combination plates.  Don Jose's is the real deal, and it will probably become among your favorites, as it is mine. Buen provecho!

Spoke with Dan the owner.  Told him what my issue was, meaning that my A/C isn't working.  He advised me that he will send a technician out, time frame 7-10 PM.  His technician Chris came out at 6:37 PM, ahead of scheduled time, which is a big plus in 100 degree weather, and got the unit fixed in a matter of minutes.  Great company, fast service, and very reliable.  If you need an HONEST service, this is the place to choose.  Keep up the good work.
Very friendly staff,  clean, secure, and reasonable.  Great hours and easy to get into the storage shed.
