First time going to Benny's and I ordered the Mexican Burger double Jack Cheese no American and OH MY GOODNESS!!!!  So delicious!!!  My husband had the Double Classic and it was yummy as well!!  Their french fries were good.  The people that waited on us were so friendly and very helpful when asking questions about the menu.  I will support this local business and look forward to going back, that Fish Sandwich is calling my name!!

I really liked this store and purchased a lot of things there. I was in today and was buying a desk and file cabinet for about $350. I was trying to use my free delivery coupon which says minimums may apply. The woman behind the desk told me the minimum was $500 for free delivery. I commented that I knew the free delivery part was going to go squirrelly on me. She then took the offensive, saying she didn't appreciate my insinuating that she was doing a squirrelly deal, etc. WOW!!!  I think she's either a very unhappy person, or maybe has some psychological issues. At any rate, she has a piss poor attitude and I will never set foot in this store again. I don't know her name , but I think it begins with D. What a shame. Some of the other employees are very nice, especially Alex. Because of this sorry-ass employee, she blew a sale and the store lost a very good customer.

I have experienced nothing but professionalism and expert service with Bell. Jesse called ahead of time to let me know he was on his way. When he arrived he was knowledgeable and personable which can be difficult to find. I am still in the process of working with Bell but have only positive experiences at this point.

This place has amazing Mexican food! Jose is very nice and always smiling and ready to help you! If your looking for excellent food, service, and a all around good place to eat this is the place you want!!! Family owned and operated. Tell them Chris from Peoria Kia sent you! You won't regret it!!
Great affordable service. I overheard JJ say that his shop has been open for 16 years and it shows. Awesome unique old time barber shop decor. Cash only.

Wonderful service. Dan, the owner,  is a stand up guy and extremely professional. They came out when they said they would and were very straightforward. Their card is on my fridge. I would highly recommend.

My dad has been talking about how good the food is here. So in this visit we made a stop for lunch. The burger was excellent and the fries were so fresh!  Service was fantastic and it is no wonder this is a neighborhood favorite.
Great place for BBQ Ribs.  John smokes them on site.  BBQ sauce is plentiful and tasty.  Not fancy, but very good and reasonably priced.

Overpriced and lacking customer service skills.  Fun to look around, but wouldn't waste your time offering them anything other than sticker price. A true disappointment that the lady behind the counter had such an unprofessional demeanor that this was my first and last time in this store.

Yelp did it again! Never would have noticed this place without all of the amazing reviews.  So...the hardest part was what to try first!  I live a bit away from here and didn't want to waste my first visit, so....RIBS PLEASE!!

I got the sampler, thought I would just eat 3 ribs and fries then try their single patty burger.  NOPE!  Not the way it worked at all.  Those 3 ribs were so big and filling that not only did I not have any room for a burger, but that's all I needed for dinner and the rest of the night.  in 2 words FILLING, TENDER.

Now my hangup on fries, I love them crispy.  VERY crispy and everywhere I go I always ask for fries cooked well done...(about 10% of the time they actually come out like that after I ask) Well.... at Benny's you don't even have to ask.  They properly cook their fries from the start.  Food may take a few minutes longer than the "Ronald McMoney" scene but it's well worth it.

Friendly service
Great food cooked tender where it should be and crispy where it needs to be.
See you next time!!

Kim is my favorite aesthetician! She knows what she is doing and is very good at it. I love the times I visit her for services since she's a great person as well. As far as the services go, I love her 5 in one facial and I have referred her to so many people and she's a hit with all of them. Kim takes her time to understand the key problem areas on your skin and uses her years of experience and knowledge to  advise you accordingly. All and about she is definitely my go to person for skincare.
Not much for decor, but the food is amazing.
Burger was cold . The owner bought out fries then saw that we only got ordered two orders then took the extra back inside ! Was he gonna re serve them ? Scary

I broke a tooth over the weekend and called the next Monday morning. Even though it was not an emergency, Dr Fox was able to get me in Monday afternoon.  I figured I needed to schedule any actual work to repair the tooth, for a later date, but he worked me in and started the crown process right away.  I was out in less than an hour with a temporary crown. It was by far the easiest crown prep dental procedure I have had. Thanks Dr Fox for your skills! I highly recommend the office staff and Dr Fox!

I had been craving a good juicy burger and was recommended this place by a co-worker. I like my burgers to be juicy with a soft toasted bun and melted cheese and this place exceeded my expectations! The owner was a very nice man and you could tell he is passionate about food through our conversation and the delicious burger. I will definitely be back, I think next time I'l try the pastrami burger.
Love this place. Love the food. Love the service. Love the older gentleman at the counter. It's nice to see people be passionate about their business.
Dr. Dai is not only personable but thorough. I feel I can ask her anything and she'll give me the time I need. Paula.

When you live in Phoenix, Arizona during the summer months and your AC goes out upstairs... I suggest calling Bell Air Conditioning FIRST! I choose Bell after reading the many satisfied reviews on yelp and google+. I knew this would be our new air conditioning company. They arrived on time and repaired the issue to our ac unit quickly(like less than an hour). We had cool air within minutes and on a 100 degree day that is beyond important. Thanks Bell!

Wow, what a manly place for a manly cut!  They start cutting at 6 am.  I made it late in the day around 10 am or so for a haircut and there was a full line of guys sitting there in line for a haircut.  All but one had gray hair or nearly no hair, generic brand white sneakers with velcro instead of laces, and those gold or stainless wristwatches that has a digital time display.

Cool pricing scheme:

Senior haircuts: $9
Non-Seniors: $10
Haircut with wife helping out: $20
Haircut with wife telling barber what to do: $40

Walls are completely covered with military aircraft, and an assortment of patriotic phrases and such are scattered as well.  

My cut was professional - accurate to my request, quickly done, with a back of neck shave at the end... and minimal B.S. chit-chat that you get elsewhere.  

Get in, get a cut, get out...
Five stars.  A classic old school barber shop.  Good haircut, nice guys and good prices.  Recommended.

Was in the area and decided to try it for lunch after checking the reviews, I was surprised, it was a pretty damn good burger, love the large fries  
I went to this place years ago & wasn't that good, never went back, glad I gave it another shot, must be new ownership.

I've probably eaten my last burger from McD after this.  Crew locks you in at 10:00 after I asked the cashier if people can finish or what. Quarter-pounder was tasteless, and it looks like they are understaffed, as usual.  This restaurant is always a bathroom for about 15 people who stop and piss in 30 minutes there.  Owner did a 6-month restore and build with no improvement.  I liked it before when there was tv.  Now he has some big structure above the drive-through they worked on for months  that does nothing and is not storage.  I keep looking to see what the reason was for all that, but there isn't any.

I was really hoping nobody would review JJ's.  Shame on you two!

My only complaint - the price goes up in the winter.

Wow!  Bell AC is awesome!  Our AC died in the hotest part of the day & within 2 hours JAKE was here!  He got us up & running & had the best attitude & personality!  There was no pressure & his first concern was to cool our home!  Yay!  We finely have a company & repairman we can trust!  We HIGHLY recommend Bell AC!!

If you're looking for the quietest nail salon EVER I highly recommend visiting this place.  Go late afternoon after the Sun City folks are done with their appointments there.  Owners Annie and Peter were the sweetest and very personable.  It's not like other salons where they're speaking another language and you have no clue what they're saying about you.  I will definitely be returning.
I love this place. The food is good and inexpensive. The people who work there are very friendly.

Our air went out on 4th of July. They were able to come out in about 5 hours and Chris was professional and quickly fixed the problem. The problem was our condenser fan motor went out. Reason for 3 stars is the cost, we paid almost $700 just to replace a motor. This seems a bit high considering you can buy the parts for around $100.

This is the worst dental office I've been to ever. The staff is very rude and unprofessional, especially the older blonde receptionist. The oral surgeon, who I went to see has no bedside manner. He didn't hear what I had to say and only wanted to do do it his way. I left the office and refuse to get any sort of procedure done there or any other sunwest office. These people are the reason why most people no are scared of the dentist. The only reason I'm giving them a star is because I have to.

What a find!  Was in the area looking for a small local place for a quick lunch and stumbled upon Benny's.  First of all, Benny is THE NICEST GUY!  Someone you want to support.

They have a variety of burger options, but what intrigued me the most was the spicy Korean taco combo.  Short ribs in a sort-of-spicy sauce, not overbearing served in a crispy shell.  Kind of a taco banh-mi.  Served along with 3 pot stickers and sauce.  Killer good.

I'll go back every time I'm in the area, or go out of my way when near to eat there.

Good Job!

GB

Summers worse nightmare. Hottest day of the year and the middle of the afternoon my a/C stopped working. First called a recommendation from a neighbor. They could not get here for 3 days. Next call was to George Brazil. Could not service us till the following day after 2pm. Called Bell Air Conditioning and they were able to get a technician to my house in 90 minutes. Jeff was the man that showed up at my door earlier then their office said. He was very polite and knew what he was doing. In less then 30 minutes we were back in working order. $50.00 service call which was the least expensive of all 3 calls. Price for parts and labor was very reasonable and even offered a 3 year warranty and discounted prices. Priority service calls. They also come twice a year to prevent any major problems. Will recommend them to any one and every one. Can not sing there praise enough.
Mary Ann D. Sun City West

Walked in and walked right out the owner is very rude. Tried to get my hair cut and show the guy what I wanted and was met with a terrible attitude. So much for a military haircut. Veterans don't treat other Veterans with this level of disrespect.

Trying to figure out what all the good reviews were about... Meat was good, no complaints there. Chili and cheese were something like you would expect from a little league concession stand. Definitely not worth the money, I haven't visited since.

We needed to find a storage facility right away. Looked on Yelp, this was the first one we called. Checked it out. Very clean, organized and reasonably priced.   Had a good selection of spaces as well.
My husband wanted s straight forward haircut. They did a great job and will be returning!

This restaurant may not look like much, but it definitely is! The food is great. I had a burger & fries which tasted very fresh. The customer service was AMAZING! The gentleman putting the orders together was very friendly. He was even willing to make food accommodations for my son. Great food and great customer service is my kind of place! Will definitely be back.

Bennys is like a old girlfriend, we've been through the best and the worst together. To start the best is food how the menu is so far and beyond anything around. But I have had hit or miss occasions and I've heard horror stories and glory stories so until consistency pervales  good luck

Love, love, love this place.  From the outside it looks like a place I probably would not eat t.  One burger and fries and I'm in love!!  I would not bother eating a burger anywhere else.  I would just wind up being sad that it was not a Benny's burger!!!  Go once and be hooked!  They also have a lot of different stuff on their menu, I've never been willing to forgo the burger!!

Don't waste your time in this establishment. You will regret it, I did. The jeweler acted like he had a bunch of knowledge but he kept looking at the appraisal and the rings and pushing buttons on the calculator and coming up with all kinds of excuses about how he wouldn't sell the ring, he would take the diamonds out and put it in another setting. Full of crap story and offered scrap value. I took it to a respectable establishment and left.

We've been taking our cats here for nail trimming for about 2 years. Denise & Gill are FABULOUS! Their prices are reasonable and their service is fast and our cats have not had any problems. I am recommending taking your cats or dogs here. You won't be disappointed!
Good food,great service,fair prices. I really like the Italian sausage with peppers and onions,of course you can't go wrong with the Chicago Dog

Real deal Mexican, check what you think at the door and enjoy the heart of all great Mexican dishes is the love put into the food and my friends let me tell you I will drive from Mesa too Don Jose's and back get the #17 w/corn tortillas. Then get back in the car and drive all the way back it is that freaking amaxing.....OH and just so you know this is like all great Mexican take a ways you have too get your own damn salsa, so don't be a jerk and leave a one star rating because your not wise enough to get your own. . But with all seriousness best no frills serious great Mexican homemade food, oh and try the tortillas when warm and chewy with the refried and rice some of that steak shrimp and o ions in that sauce... Oh wait I have more in front of me bye. Nom nom nom.
Stopped in one evening to try them out. Oh, my!! We both had the Mexican hamburgers. They was fantastic. Good fries, too. We will definitely be back to try another great hamburger.

What  can I say about this place, it's like any other Ace Hardware. Not going to be the cheapest. But it always gets you out of a pinch.
This location is conveniently located at the west side of Surprise. This area is in the middle of growing, and eventually there will probably have a big box hardware store built in this area soon. 
I like coming here only because I don't feel like driving to Grand  for Lowe's or Home Depot. Most of the time, Ace has what I am looking for. They actually have hard to find items that Lowe's or Home Depot does not have.
Is Ace Hardware better then Lowe's or Home Depot? NOT! But I have no problem with them, always great service, always convenient,

I moved to the area a few months ago I found this place on my phone. It is close by my house so I thought I had found a groomer for years to come. BUT when I picked up my dog he was in obvious pain and he looked at me like he was just tortured. His tail was  broken and he no longer likes to have it touched something he enjoyed prior to his visit to diamonds in the Ruff. 

Stay away!!!!  Terrible customer service as well!!

If this is the one near chase bank and across from Starbucks they always have a line and 80% of the time I either don't get what I ordered or drive off with someone else's meal. What's strange is my change due is always correct. 
I've complained to them but they just blow it off. They tell me they are one of the busiest locations.....

They were great. I had a living social coupon for routine inspection and maintenance check. They arrived on time and were very personable. He went right to work completing the inspection. Incidentally, I had noticed my electric bill had gone sky high the previous month but I didn't mention it to this guy. He then told me he had found a leak in my unit, and wanted to fix it, no extra charge to me, even though I expected to pay for anything above just an inspection and cleaning. Sure enough my electric bill was low again the next month and my AC didn't seem to be working as hard. I was very impressed!

EXCELLENT SERVICE!!
I have been using this Company for over 10 years. They have been there for my family and I without hesitation. My A/C went out, and I was in dire straights. I called them right away and I was amazed how they fit me in without an appointment, or the very next morning.
 They have compassion beyond any Company I've ever needed..... With their friendly, professional and caring service, they went above and beyond anyone. 
So, If you want reliable, fast on the fly service, along with great prices. No need to look further. You need to call Bell Air Conditioning/ HVAC and they won't ever let you down.
Thank you Bell A/C, for making my life less stressful....
Sirena T. Cameron

I was pleasantly surprised when I visited Don Jose's, the food was actually pretty good!  My order was the carne asada plate, that and a bottle of Diet Coke was just over nine bucks, a little pricy I thought, but I grabbed some of their salsas and sat down.  My order arrived quickly and the portions were big, I left STUFFED and I couldn't even finish everything.  The beans were a little looser than I would have preferred but tasty nonetheless.  The carne asada was well seasoned, chopped up into chunks with no mystery gristly fat pieces.  Came with a good scoop of guacamole, rice, beans, and a steamin' bundle of tortillas.  My only gripe is that they don't give you chips to go with the salsas-you have to buy a bag.
I enjoyed everything and would certainly return when I'm in the land of the blue hairs :)
Nice hole in the wall restaurant. really good burgers and has some good ribs as well.

When shopping at Sun Vally Quilts we often stop at Don Jose. The restaurant is a part of a rather dismal strip mall and the inside of this place is pretty much what you would expect. 

But it is inexpensive with decent food and a lot of it. 

The guy taking orders is very nice and concerned for his customers. He deals with the older crowd from Sun City very well. Helpful does not say enough.

It is too bad they can not control the other customers conversations as we had the luck to overhear about eight bovine brained men making fun of the now married gay folks in California and the current situation.

Hats off to Bell. Definitely worth the time and money. By the way, very reasonable prices. I called on a Saturday (the 120 degree one) after a competitor (Parker and sons) cancelled on us. Jeff the tech was out within a couple hours. We were having a lot of water come out of the unit causing water damage etc etc. Basically what you would consider a severe situation. After 4 companies came out and "fixed" it, problem was still there.  Jeff shows up, very laid back and not what I was expecting. His general relaxed hey it's not a big deal attitude had my guard up. Basically he was throwing off the old whatever attitude. Man was I wrong, I just don't speak HVAC. I think that's all he speaks. This guy is a pro. Based on the reviews of Bell, I am positive their hiring process is spot on and anyone of their employees could do the job. But if we ever have any issues I'm asking for Jeff. 

By the way, after what we thought was Armageddon AC style, it turned out to be an issue with too much freon in the unit causing the coils to freeze and dump water. Jeff was primed and ready for me to pay up the Yazoo to just get it fixed. Instead he threw me for a loop. One small service charge with a couple of hey you may want to address this soon issues. Not pushy, very professional and in my opinion would give Jeff and Bell 6 stars if I could.
Absolutely LOVE these ladies . Best in town and so much fun to laugh and chat with them!!  They are experienced and knowledgeable of alterations and fabrics. We take everything to them

I am a gringo so I usually have a problem with Mexican food. But Don Jose's is perfection. I usually have the Carne Asada  and it is delicious every time. The fish tacos are huge! The wait is minimal and the staff is friendly. When I crave Mexican food I go to Don Jose's. Some day I might have the guts to order #20

Not real busy, very clean and everything is made to order, nothing pre-made.
No Drive-in, orders brought to your table.
We got there about 11:30 a.m. and a.m. I glad we did, it got extremely busy around noon, but no one waited long for there orders.
Chicken strips and cheeseburger were very good.
Highly recommended

Just stumbled over this place.
Had a double burger, couldn't finish it. Too big!
It was very good. Nice counter help.
I'll be back to try some other things they have. 
Fish fry, BBQ spare ribs, wings, hot dogs and salads. All that and more. I might rate it higher after I have checked out more of the food. 
This small place looks to be a winner!
My first pedicure ever.  And I'm hooked.  My feet look and feel fantastic.  I would recommend AP Nails to anyone.

Went in today got my first ever root canal, somewhat nervous but thanks to an amazing Dr Braxton and a wonderful assistant Olivia it went way better than I could have hoped.  I highly recommend them if you have anything you need done.

We recently purchased a condo in Sun City, Arizona, as a home base for my husband to obtain medical treatment via the Mayo Clinic and Banner Boswell Hospital's Rehabilitation program, so we have slowly began exploring the various recreation centers available to us.  During one of visits to the Bell Recreation Center, we discovered Memo's Bistro, and are we ever pleased.  

Memo's Bistro is located inside the building that houses the bowling, billards, and indoor shuffle-board courts.  Easy access to the restaurant is located at the back side of the buildings, where there is also free covered parking beneath the newly installed solar system panels.  

It was afternoon when we arrived at the restaurant, but the friendly waitress assured us we could order breakfast anytime, so I ordered the "sweet potato pancakes."  You see I've never encountered sweet potato pancakes in a restaurant, or any place else, in my entire life and my parents were raised in the South where sweet potatoes are a staple.  

To my great surprise, the pancakes were a culinary thrill.  Light, and ever so tasty.  Not sure I'll ever want a regular pancake again.  

Our entire dining experience was excellent, from the good tasting food, to excellent/friendly service, to the clean and welcoming interior.  All menu items were reasonably priced and check-out was easy.  

We will return to Memo's Bistro in the future, as I can't wait to order the sweet potato pancakes again.  Yummy!

I haven't had a pedicure in a long time, because it is hard to find a nail salon that will take the time to do a good job.  A friend suggested that we try this place, and it was a hit.  It is a family owned and the wife did my pedicure.  She took her time and I am pleased with results. 

The prices are reasonable.  I got the Luxury Spa package.  It was very relaxing and my feet feel great!  I have a new place to get my nails done!

This groomer is the worst place ever! We brought our dog in and when we picked him up he seemed to be sedated.  He was lethargic and was vomiting for 2 days.  The only reason I gave them 1 star is because yelp required a rating

The first time I visited with Dr Fialkoff at Sun West dental in Sun City I knew my four year search for an affordable local dentist was finally successful.  Dr Fialkoff is young enough to be enthusiastic about his work and know the latest techniques, yet has the experience that gave me confidence in having him undertake the extensive work I needed.  Over the past 2 months he's replaced 2 crowns, 2 bridges and performed a root canal.  The reasonable rates even made it possible for me to get two implants; an option I didn't think possible without going to Mexico with all the attendant risks.  Another factor in my satisfaction with Sun West is the positive atmosphere created by staff  who work as a team.  They're friendly, professional, and so obviously enjoy working together to provide patient-focused care.  Dr. Fialkoff and staff were particularly accommodating in scheduling appointments to minimize my anxiety.  I'm delighted with my new dental team.  If you're searching for a competent, affordable dentist in the Sun City area, you'll want to consider Sun West Dental.

I've been going to JJ's for about 5 years now.  As a Veteran I like going to a real barber shop that can give a good military haircut, shave your neck, trim nose hair and eye brows, etc.

JJ is a great guy that usually has a story or two for you.  Barber shop has plenty of military aircraft pictures on the wall and model airplanes hanging from the ceiling all providing for a good atmosphere.  Two TVs are usually on along with the newspaper and magazines to pass the time if they are busy.  $12 if you're under 65 like me, or $10 if you're a true senior citizen.

I highly recommend JJ's Barber Shop.   Stop in and give them a try.  No appointment necessary.

Chris Moore
Peoria, Arizona
Great Place! The owner is super friendly and the food is always fresh! Try their chorizo!

For years I have put off dental work because of my fear of pain and the last dentist I had years ago was very judgmental. Then I developed a pretty bad toothache and a friend of mine said you have to use Fox Dentistry. Wow, was she correct. I called Fox Dentistry and the receptionist worked me in for the first appointment time the very next morning. Dr. Fox gave me an initial exam and stopped the pain before they proceeded with x-rays. (BTW, it had been a while since I had x-rays; his office uses a stand up x-ray machine that doesn't require the card-film in your mouth.) Dr. Fox reviewed my x-rays with me and pointed out where my immediate problem was and let me decide on my treatment plan based on his recommendations. I hadn't had a deep cleaning in years and Mike (the hygienist) was not only was kind, gentle, and caring, but explained every detail he was doing; I felt no pain what so ever. The worst tooth required a root canal and crown, and again I thought that would be drawn out on at least two visits. Nope, he uses a 3D modeling instead of impressions that is computerized. Here was the best part; once he scanned the tooth (totally non-invasive) he walked me over to another computer where he explained how he would build the crown up to improve the bite. (I got to watch him do all this!) Next, that information went to the computerized machine that created the crown in about 15 minutes. Another part of the visit that blew me away was; I was never left alone in the treatment room for longer than a few minutes. Each one of his office staff would come in and ask me me how I was doing; did I have any questions, and just chatted with me. There was a 30 minute period while I was waiting for the crown to bake, and Jean came in and said; "You know, you can get up and walk around and stretch, you don't have to wait in here." I even went outside for 10 minutes, came back in and sat in the reception area until Dr. Fox came back out to get me. What I haven't mentioned so far is that I was a critical care nurse for 25 years. I can give you an expert opinion; any doctor who explains everything and allows YOU to make informed decisions is the doctor to keep. I was given very thorough discharge instructions and was told to call with any problems or questions. Dr. Fox gave me a prescription for pain medication in case I needed them. I had some slight discomfort during the night that was relieved with one pain med, and I woke up this morning feeling like a new person. I am not writing this review for Fox Dentistry, I am writing it for you, because you probably have the same fears I did. Don't put your problems off like I did; believe me, your fear is unfounded with Fox Dentistry. I would give them a ten if the scale went that high!
This McDonald's lies about their hours. I went through the drive through at 10:30 and they were closing when online says they close at 12.

This little place in  Sun City is as good as it gets if you grew up in a non-chain fast food era. It is all about homemade and handmade food, and the customer service is always friendly and accommodating. In decent weather, you can even sit outside and make as big a mess as you have to with their great food. For casual, familiar, and pure enjoyment -- this is the place.

Awesome food! JB recommended the spicy mango bacon avocado burger. I am so glad he did! It had just the right amount of spice and was oozing with the delicious sauce! The sweet potato fries were perfect! The mushroom burger was good too.  All were cooked fresh and worth the extra minute it took to prepare! We tasted the ice cream and now can't wait to go back for a shake! Enjoy!

Phil and his team were great. They were helpful and professional making a difficult time easy. No high power sales pitch just compassion. Would highly recommend them and would use them again if need arises.

I was impressed. They did such a good job at taking care of my bull dog. The report card they give is detailed enough to give you a good overview of how well your dog did as well as the kind of care your dog gets. At pick up my dog was happy energetic and content instead of trying to run out of the door. Their points system for getting a free night is a genius idea. I've never seen it at a pet lodge. Very professional and friendly staff. We're patient with me when I came to check out the facility prior to our dog staying and answered all my questions. Affordable, professional, friendly all in all an awesome experience.

Great ribs. 
Customer service is impeccable. 
Very friendly and happy Staff and owner ran. 
Been here couple of times always impressed and inexpensive.

Great place for a Burger or even Brisket!! We stopped on our way home and Benny himself was there and gave us top notch service! I had the Mexican Burger! It was perfection. Nothing fancy. Just great food!
JJ is a great guy, and goes the extra mile for customer service and to make sure you get the cut you want, and give the old school barber cut you're looking for.

This is  a great HVAC company based on my limited interactions with them.  I had an AC unit break down a few weeks ago, and they offered to come out right away.  Ultimately I had another HVAC company come out who did a good job as well.

I also asked for a quote for a repair, and Dan responded right away with a competitive price. Based on these interactions I plan to use Bell Air Conditioning for future HVAC work.  There are some good companies on Yelp, and some great ones.  

I'm encouraged that Bell Air Conditioning could be a great HVAC company I can rely on.  I will update this review once I have more experiences with them.

I stopped in for a snack and was immediately greeted with a huge smile and an impressive menu! After studying the menu for a really long time, I decided on the hot dog, onion rings, and I really wanted to try the ribs. Not wanting to purchase a full order, I asked if I could purchase just one- to see if I liked it. My answer was, yes! By the way, I will be back- the rib was fantastic! The hotdog was loaded Chicago style on a seeded bun. This place is awesome! The smile, the menu, and the great food are all reasons to go back!

Called to get my AC unit serviced. They were professional and up front with the cost. Jeff came out to service the unit, he too was professional and knowledgeable. I asked about the cost of replacing the unit in the event it stops functioning, he provided a competitive price without pushing the sale. I highly recommend this company!

I started coming to Benny's for lunch a few weeks ago and now I'm a solid regular. It's by far the best burger place around and has spectacular variety. They have calamari and fried fish to spicy mango bacon burgers to enchiladas. And they're all amazing. Today I went in and talked to the owner/chef who was super cool and I got a pastrami burger with jalapeños, a side of fried cheese curds, and some fried pickles. It was so good I had to write a review (which is rare for me considering how much I go out to eat). Check it out! Even if you don't like the weird stuff on their menu, the regular burger is still amazing.

I had the chicken chimichanga burrito it was tasty and flavorful.  The beans and rice are pretty good not a lot of seasoning but simple and not bland either.  My husband had the chili relleno burrito which was flavorful and delicious.  The chips werr ok and the salsas were fresh but a little on the bland side.
Bill the manager makes this place awesome. He is friendly, helpful and offer great advice about the area. Would highly recommend you stop by and enjoy the great service.
Great place to eat.  Excellent food, moderately priced & clean

This Starbucks is great!! They really take their customers time into consideration... I waited about two minutes for a mobile order and they handed me a gift card for my next drink! They wanted to be sure that I knew they appreciated my wait and didn't feel that was the norm there. 
Great customer service!!!!
This place makes great burgers. Love their Mexican burger with crispy fries and a milk shake. Good place for a fast food Friday night dinner

This place is amazing! Truly a diamond in the rough. If you are in the lower Surprise/Sun City area and have a hankering for great Mexican food, you NEED to stop by. Try the shrimp and steak burrito (I think it's called Tierra y Mar). You will not regret coming here. The rice and beans are some of the best I've ever had as well and the owner is SO pleasant.
wicked ass combover fade by kathy at jj's barbershop in sun city, az. the most legit american babershop i have been too in a long time! #usaalltheway

Love this place!! I love to support small game places. Very friendly owners and make you feel so welcome. Fast food service and always delicious!!!  The breakfast burritos are  excellent and my fiance loves the chorizo burrito.....Highly recommend and will definitely be back!!

Jim is a very honest man who works in integrity and does an excellent job in cleaning windows.  He was available right away when I called him, he was on time, courteous, very helpful as we were new in town and very professional.  He did such a fantastic job and he is a very honest man who does not charge enough for the work that he does, but if very humble. I highly recommend this company and will never goes elsewhere.
This was the first time using this facility and Bill was very helpful and a pleasure to deal with. Service was fast and efficient. A clean and secure facility!
This place is always my favorite! I love it so much, I use to always come here after school when I was super young (: they have the best burgers! I think I even like it better than In&Out

Fair rates and I called em out on a Saturday ! 
They were able to come out that same day and complete repairs. They were here when they said they would be. 
Tech (Jeff) was very courteous and efficient! 
Thank you for keeping it cool! 
I would totally recommend to a friend :-)

Holy crap!  Where has this place been all my life?   Really.  I'll put this place up against any chain in town.  Hand made and family owned.  This may even be worth a trip if you are not in the area.
Try 'em.  I think you'll agree.
best little mexican hole in the wall place around!

Service was great,  super friendly. Dining area very clean, kitchen area very clean.  Fries were great,  thick cooked perfectly auth a touch if seasoning salt.  Hubby had double cheese,  double has good meat to bun ratio. Decent burger.  I got the bbq  pulled pork... It's was super good, bbq had sweet & tangy flavor.  Under $20.00 for both of us.  Definitely w worth checking out.

Benny's is a good place to go for a burger. I tried the Italian Beef and it wasn't exceptional, only good, the beef seemed old. I tried the chicken wings 3 of 5 stars, the fryer grease tasted old that night. The fries were hot but not crispy (old fryer grease) and a frozen potato product. I gave 4 stars for the friendly staff and  decent fresh burgers.
I haven't tried the BBQ. I couldn't see any evidence that they were doing any smoking of meats. I had a Korean Taco Special which was plentiful and tasty.

After five visits, we are convinced that Don Jose's has the best value in Mexican food in the Sun City area.  Today we enjoyed a taco salad with pork, cheese & onion enchiladas, and rice. All were hot, delicious, and with ample portions. Free salsa bar with good selection of seasonings. 
Wide selection of regular and adult beverages. 
The owner is usually present to ensure quality food and service. 
We'll continue to come back. 
Sincerely,
Karen & Art Huseonica, Sun City, AZ

Great burgers & fries
Better than any fast food burger & fries, anywhere
Pricing is good, people are nice, service is quick for made to order.

THANX

We just LOVE Diamond Jim's Jewelry store in Sun City, AZ. I stopped by to see what time they closed and they had just closed but happily let me come in for a quick drop off to get my husband's necklace repaired . They were very accommodating and knowledgeable, fun too!!  I never worry about my jewelry when I leave it with them!  They do a fantastic job and i would recommend them to everyone . Thanks again James, you totally ROCK!!  Say Hi to Roy (whom I've nicknamed Diamond Jim ) and Miss Kim
Didn't really care for bbq beef brisket sandwich. Fries are good though, wish dey had fry sauce for there fries.

This place has a little bit of everything, but the burgers rock.  Try the Mexican or the saracha  bacon mushroom burger.  Tried the spicy  Korean steak tacos and they weren't bad either.  Great place.

Five stars for the delicious food.  Less for the interior but we don't really care about that when we are enjoying our food so much.  Their flour tortillas are the best ever (and I've made my own tho not as tasty as these),  We had tacos, tostadas, beans, and enchiladas and all were very good.  Don Jose's is one of the best values with great flavors.  Kudos to the chef!

This place does really good work. I'm 5', which means no dress ever made fits me correctly. I've brought four dresses here so far, and every time I've been happy with the result. Pricing is fair and turn-a-round time is fast.
Had some nice furniture and had some outdated furniture. The sales people were nice to talk to and pleasent.

This place is a hidden gem. The owner is very friendly and the green sauce is the best I have ever had. We have had a few items and they have all been delicious. The tamales are top notch and the burritos are filling without being overly large. Everything is fresh and the restaurant is clean.

Overpriced. The ribs were not good at all, couldn't tell if I was eating meat or fat. The pulled pork sandwich  was low quality ad well. The fried mushrooms and fries would be the best part of the meal. I would avoid if you want good bbq .

I have been going to Dr. Fox for a few years and always liked him. I recently had a dental emergency. His office staff was terrific in getting me right in to see the doctor. He was terrific, as always, as was his staff. They were very kind and professional. There is NO OTHER dental practice that I would ever go to!

Awful! Avoid like the plague. I had a sleep study done at Infinity Sleep Solutions and they referred my DME order to Valley Respiratory Services which happens to be their sister company. I have insurance but use an HSA to pay for everything and because we have to pay our deductible before getting services paid for by insurance we had to pay for my cpap machine and mask. Well I received an appointment to go to their store which is in Sun City by the way I live in the North East part of Phoenix so quite a drive for me. With three small kids in tow we arrived. The office wasn't very friendly or helpful. I had appointment to pick up my machine and to be shown how it worked. Now to the point of this review. I was quoted on the phone by them that the total would be $1000. When I got to their office they wanted me to pay $1400. No one there knew why I was quoted the wrong amount. Well I needed my machine desperately so I paid half and would pay the other half later. Upon further inspection at home and after surfing the web for information I was charged an extra $1000 for the machine and mask. My insurance paid $500 and I would have to pay the other $1400, so $1900 total. I returned everything and ordered the same machine and mask online for only $900. That was three weeks ago, I'm still waiting on them to refund my money. On the receipt I noticed that they were charging for the machine, the humidifier, humidifier chamber, the mask, the tubing, the headgear, and the filters ALL separate, which shouldn't be done since they're bundled items. These people are scam artists trying to make money off people, they should be charged with fraud.

Please don't give these people your business. Only one person came out to the house to pick up my loved one's body. He couldn't get the gurney in the room, so he left it in the hall and said he would need help carrying the already stiffened body out of the room. My family members agreed to help, but it bothered them to do so. Totally unprofessional. Should have had two guys come out. After talking on the phone to the mortuary and telling them what was needed, I was quoted a package price. Next day at my scheduled appointment, I was shown the coffin included in the package that I was planning to purchase. It was literally made of cardboard. I and my family were appalled. I was told I couldn't just upgrade to a nicer coffin. I would have to upgrade the entire package. This is what I did, even though I didn't need other things offered in the higher package. I wasn't prepared with that much money with me. I had to go to the bank and borrow money from family members, which made me feel terrible. When the day came to bury my loved one, we were told we only had a half hour time slot at the cemetery. Everyone arrived early. Fifteen minutes after it was supposed to have begun, the hearse comes speeding in with the body. There was absolutely no apology. The service was so short because of this. After (as we were taking photos), the guy starts rolling the coffin away and loading it up in the hearse. My family was so upset. He dropped the coffin off around the way, and left. It's too bad that these are the last memories surrounding my loved one who is gone. If you want a company who cares, find another mortuary.

This Mexican food restaurant is a gem!  My cousin that lives near us recommended it to us years ago, why we did try it until recently is beyond me because we were missing out!  The food is cooked to order.  My husband loves having their breakfast burrito for dinner.  I enjoy the quaint dinning area and how the owner remembers not only our order, but who we are and some little facts about us.  We will be customers for life!

This business needs to take a group class in what customer service is, because they sure as heck don't give beans about satisfying customers. Shoddy work, refusal to honor their 30 day satisfaction guarantee, and an owner who's rude to the customer. I wouldn't let them fix a torn potholder!

Fantastic service and support. I walked in and Bruce could not have been more accommodating. I had spoken to him and Katherine on the phone and knew the size of storage I thought I needed. Bruce showed me a map location, we picked a site and checked it out. The price was right and I could not have been happier. First class service at a fair price. What more could you ask for?

I just learned the hard way what you can pay with a large conglomerate funeral company. We just paid 7 times more for a basic cremation in another state. I called John Perkins today an he was more than willing to take the time to explain their fees. I strongly suggest talking to them before you need them. Pre plan now. Don't think there isn't major prices differences for the same services. Regency is a father and son business. They still have excellent prices. All I can say is, plan now. Check around for prices before you need them and believe me, you will be happy you did. Regency Mortuary is worthy of your business. John Perkins is a very nice man.

I found my new seamstresses! I needed a dress altered in a hurry and these ladies were amazing. They were very pleasant and the work was perfect (and fast). I'm so grateful they fit me in and even helped me with a pair of shorts that I needed un-cuffed. I'll be back and I highly recommend you give them a try.
Very friendly staff, always welcoming, letting you choose the size of your combo drink for the same price, and great fries and burgers! Always happy with this place.

Been to Don José 10 times.  Super good food.  Love their beans, chimichanga and chips.  On orders to go call and food is ready in 7 minutes. Great prices.  Not a fancy place so I'd order to go if you can.

Don Jose's is a small restaurant but you feel welcomed the minute you hit the door. I had 3 rolled tacos with rice and beans. My thoughts was the food was good but very bland. So first time Mexican food diners would love it, and probably because the location is in Sun City the bland is in demand. The next time I will order something more authentic.
Delicious, authentic, friendly. Love this place. Will definitely be back. Had the steak rancheros. Flavorful. Love the pickled carrots and peppers at the salsa bar.

PSYCHOPATHIC GUN THREATENING BARBER!!!! NEVER take your business here. I received the worst haircut I have ever seen from the older woman. She was rude and her hands shake so bad she has to use both of them on the clippers. When she was done I explained to her that it was certainly not the haircut I was looking for, in hopes something could be done to at least smooth it out. She was extremely unaccepting of feedback, and became noticeably upset when I asked her to try and fix it.

The older male barber next to her was also becoming increasingly upset and began to throw around his scissors and other items at his work station. He was muttering explicatives and profanities under his breath and his behavior was borderline threatening. I offered to pay and leave, but was met by more obscenities from both barbers. I was again yelled at and told, "Next time go to the fu*#@&%# mall!"  I grabbed my keys and as I left I reiterated to the two that this was the worst experience and worst haircut I have ever seen. The older male barber yelled at me, "Oh you want to see something!?! I'll show you something!" He thrust open a drawer and pulled out a gun and chased me as I exited the building. He stood in the doorway breathing heavily, gun in hand, with a crazed look on his face.

Again, DO NOT EVER visit this establishment. The old man is clearly suffering from psychosis and is a violent and threatening member of this community. The police have been contacted and also the AZ licensing board to help shut this place down.

Dr Dai is very professional.  She communicate in a manner we understand.  He is a great listener, empathetic to the concerns
of patients.  She is interested in her patient as human being, not 
just information on a chart.  She is warm and cultured.  She is caring,
kind and gracious.  Thank you Dr.Dai.
BERTILIA G.
Awesome little family owned restaurant! Loved seeing this amidst all the other chain restaurants in the area. We've been a couple of times now and every they make is delicious!

Best Mexican food hands down
Been going here for years and always stop on the way back from
Costco
Great menu and real authentic Mexican cuisine 
Combo specials and great homemade salsa's
Yum

Very impressed!  Our AC wasn't working right and in July that is not a good thing.  The home warranty repair company was a week out from being able to come so I called Bell.  Didn't even look up reviews for them..they were the first that came up in my search. I called at 10am and they were able to come out this afternoon on a holiday! Chris was on time and friendly and he was able to get our AC working properly and completed the repair quickly.  We paid for the repair out of pocket and the cost was very reasonable. Highly recommend Bell Air Conditioning!!

if you are looking to spend some money on a bike for your kids this is the wrong place to go. There are some BMX pro type kids hanging out commenting on everything you look at and no one to help. The owner or managers basically seemed not to care when bringing to their attention.

Hands down best hole in the wall mexican food. Their el pastor tacos are the best i've had. In addition, the owner made a special, request only, spicy sauce. A drip will definitely make a spice enthusiast tap out. If you want the challenge come here. 

Overall, i am very satisfied with my order, quality won me over! I will definitely be coming back here more often.

Happy 4th of July...and the AC goes out!!! Contacted Bell air conditioning, and they were out within 2 hours and fixed in less than 30 minutes! Thank you for your quick, friendly and efficient service, Chris!!

I could never recommend the services of Regency Mortuary, the facility that handled the remains of my mother who was found dead at her home in January 2017 under what appears to be suspicious circumstances. All of her valuables and family heirlooms had been removed from her home by the time I learned of her death from a neighbor who took the initiative to contact me with the indication things did not appear right at her home. I learned the remains of my mother were cremated four days after her body was discovered by Regency Mortuary without notification or discussion with me or any of our many biological family members. Pursuant my inquiry, I was told by an agent of Regency Mortuary the cremation was purportedly authorized by the husband of my mother and/or his daughter and did not provide me with information regarding the whereabouts of her remains. This woman had been estranged from my mother and her husband for many years, has no biological connection to my mother, had spent minimal time around my mother, has a record of abuse, and is a woman whom my mother claimed she did not trust. According to public records, Regency Mortuary is currently owned by John and Phil Perkes. I contacted Phil for additional information and explained that my mother died under suspicious circumstances. I made it very clear that I did not intend to hold Regency Mortuary accountable for the manner in which her remains were handled and that the purpose of my call was to seek information not provided to us. Phil provided me with little information other than to rudely claim Regency Mortuary was covered [legally] after having received authorization to cremate her body. He then abruptly ended the call with the remark that he would not speak with me further and that additional communications would be handled by legal counsel. I question why this Mortuary would hastily cremate her body without qualifying the reason for the urgency for doing so, particularly when there was no announcement, service planned, or communication with biological family members. My mother had lived in the Phoenix Metro area since 1960 and certainly had many friends and family. Why did Phil not consider the manner in which her cremation was ordered as unusual and worthy of further inquiry on his part? I am of the opinion an experienced facility would have recognized the possibility of an agenda and take the initiative to contact a biological family member.  A simple Internet search would have revealed that I am her biological daughter along with my contact information. A telephone call offering condolences would have taken little time and effort on his part. I would have been very appreciative and grateful, as would our family, to know of her death prior to cremation. Our hearts will be forever broken over her death and that we were provided no opportunity to pay our last respects.

Unusual selection of foods that I can recommend with no reservations.
Everything is made with care and quality foremost. 

I love In-n-Out, but if I had the choice, this wonderful place would be where I ate all the time.

Extremely rude service. Unless I am retired or look like I will buy something nobody interested in helping me with selling my gold. Very curt and dismissive towards me. Took my gold elsewhere and sold it.  Will not go in here again.
I called them twice, more than a week ago, to set up a meeting to pre-plan my funeral. They never returned my call to schedule a meeting.

wow, the best burger i've ever had from a take out style place!

was in the mood for a burger and finally decided to give this place a try.  Stopped in about 7:30 and ordered 2 cheese burgers and some chilli cheese fries.  while waiting for my food the owner came out to say hi and we talked for a bit about BBQ and Smoking Meats.  he gave me a taste of the beef brisket and i will be ordering that next time i go in, the meat was amazing and the sauce was VERY flavorful.

The burgers were also amazing.  the quality of meat this place uses is awesome, not what is expected for a takeout style place and for the price (very inexpensive).  The mayo sauce is made in house and also very tasty too, these guys know how to BBQ!

I can't wait to go back and try some different menu items, i'm glad i decided to finally stop in!

This is an awesome little neighborhood place! I didn't have a burger but the ribs were great. My husband had the pulled pork sandwich and raved about it. He heard about this place from a friend so we thought we'd try it. Great decision! We will be back for sure. The peanut butter shake is yummy too!

Prices are reasonable. I was really impressed with the staff. They all are friendly and social. Plus they work together as a team. Even the owner came out and gave us a to go box. Can't wait to tell my friends about this restaurant. It was crazy to me how busy they were considering location but I understand why now.

This information comes from personal experience buying a used Kia Sedona in July 2015 from the owner Dan. He seemed like a trustworthy guy - he was friendly and seemed to be upfont about the history of the van and the previous owners. He stated that the van was checked out by a mechanic that works for a major local car dealer and does Dan's used car checks on the side. (Dan said he used to work in the car auction business and that he has friends still and he went into this business because he gets word of good vehicles and then has the auto mechanic friend check them before he sells them - all sounded legit - we were wrong!!!)  Dan stated that this van was in great shape and verified that it had been checked over by this mechanic and that it was in great condition needing nothing right then. A LIE!!! We did not bring in a mechanic to look it over beforehand because as everyone knows, this adds to the price if you have to look at several vehicles before you buy one. Guess what happened? Right - Our worst nightmare -- Within the first week of having it, the van had issues. We did have to take it to a mechanic - a certified one who also works on Barret Jackson cars so you know he has to be good - and this knowledgeable mechanic whom we had used for other car work in the past so we know he is quality - He hated to tell us the bad news that the van was going to need complete servicing because it had NEVER had a single servicing! The evidence showed that the van had all of the original parts and worn out elements, so it could not have ever been serviced. We communicated with Dan and hoped he would reimburse for this or do SOMETHING but all he said was that our mechanic must be wrong and that we could take it to his mechanic. We declined because WHY would you take a vehicle back to the same person who claimed it was fine and didn't need anything? Also, Dan did not offer to pay a penny - not a single cent back for the lie or the trouble! This cost us over almost $700 due to the labor intensive nature of all the servicing needed and the all of the parts etc.!!! What's more -- the van's AC QUIT in August so that is the second BIG whammy we got from this ordeal!!! Have any of you ever been so cheated that it makes you embarrassed to know and then admit you have been scammed? This is not a mean spirited review. It is the facts as it happened in our circumstance of buying a used vehicle from Dan at Saguaro Motor Inc - I don't get online or write much of anything but I felt I better do it so someone else may avoid going through the same thing. Make your own decision, but if you choose to do business here, then it is buyer beware.

Can't happen to anybody but us.... 112 degrees an our a/c fails. I call Bell Air at 1:25 pm an expect to hear, " we can't get to you till next week because of how busy we are". But no, I hear we will have someone there in 1-1 1/2 hours! The tech shows up (Jeff) in 1 hour, fixes are unit and we are back up bu 3:15 ( bad capacitor) Great service, great tech Jeff

Recently inherited a very old silver signet ring.  Not sure it was even wearable but took it in an asked them to do what they could.  It went from a dark gray beat up looking  ring to this (see picture). 


While there I noticed my wedding ring (49 years old) looked tired.  Now, better than new.  The selection of new and estate sale jewelry is very good.  I found a beautiful diamond ring there and bought it a half price for our 49th Wedding anniversary. 

All in all, great service, stock of jewelry, but best of all good prices and great work.
I'm going to update my review. Their food is good and well priced. It is what it is for a small mom and pop shop. Love coming for breakfast burritos!
Love coming here for burgers, fries, and milkshakes. The owner is always friendly. Outdoor seating is dog friendly, too!

I went into here with my wife over two weeks ago now I still have got a email back from McDonald's but we come in order our mcdouble one is only pickle and thee other is with no onion not that hard to mess up not were they busy at the time .. I called the store talk to Enrique he said next time I come in a will get my food reimbursed so as I went in aa week later the manager was complely rude to me ..I told her I've worked at McDonald's I know how it can get some times but she just wanted to have an attitude and think I never really had food that got messed up !!she didn't wanna believe me she texted Enrique instead of calling him and I kept insisting that he said my name would be wrote down some where ( and as I recall when I worked at McDonald's there was a red  book specifically for that ) she's like nah that's not how we do it here !!?? Why not it's easy now you've texted him waiting for a response ,wasting my time and energy while I have to go to work as you seen me in my uniform ..and proceeded to lolly-gag-around and not figure out where he had my name wrote down !!!! I don't want free food ,I don't want it Reimbursed ,I'm just stunned to see that that's how she runs her floor ,that's not management customer service she had .she was mean like no need to be im only coming in for my mcdouble a you co workers messed up on  ,I'm just probably won't ever eat here! -Allan

Probably the best you could ask for in dealing with a rough situation. Phillip was very caring and sensitive and made the entire process simple and easy to understand. I hope that you don't need a funeral home but if you do this is a great place

Just relocated to the area and needed a place to store my motorcycle trailer.  Sun City Bargain Storage popped up in my search and made the process quite simple by allowing me to make my reservation online.  When I went to the facility all the info they needed was already provided so my time spent actually getting everything set was brief, basically just needed to verify the data.  That, coupled with the manager's friendly attitude, made the whole process painless.

Montys is a diamond in the rough! A true unique find in Sun City one where you are sure to find something to fall in love with! The staff are warm and welcoming. They were patient with me and very understanding of my budget! I will be returning and I highly recommend this store to others in Arizona who are looking for furniture or something unique for their home!

You are eating at a diner connected to a bowling alley. As long as you keep your expectations in check, you'll be happy. All of their food is "good". The burgers are above average, so check those out for sure. They serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Very kid friendly. 

The wine list is superb..............Oh, come on!  Like I said, you are eating at a diner attached to a bowling alley! There ain't no wine list!  No alcohol either, although there is a bar in the bowling alley.

We were told that Benny's had great burgers and that was no lie. I had half of the bbq brisket sandwich and my wife's pastrami burger. Both were flavorful and big.

Our kids all had regular cheeseburgers and ate ALL of it. They are normally picky, so that made our night!!

If you're looking for a great burger or BBQ, check them out.

Years ago, Mathis Becker represented me against a large company.   He was completely incompetent.   We went all the way up until the day before the court date and he was not prepared at all for the hearing.    I was having to prepare for it.  He nothing prepared.  NOthing!!!!  We ended up settling for the cost of his attorney fees and the loss time for my work a day before the hearing.   The case I had was a slam dunk and easy to prove and I would have easily won.  After the settlement, the attorneys from the other side laughed and said they spent more money on attorneys then the settlement and knew they would have lost if they had went to court.    On hindsight, I would have been better off getting a new attorney or even representing the case myself.

I tried here, as I'm always looking for a great Mexican food restaurant. On a scale of 1-10, I would give them a 7, our group had chicken tacos, and a steak burrito, all was fresh and homemade, and the salsa bar is a nice touch for different kinds of sauce. 
Owner works the front, and the wife does the cooking, just ask him, he's a little overbearing, but a nice man and just wants to please. I will go there again, as I still haven't found my 9-10 place in west valley yet, and the 7 will do. 
Has seating inside, and parking is plentiful, 
But you can get it to go also.
They are so much better than the fast food places, give them a try, my 7 might be your 9.
Great variety, great specials, long line to get in, small seating area, inside and out, lots of togo orders.

Never been comfortable with these guys after the first visit.  Hard to get people to take the time to listen.  Suppliers are done by phone call urging you to over order.  Customer service is rude and uninformative.  Won't let customers try on masks now.  Just overall, a brutal experience.

Well after church we wanted to grab a quick burger. Just seen Benny's out the corner of my eye an said wanna try it? So we turned. OMG it was the best thing i did!! I grew up goin to stores where you seen cows one day an the next day their gone an the store is full of fresh meat!! Sorry no pics of the food! I was a pig an the double with everything, seasoned fries, an a large banana shake  just didnt make it around long enough for a picture! They had to go!!!! Seen alot of good things on the menu i wanna try. Everything was fresh an the store was very clean. The workers were very nice!  Will be going back. Maybe a pic next time at check in!!
Smaller than the other store but still a great selection. Received awesome customer service.

After reading their reviews on Yelp, we thought we would give Bell Air a try! Very glad we did. Our furnace,AC fan was running continuously for months and we needed a annual inspection as well. The fan was fixed in about 5 minutes and the inspection was thorough and fair. They scheduled us within 24 hours of my request and were very professional. If we ever have any AC needs in the future Bell Air is it!!!

It seems odd, rating a mortuary. 

Philip, was probably the best, most understanding, kind, and helpful person we could ask for. We are so grateful for their services. Will just leave it at that.  If you are looking for someone to answer the phone at the most difficult time of your life, call them. They will answer.

This place is soooooo good. So many options and no matter what to buy the food is delicious. Anytime I have work in this area I always stop here and eat. Staff and owners are so nice and kind. Will not disappoint!
Dr Fox put me at ease right away as a new patient. Can't wait to see my implants. I love the fact that I now have a Dentist right here in Sun City. Thank You VA Phoenix.

BELL AIR IS BEYOND PHENOMENAL! Hands down, Mike and Asha are getting 10 STARS for there exemplary customer service!

I contacted my home warranty company by placing an online service request on a Saturday night at 8:30pm. I woke up early Sunday morning and was actually shocked to see that I already had a voicemail from Bell Air to schedule an appt. It was 113 degrees and a home warranty call. I had convinced myself that I'd be lucky if I heard from someone within 3 days, with how busy HVAC companies are during the summer months in AZ. I called back and to my surprise was told Mike would be out that afternoon between 2-5.

Mike called ahead of time to let me know that I would be his next stop and gave me an ETA  according to GPS. I really appreciated that call, as I had 3 dogs to put in another room before he arrived. Mike was professional,  knowledgable,  personable and  friendly. He diagnosed the problem, answered my questions and explained the next steps.

I've had to deal with companies that my home warranty company has sent out and they blatantly did not give 2 cares about anything except getting in and out. This was absolutely not the impression I had with Mike and I was so appreciative to be treated like a "normal" customer.

After getting the approval for repair the next day,  Asha from Bell Air and I spoke a couple of times. She followed up to keep me informed on the status of the paperwork between the home warranty company and the company who had the part I needed. When Wednesday arrived and the company still hadn't received the order from home warranty, Asha called and apologized (not her fault at all). She suggested I call and advocate for myself,  to see if I can get the order exedited so she could schedule my repair appointment and get my air working again. Done deal and taken care of! Impressed- Thank you so much Asha!

Within 24 hours,  Mike was back out here installing my new compressor.  Again, professional,  friendly and  maintaining a positive attitude while it's 110 degrees outside.

It's a very rare trait these days to find people that go the extra mile,  that care about the customer and that go out of there way to help you. When you cross paths with a company with these values and these types of employees, you thank them. You tell people about them, and you do business with them again!

Thanks so much Mike, Asha & Bell Air. Look forward to sleeping comfortably tonight with my air working.

* Don't forget to tip your repair guys and offer them water or gatorade. They do not have an easy job in this weather. It's brutal out there!

I was not impressed by the Burger I had. I could tell they have not cleaned the flattop grill the cook the burgers on in a while. It was overcooked, which only made the burnt taste it had even worse.  Fries were good, and staff was friendly.
My very first time to tried their food and I love love it! The owner was the one who greeted us and had fun talking with him. This place is highly recommended

Great service right on time and Dereck was very professional.  I will definitely call bell air ac again if I need service again. This company came the same day I called everyone else wanting my 82 year old mother to wait for next day.  Knowing that the a.c. was not working at all the temperature was 108.  But Bell air made sure someone would come the same day.
THANK YOU SO MUCH
The owner is great! He made my meal special order.   Service was friendly and quick!  It might not look like much from the outside but it's worth a stop to try.  You will be back!
First time there was pretty awesome. Went there with my kid around 8 p.m. and the food came out Fast and Fresh. More like a mom and pop shop so I will definitely be back.

AP Nails is a very professional, clean and excellent salon!  Annie and Peter are wonderful entrepreneurs and make everyone feel welcome!!  They both do an awesome job: pedicure, manicure, waxing!  I've been to other salons in the area, but none are as great as AP Nails!!  Why anyone would ever write a bad review, I can't imagine!  Negative reviews are totally untrue!  If someone is a walk-in, realize that you need to make an appointment, or come back at the time that they tell you would be available!! If you don't commit to coming back, don't be annoyed if the time is taken by someone else.  This is a business!!

Great little Mexican restaurant, all home made food and great tasting too. Dine inside or out in a quaint little yard.  The menu is huge and prices are reasonable. The decor is colorful  and plenty of tables for relaxing and haveing a beer if you like

Great Place! The management is amazing and works with you to suit your needs as they change! As a realtor - it is excellent for storing my staging! Easy access! Great Hours! And did I mention the management is Amazing!

We recently boarded our 2 dogs for 13 days at the Sun City Pet Lodge.  Our dogs have been on flea and tick meds and Heartgard pills for all their life (5 years). I gave our dogs a bath before they went into the lodge, groomed them and since I am a massage therapist, I gave them a pet massage.  I bath them once a week and groom them every day.  on them When we picked them up 13 days later, they were infested with what the vet said were brown dog ticks.  They didn't have any ticks when they went in and no one at the facility is taking any responsibility that they came from their facility.  I think their kennel was infested with the ticks and they jumped on my dogs.  These ticks can hid in corners, cracks, etc. for up to 60-90 days and survive before finding a host.  Here it is a week later, and I just found another large live tick on one of my dogs.  What a nightmare this ordeal  has been.  Brown dog ticks can carry Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever.  Better check your dog(s) over carefully if you ever use this facility.  
Sandy Peters
Sun City, AZ.

I like the staff and they have a solid burger and chocolate shake.  Their grilled chicken sandwhich and chicken strips are okay.  I have tried almost everything else on the menue and didn't really like anything else.  Stick with the Burger.  I go with Thousand Island as the sauce.  The place could use a face lift.

I used RTA for my supplies, excellent customer service!!! Unfortunately, they don't provide this service and sent their customers to VRS. The past several years each time I have to get cpap supplies, I say to myself, this is the last time I do business with them....arrogant and argumentative customer service. Hereafter will be getting my prescription from my doc and move on!!!  Every employee of all of their locations needs re-training in customer service skills!!!
Have had them fix two rings for my wife and my daughter - both were ecstatic with the results . Would recommend these folks to anyone.

We called on a Friday night at 6:15 to just leave a message for Monday. To our surprise, they answered and said they would send someone out in the morning for no charge. We were shocked. Chris arrived promptly as promised and realized it was just our thermostat we installed over summer. We didn't realize we had to set the heat settings differently for gas vs our electric air. He had it fixed within minutes and didn't charge us a penny. Yelp users get that wonderful benefit. Be sure to mention you saw them on Yelp. Now, I feel I'm a good judge of character. Chris was genuinely caring and honest. Our unit is almost 18 years old, so it's getting to be that time to do. Guess who we will be calling? Yep. Bell Air. Thanks!

First time coming to Don Jose's.  I've been looking for another good homemade mexican restaurant to go to, but there are a few things I was looking for.  BEANS...is one of them.  They were soooo Good!!! Kinda like the one's Nana used to make.  I cant wait to go back to try the menudo, chorizo, machaca breakfast, sopes and tortas.

Dr Dai has been my Primary Care physician for at least 3 years. 
She has always made me feel like my health and well being is a priority for her and her employees. 
I don't know the names of her nurses and other office staff but they are always pleasant as well. 

One thing that I've noticed over the years is how much her office has grown. I feel like my health care is personalized to my needs and it's not just some big office that just gets you in and out like a number. Dr Dai seems to be reinvesting her patient's fees back into her practice getting better and better each year. 

She even has great weight loss options/programs. 
I've recently lost 10lbs and it's stayed off for months. I feel more energetic and less hungry. I hope that means my body is working more efficiently.

We hired Jim to do our windows and screens - unbelievably good work, very fair price, fast, courteous, pleasant to do business with this company.  We have lots and lots of big windows in our house and he and his capable staff got every one of them as clean as the day they were manufactured.  Only complaint:  now I know how beautiful they look clean and can't stand to see them dirty!  Calling Jim today..

Always have to stop at Benny's when in the Sun City area! Great burgers, awesome hotdogs and a hidden gem for BBQ! The Korean steak tacos are a must try... perfect amount of heat and sweet! Love this place!

Very nice little family owned. place.  A few items I have issue with.  The guacamole needs some real intervention, (Green goop that looks nothing like avacodo) and not a fan of the stale pre-bagged chips.  However, the things that are great make up for it.  The shrimp tacos and enchilada are FANTASTIC!  I would eat those everyday.   Also love the burros and beans. 
And.... IF you want HOT! this guy has it.  I dare you to take a toothpick dab of his insane hot sauce.  You will be in tears for an hour.  I think there is potential for some serious food challenge here.  Not sure even Man Vs Food would win this one.  ;-)
Check it out, it is worth a try.

Went into this restaurant with some good expectations. Unfortunately the food find not come close. I ordered the combo plate tostada, taco and taquitos. Definitely nothing special. I also got the chile relleno which I was very disappointed. The flavor was lacking, very blan and basic. The only thing worse was the flan. No flavor at all. Not up to my Southern California standards. The prices were rather high for the quality of food. I also am not a fan of styrofoam plates and plastic forks when in a brick and mortar establishment.

I would give Regency 0 stars if I could. Do yourself a favor and find a reputable funeral home. Have been dealing with Regency cremating my uncle out of state. "Accidentally" cremated all of his belongings and are now refusing to answer our calls or call back. While the belongings may not have been expensive, they were the one piece of my uncle we would have to remember. Wouldn't recommend this company to anyone. Honor your loved ones and go elsewhere!!
Love Don Jose's!  I eat here as often as I can when in town visiting my mother.  Love the breakfasts!!  But everything is top notch.  Great salsa bar!
If you find yourself near Sun City and craving some solid Mexican food this the place. Great customer service and reasonable prices.

This is a great place to store your vehicle. This is my second time as my first storage experience went without a hitch! Bill, the manager is easy to talk to and willing to give you that little extra to accommodate you. Thanks Sun City Bargain Storage!
Normal Mexican fast food - Compare to filibertos. I ordered the polo asado burrito, I felt the burrito was on the small side. Price was decent. Large drink and burrito for $7.39
Came just for the burger. Had the double a la cart and to my surprise it was very good. If you want a burger that is better than a fast food option but won't break the bank then come here.

The last 5 times I've come here the soda has tasted disgusting. It's been about 3 months since the last time I ate here, decided to give it a try again this morning. Nope, still nasty. Clearly no one checks the Diet Coke. It tastes like somebody poured cleaner in it and completely undrinkable. Gave 2 stars because at least the sausage McMuffin was hot and tasted decent.

Im not used to the extreme heat since I live in California but when I came out to visit my sister in AZ  during the summer and the A/C broke, I was dying. Since my sister was at work when I informed her how hot it was she immediately called several places but they were not able to come in a timely manner. Then she called BELL LLC and they were able to come sooner than the rest. The service was awesome as the technician was able to explain what was wrong and how soon it was going to be fixed. Thank you Bell LLC for such an amazing rest of my stay with my sister in her cooled off house.

Our go-to Mexican food spot. By far the best beans I've ever had, we get them to go sometimes because they are just that good. Everything we've tried has been wonderful and their pricing is great. The owners are always super friendly also.
Very unhappy about his dealings with closing my mother's estate.  There was no energy there, and he could not deal with dissention among heirs.  I got another lawyer.

I had 2 shredded beef and 2 shredded chicken hard shell tacos and they were delicious. They had a little hot taste to them  but not overwhelming. I have also tried the Chile Relleno and that was very good also  with rice and beans. So far there has been no disappointment.
First time at Dominic's....good food, good atmosphere!! We will be back!! Get there early, seemed like a really popular place! Filled up quick!
Good food. Great service! If you are under the age of 70 you will get a real kick out of this place.  Made my day! .

It's not fast food, but it's good food... made to order. The prices are reasonable and they have deals on particular days. The staff is friendly and willing to help. Definitely worth the stop if you're passing by.
