I had a taste for gyros so we wound up at the Sunset Bistro. We sat outside even though it was over 90. They added some shades so the sun wasn't directly in our eyes. Very comfortable. I decided to have a falafel sandwich which was delicious! Crispy falafel on a really fresh pita. Fresh lettuce tomato and onion. My friend had the burger which was really good too. The waitresses were really nice and attentive. It was a good place for a quick bite at a reasonable price. We'll definitely go back.
Great work and great personality! Dr. Chang makes it fun to go to the dentist. His staff are all helpful and friendly. Would highly recommend!
This is a great place. I replaced my watch battery very cheap and plan to come back to buy one of their clocks.. Super cool people here!! Come check them out

We rented a tow dolly from Sands Highway RV rentals for our weekend getaway and we were pleasantly surprised with their customer service and products. We will definitely be renting again from there them in the near future. The ability to reserve online was convenient and an easy process. I highly recommend them

This place was the best Chinese food I've found in the area. I ordered the vegetable fried rice and received a heaping portion with large chunks of vegetables. Yum. Everything tasted fresh, and seasoned well.

Our waiter was polite and attentive throughout the whole meal and I felt very taken care of--which is abnormal for most Chinese restaurants. Am I right?

He also brought us some complimentary freshly fried chips with sweet & sour sauce.

The price was very reasonable. I will eat her many more times.

Dr. Chang is a great dentist. His entire staff are efficient and most of all professional, knowledgeable and friendly to make my visit comfortable.  I recommend them for all your dental needs.  I go to the Gilbert office.
Best prices around! Quality equipment. They do their best to make the customer happy. Thats hard to find nowadays. Will rent from them again!

After 17 years of unconditional love and being there, our dog Haji, was placed at rest.  After a lot of soul searching and making the decision that it was time we chose Paws At Peace.  Thank you Dr Brown for coming into our home, explaining the process, making the payment process quick and giving us a choice for our family to be with our sweet dog, at home and in comfort.  
This option vs. The difficult journey to a cold metal table at a vets office with the smell of anything but familiar just brings unneeded stress to the pet and the family (this used to be our only known option too many times) and really makes it no choice at all.
Thank you for such a way to bring a trjic times to a more comforting place and what every pet knows....home.
We know we will need you in the future and know this is the best choice for us and the only choice that our pets deserve after they have given so much for us.  Peace
I have had Dr Hauser (now retired) sense 1987, I in trust his doctors with the health of my animals.  Have found that they maintain the same care as I am a custom to expect.

Rented an enclosed trailer to move our daughter to college in NM - the trailer was great & the service amazing. So glad we got this enclosed trailer as we had rain and lots of it! All the contents would have been ruined if we had not chosen this trailer!  

It's far and out of the way but worth it!
We normally enjoy Pizza Hut food, but this locations claim to "made to order" is erroneous. One simple order of thin crust pepperoni pizza cut into squares was too complicated for these employees.
The food is good here.  However, there's no restroom inside the restaurant.  You have to go out in the heat to a filthy mall restroom which is not air conditioned.  Disgusting!

The more fortunate among us live useful lives long after our working careers have ended. How many of us have planned ahead and bought a wheelchair, walker, bed rails, grabber sticks or commode arm supports? The mechanical amenities that make a mature life safer and more enjoyable.

If you live in Sun City then you are in luck. Sunshine Services will get you these items and more and
THE PRICE IS RIGHT: nothing.

This non-profit organization refurbishes and recycles these donated aids. 
They will  graciously loan you these items and 
they will gladly accept donations of money or equipment to help sustain their rare and useful service.

Fast friendly people. I followed one of their radio ads and I'm so glad I did. Turns out for 6 yrs. I've been getting batteries replaced for my 24 watch collection at over the double the prices of this fine shop. The shop is pleasantly decorated and pleasant to be in. I'll considered them first for any of my jewelry buying needs.

The original business closed down and was reopened by new owners, now calling it Jade Star Chinese Cuisine. Not sure how it was before but nothing here to bring me back. Here is a tip - do not order the fried wings. All (fish?) batter, not good all the way and floating in grease.

So I got a new camera, and I'm an SLR virgin.  Where to go?

I hate going to the big electronics stores unless I know exactly what I'm looking for.  For some really odd reason I don't like to be talked down to, especially by someone who thinks they are almighty Technogenius.  Working at Best Buy.

So I took my little ole self to this small private camera shop and not only walked out feeling more confident in my SLR skills, but never felt pressured.  Some things were more expensive than the big stores, but the guy definitely knows his stuff and sometimes you can find a good deal.  Plus he's not stingy with his knowledge.

So there, Best Buy.  So there.

This place has great food. The restaurant itself is really small but we usually order take out. Curry chicken soup is one of the best soups I have had. The chicken kabob and rice is unbelievable. Always tender and slightly charred to perfection with great flavor. It is served over curry style basmati rice, pita bread, and choice of salad or soup. This review is based on the food itself as I only order take out from here. Big portions and priced right.
Floors N More has a great selection of carpet and excellent installers. I would recommend them to anyone!

Second time renter from this amazing establishment. 
We first rented a Class C and a RZR, it was incredibly easy to operate ( the staff was very helpful with any questions regarding the operation of the unit) , and even easier to clean! 
We are currently driving back from Northern Arizona in the Class A RV (along with a RZR ) that we rented this trip. The experience was just as good if not better than our last trip! 

Thank you Laura and the wonderful staff at Sand Highway RV Rentals!!!

My mom owns a dog who putting it mildly is a horribly snippy little thing. I can't even imagine someone willingly putting their hands near her face to trim her hair and brush her teeth while expecting to keep all their digits. Well, Vicki is that brave soul who not only can handle this little Maltese but she does a fantastic job. 
Her rates are reasonable, the place is very clean and she goes above and beyond. I would reccomend this salon to all my friends with pets.

We stopped in for a sandwich and we found a great community hang out. The food was great the poor waitress was moving at top speed.  Before we finished our meal the karaoke was moving along non stop with everyone enjoying the food and fun. 
 The next time we stopped was for lunch I tried a philly cheese steak sandwich. It was great!
We are totally satisfied.

Anthony S

Great Service

You can't beat the price on battery replacement, and the few minutes that you have to wait you can browse the large variety of clocks, watches, and merchandise.

These guys are wonderful to work with. They have helped me five times now and every time I rent from them them I get great service. I consider myself lucky I found these guys the first time around. Thanks for being so accommodating.
Jonmark

My husband and I have brought our cars to Rawy for 7 years now.  We've had everything from oil changes to an entire motor replacement.  He is thorough and honest. If there is something he can't accomplish he will refer you to somebody who can. We trust our cars to no other!

I arrived at 12:45 it's now 5pm and I've just been put in a room not seen by a doctor yet. There were two people ahead of me when I arrived. This is crazy! The ER would have been faster. My GP is on vacation so it's ER or urgent care or wait a week and risk getting sepsis from this infection. It's now 5 pm which is After closing and they swear the doc will be right here!!! They have been saying that since 3! Your next your next I swear! Don't come here!

I recently came here to discuss getting a tattoo and a facial piercing. After seeing the shop and it's practices I ended up leaving without having any work done and I am VERY glad. The entire shop is filthy. The employees did not wash their hands before performing piercings on people, just put on gloves, and did not even disinfect the person's skin or the jewelry! I watched them perform 2 piercings and one was very crooked. I did not wish to get an infection so I left. I have read several reviews online with the same experience, filthy shop and unsafe practices, this place should be shut down. I'm sure people will be drawn in by their very cheap prices but here it's true: you get what you pay for.

We have been going to Sun City Auto for years and wouldn't think of going anywhere else. The owner, Rawy is honest and down to earth. If you need repairs and have a budget he will help you prioritize the work so you can get it done over time but still have a reliable vehicle to drive. The prices are always fair. They run specials on oil changes so make sure you are on their email list. We bought used cars for our teenagers as they became of age. The first thing we did was take the cars to Sun City Auto to get inspected. This is a top notch service center. They have couches, tv, coffee, magazines, and clean restrooms while you wait, if you don't just drop your vehicle off. Recommend highly for all of your repair & maintenance needs.
Best pawn shop in the West Valley i bought golf clubs and a watch.  The owners are always there and very nice.  They will definitely give you deals.

My family highly recommends Sand Highway RV Rentals.  First time renting from them and we are beyond satisfied with them.  We rented the RV for NASCAR Phoenix November 2017 and we had them drop off and pick up. Wow! What a great service they provided for us.  It's so worth the money.  We are definitely going to be renting again for March 2018 Phoenix NASCAR! Thanks Sand Highway RV Rentals!!

I took my 2013 Chevy Tahoe here because Sands Chevrolet in Surprise told me I needed $600+ worth of maintenance. Over the phone Sun City Auto Service said it would be about half that price, but they also said according to the owners manual I shouldn't need any of that work done. I brought it in today and they checked everything and found that I really didn't need any of that work done. They didn't charge me for checking anything. When my vehicle does need the maintenance done, I will be returning to Sun City Auto Service.

Excellent service, reasonable prices, outstanding personnel.  Our furry (or feathered, or scaled) family members are treated with great care and concern for their well-being.  If we decline or postpone a service, our decision is respected.  Very glad they are close to to our home!

Rented a 20' enclosed trailer. They also provided the essential equalizer and anti-sway hitch at no charge. This is a must for safe trailering empty or loaded.

Their online reservation site is great...images, descriptions and the interactive calendar was awesome

Laura and Curtis were great with the admin and equipment respectively.

The trailer was a late model with new tires; same with the hitch. The trailer tracked perfect.  There were no white-knuckle moments...a completely uneventful trip of 4400 miles.

Cost was reasonable and fair, too.

I would definitely rent from them and absolutely will refer others.

Thank you

These guys are fantastic! Great and efficient work while you wait. But don't worry you won't be waiting long!! Super fast service at an excellent price. They got my Mickey watch working again! They definitely have a loyal customer in me. Thank you so much!

Dr. Johnson and her staff are top notch. My dogs are understandably nervous going in, but they treat then kindly and with respect. 

We have the Paw Plans for both dogs. Last year we had the extended plan with dental and this year rather than sell us the extended plan again, they suggested a less expensive plan. I am grateful the staff looks after my budget and not just that of the practice.

I love Dr. Johnson specifically and Leticia is so very knowledgeable. Both make sure all questions are answered fully. 

I'm one of those crazy "dog moms" who believe that they are part of my family not simply pets to be treated as an accessory. Dr Johnson understands my feelings. I am never treated with anything but kindness and respect.

 I will always bring my boys to Sun City Animal Hospital.
I like the large inventory of fabric and thread here. And they have bernina sales and service. I have gone to this store for several years, and I always enjoy it.

The man at the shop was very friendly and knowledgeable. I came to this shop to get my camera sensor clean but he was unable to get it clean (the issue was beyond normal dust). I was not charged a dollar!!

I rented a U-Haul truck from here on July 1. My order was confirmed online and by phone the week of June 12 with a rep from Sun City Auto. When I arrived on July 1 at 6:00 a.m. my truck order was no where to be found. I had to call U-Haul and find another U-Haul provider that had a truck available for the same day, July 1, the busiest moving day of the month. This delayed my move by 2 hours. Sun City Auto did not offer an apology, do not rent a U-Haul from this location.

How do I describe my barber?  I've been coming to Dave, the owner, for about 10 years now.  I used to go to him around the corner at the salon he opened for his daughter to run, but now he's almost 10 miles from my house in Sun City.  Still, when someone knows what you want, it's worth the drive.  I think he's very reasonable at $11 a haircut too.

Horrible horrible horrible customer service!! Very rude and unprofessional employees.  Erica is especially rude. I Will never order from them again. My husbands work will never order from them as well. I'm a teacher and used to use Pizza Hut for all of our meetings/ parties but never again. Very disappointed in Erica's in professionalism and Rude behavior. I will be sure to make sure people know about my bad experience.

We love our new vinyl plank floors. We decided to redo complete home, including bedrooms. They look nice even after several days use. 
  We started with Matt, who is very knowledgeable about flooring  materials, and the installation process. Which in turn made it easier for us to make a decision on which type of flooring best fit our needs. 
  The Installers, Mark & Marie, were very professional, meticulous, and very helpful moving all items. 
  Our sales representative, Patty, came by checking progress, through out the  installation. She was always very professional and easy to deal with. 
  We would highly recommend Floors n More.

Very overpriced and VERY VERY rude. Just left a sale. Wish I would have never spent my hard earned 20 dollars. Will not go back again. They make it feel as if you are a complete burden to them and snicker at you wanting a few dollars off. My total for some used towels a sheet and egg slicer and thermometer was TWENTY THREE dollars!!!! They wouldn't even do 20 dollars. Never ever will I go back
Cheddar roast beef is awesome! And I really like the way that they remodeled the store. It looks so clean and inviting.

I take both of my Bull Terriers to Sun City Animal Hospital.  Going to the Vet is never fun but the folks at Sun City Animal Hospital are always warm and genuinely pleased to see you and your four legged family member.  We have had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Pollyann Johnson DVM, Dr. Steven McAllister DVM, and Dr. Jennifer Flick DVM.  All Doctors take plenty of time to answer any and all questions you may have about the health of your pet and never give you, 'the bums rush'.   In an era where customer service is an after thought, the committed staff and medical professionals are sincerely dedicated to the well being of your pet.

I expected something clean and quiet considering his is located in Sun City. I only use a laundromat for my king size comforter and I normally go to Suds but they were closed so I figured I'd give this place a try. 

It's disgusting inside. The facility and machines are dirty. I mean caked in filth dirty. The machines are also over priced compared to Suds.

I won't be back.

The pizza itself is pretty good,  but the delivery service is terrible. They are always late showing up.  Last week I ordered 2 pizzas for my family an hour and a half before we had to leave the houseand was govern an eta of 45 minutes.  1 hour and 5 minutes later they finally got there.  I called to complain since we had enough time to pay for the pizza and set it on The counter before leaving. No one had a chance to eat. I was told they were short handed and they were sorry and would credit my account so I could get free pizza next time. Fine. 

So today I called at 1030 to order my pizza and was told they would be here at 1145 - probably giving me a long estimate because it's Friday and they know they were late last time.  This time they show up at 1205...unbelievable.  we're never ordering from pizza hut again.

After my parents died, I couldn't bring myself to going through 60+ years of memories and sentimental items in their house. When I suddenly found myself needing to hire an estate sale company in order to get the house ready for renters, I found The Valley Estate Sale Company. Norbert and his staff were remarkable and helped me through a very stressful and emotional time.  They worked extremely hard to go through, organize and sell everything.  They left the house completely empty (which I desperately needed) and in better condition than it was when they walked in! They did everything they promised and I would recommend this company to anyone who needs help with this stressful, bittersweet and necessary step in order to move forward.

this place deserves no stars if i could i would have. just because they do tattoos and piercings doesnt mean they should be even considerd a shop.. please dnt let the cheep prices pull you in... infection.infection.infection.... i had my cheeks done before and were amazing and i took care of them.. i had to remove for a job.. I got them redone and they got infected the next day.. i did everything the same and it got horible infected.. they wouldnt help and blamed me... horible please if you want a peircing pay a little more for good quality...

A hidden gem! They have fresh spices, very reasonable prices & the best balsamic vinegars & olive oils I've ever had. Cheryl made a custom aromatherapy lotion that my Mom absolutely loves. This is my new favorite place to go shopping, it helps that the owners are very friendly & knowledgable too.

Great job!  

we are thrilled with the quality of the work at a very reasonable price.  They were on time and did a great job of cleaning up after they completed the job.

If we could give zero stars we would.  Avoid this company at all costs.  My mother-in-law retained this company to assist her in her mother's estate and they took complete advantage of her.
1) items were removed from the estate for sale and she was billed for a moving charge but given neither an itemized receipt for the charges nor compensation for items being sold.
2) she was told that she would have the opportunity to donate remaining items and receive a receipt, however after the sale neither happened.
3) The company left an awful mess after the sale, treating our family's property like common garbage.
4) Items packed were just dumped into moving boxes with no care for things like fragility.
5) Once they have your money they are completely unresponsive to your questions or complaints.

If you are looking for a company to assist you in your estate sale, choose someone else.  They are rude and unresponsive and take advantage of people in their most vulnerable state.

Dr. Brown was such a breath of fresh air when going through such a difficult time having to put your pet-family member down. She was accommodating to my husbands work schedule and such a sweet person! It was a bunch of mixed emotions and as sad and hard as it is, she made it very pleasant! She even made a paw print for us and let us choose some charms to put on it. Very reasonable price and makes it so comfortable for everyone including your animal. We will definitely be using her in the future when we have to come to this cross road once again.

If Chinese buffet is what you desire, just keep driving northwest on Grand to the other place!  

The food is low quality and the place is one of the dirtiest I've seen in the Valley!  They do have a friendly staff and a vast selection, and so I can award them one star.  

Overall this is as bad as it gets, and would have to be starving to walk away satisfied eating here.

Very nice place. Granted I was looking for a 30 gallon air compressor and they didn't have one, but i wanted to just scope the place out. I just moved to Sun City about 1/4 mile from this shop.

Very friendly staff, very clean and well kept store.

Impressive!

First off let me state that normally this store has provided me with great service and product.  However, on 12/18/13 we ordered several of the pzones.  The delivery service was great, and the delivery from this store has always been great.  The pzones themselves were real good.  However, the marinara sauce that they gave for the pzones was the worst excuse for a dipping sauce I have ever experienced.  The sauce was so thinned out it was like water.  Dipping the pzones in that sauce was useless.  The dipping sauce just washed right off of the pzone.  So the lackluster dipping sauce just ruined the pzones all together.  


I don't know if this is the way their marinara sauce that comes with pzones is supposed to be like, but if it is I will never order the pzones from here again.  I'll just stick to their pizza or order from a different pizza place.

This was definitely not what I have grown to expect from a National chain like Pizza Hut.

Update

Pizza Hut contacted me and gave me a credit towards future purchase due to my experience.
Our go to watch/ clock repair. Affordable and great customer service. Best there is around.

I thought they were great. I had five watches get new batteries and have links removed to make them smaller and it only ended up costing me less than $20. They were very friendly and did the work while I waited.

I had an opportunity to use these guys a couple months ago and they were great!! Everyone was nice and the process was easy. They made sure I was comfortable with the toy hauler before we took off. I definitely recommend them for your next trip!!

Great customer service.  Jim, who waited on me, took so much time to make sure I understood and my options.  It is nice to have such good personal care.  I will certainly will be a new customer for all my camera needs.

Holy mother of inefficiency! Had to take off work (without pay) to get my mother to her follow-up mammogram. She had a 10:30 appointment time.

 At 11:10 the door-of-selection opens and her name was called....BUT, before my mother could respond...or get up...the person disappeared and the door slammed shut! And...nothing! No one returned. No one knew what happened or why she wasn't taken back. 

Finally, the check-in person told us that the door- monitor/queen-of-selection went on break.....ok? Is there a back up queen???  Are we now in waiting room limbo? 

At this point mom is annoyed...me, a bit past annoyed...and she is ready to reschedule....when lo-and-behold...the door-of-selection reopens and a new reigning queen beckons her thither 

It is now 11:50. I'm late for work. I'm making no money, HOWEVER, the inefficient, time-wasting, gods of incompetence are hard at work...earning THEIR paychecks by waisting my time

We moved here from another state and went to this vet due to the outstanding review on Yelp as well as the office being a close proximity to our house. We were very pleased with the service. The front office was very friendly and seemed to enjoy talking with us and our pets. We met with Dr. Leah Ashworth. She was very good with our two dogs. They were both due for vaccinations and neither yelped or flinched when she administered the shots. She was very thorough speaking with us about dental cleanings, chipping and answered any questions we had with this being our first visit.  We did not feel rushed whatsoever. The office appeared clean and was quiet. I would highly recommend Dr. Ashworth.

Food was fine, service acceptable.  My concern was the way the ice was emptied into the soda dispenser.  Buckets of ice were dumped in via a 'used' piece of cardboard as a funnel!!!   The stored cardboard was stashed behind the machine and then they  used it again !!  Not very sanitary !!
RE: Laundromat side.  Got the job done, but very dirty inside and out.  High perc entage of machines out of order.  Thought price was high for washers.  Not very befitting of a business in Sun City.

Flew into Arizona from California to visit my Girlfriend and get the jump on our road trip later on that day.  Upon arriving into Arizona, I realized I brought all of my Camera Gear except for my extra battery and chargers.  On the hunt for a Nikon D5500 battery and charger!  This location, I found via Yelp.

This was our 2nd place we drove to on our journey to find my batter and charger.  A Nikon D5500 batter7 and charger (OEM or Universal) was appearing to be difficult.  I figured a camera store would be my one stop shop!

Please note my rating is for other issues.  The customer service was simply awesome!

The store had a replacement battery, but it was bit lower in capacity.  There was hardly any selection or options and absolutely no available chargers.  I didn't look in detail but the inventory seemed limited.

Wanted to rent a trailer and had a week to do it. Laura was super helpful. Being this was a first time renting/hauling a trailer, the staff showed me how to use. They were also available when I called about the brake controller.

Awesome staff and a wide variety of trailers to rent... Would definitely come back.

I've been stopping by Valley Estate Sale Company every couple of weeks since I moved into this neighborhood. While I don't always find a treasury, I do always get good customer service.

Last night was no exception, and I found two Limon Cella glasses that are simply divine, for 45 cents each! Previous finds have been a small bench, which I sit on every day to put on my shoes; an electric clock that I broke while cleaning, and I really should just get it repaired; and other goods that helped make my home.
Well rounded place, especially for the price. Provided a good first time experience for me.
We love getting the family dinner. We get coupons in the mail for the family dinner! $15 bucks for aa bunch of food is what I'm talking about

The owners are wonderful. Very knowledgeable in herbs spices etc. Will really try to help you. They do different oils etc to help with pain and it does. I have been going for quite awhile and im so glad i found the store. Small store in a small strip mall. A hidden gem.

The Gyros are pretty standard fair with a healthy portion of meat with fresh onions, tomato and a tzatziki sauce that hits the right notes.
Lots of tables but it can feel a bit cramped but the atmosphere comfortable and friendly, they don't have fountain drinks, but a "grab it yourself" fridge with a decent selection of canned soda, which just seems a little odd to me, but if your there for the Gyro you won't be disappointed!
This was delish!! Big portion for the price, and very accommodating for my allergies! Ordered chicken kabob, and a gyro. Both were moist and flavorful.

Dr.Joseph Chang is a great dentist.He has a warm ,happy,funny personality. He has a great staff.I love going to his office. It doesn't feel like your going to the dentist office. Very comfortable.I would and have recommended my friends and family.

I wanted to introduce my niece to Arby's. She'd never eaten there before (is that even a thing? Who doesn't like Arby's?) and was willing to give it a try. The lady at the register was friendly and was training a new employee. She even apologized for it. I told her no worries. Got my order placed and went to find a seat. 
It seemed to take a little longer than normal for the order to come up, I know because I used to work at Arby's years ago. When I saw my order coming up, I walked up to get it. The lady who took my order was turning around and about to call my name when she saw me. She apologized for it taking a bit. Again, no worries. 
Sat down and my teenage niece got to try her first curly fry and jamocha shake, fry dipped in the shake, of course! Her eyes got big. She approved. Then she bit into her chicken cordon blue sandwich. Or I should say tried to. The chicken was weird she said as she was choking part of it down. I asked her what she meant. She said it was hard and handed it to me. She had bitten through the bun, cheese, ham, and coating on the chicken, but COULDN'T BITE THROUGH THE MEAT! It was tough, you could feel it, and the coating was browner than I've ever seen on one of their sandwiches. Ok, it happens. I walked up with it and gave it to the trainee who took it to the manager. She stuck her fingers into it, and looked at me and said it was fresh and they'd just made it. I let her know that it was tough to the point of being inedible. She actually asked me what I wanted her to do about it! I'm like, are you kidding me? She offered me a regular classic roast beef instead. Aside from the fact that she was offering me a sandwich that is about a buck fifty less than the rock sandwich we'd gotten, my niece doesn't eat beef. Otherwise I'd have gotten her one to begin with, because duh, they're the bomb. So I asked for a couple ham/cheese sliders. 
SHE ROLLED HER EYES AT ME AND SIGHED like a spoiled rich kid who is being asked to throw away their own trash! She calls out for two sliders. I waited. I saw them come up. So did she. But the order she was waiting for wasn't up yet so she walked away. Came back a minute later, PUSHED MY SLIDERS OUT OF HER WAY, and proceeded to bag up 3 other orders as they came up. She didn't touch them, and once all the other orders were passed out she started to turn to walk away. I looked at her and said "Really, you're just going to push my sliders aside and ignore them?" She got really snotty with me and said she'd get to them in a second. Not once during the whole exchange did she apologize for the inedible food. In fact, not once did she speak to me in any way other than snide, irritated, and rude. Finally gave me the tray and said here you go. I told her thanks for nothing. Then she said really loud and sarcastic "have a nice day!" 
This person, Michele D. should not be in customer service or food service if she can't deal with people without the attitude. I will still go to my beloved Arby's, just not this one! The two stars is because the other employees were pleasant, and my niece loved the food that she could eat. My roast beef was cold by the time I could eat. I took it home. My dog was very happy with it.

My last visit there ended in a total mess. 

I was on my way home, and stopped in to place a pick up order. I had wanted to go to Line Thai, but I was talked into going here because someone really wanted their egg rolls.

The item I had problem with was the bean curd family style with vegetables. The gentleman that took my order insisted that no such item existed. So I had to point to him where that was on the menu. Once I did he said that must be a new item. After I told him it wasn't as I have ordered that every time I visited in the last 2 years.  His excuse was it was new to him as he had not seen the item in two years. Despite the flaw in his logic, I decided I would rather just place my order than debate. After telling him my full order, I had to once again point to him where on the menu this tofu dish was. Since he had trouble remembering where on a three-page menu the item was I advised him to write the number of the item down. His reasoning for not following my advice was the cook did not go off of that.

When it was done they handed me a 4 item meal in one bag.  Given the drama I had with placing my order I should have checked my order there before rushing out the door. I
live about 20 - 25 minutes away, so I was in a bit of a rush to keep the food as warm as possible.

When I got home the very top dish I found was not a tofu dish, it was a shrimp dish. I called them, and the waiter asked if i was sure it was wrong.  Just a hint tofu is generally square, shrimp is not. After another extended discussion on how I was sure my dish was not made with tofu but with shrimp, he told me he would have to find the cook to see if she would replace it. 

I was tired of debating so I decided I just wanted my money back on that item. For which I was told he would have to talk to the cook to see if that would be ok.  But as I am talking with him I realized. The egg rolls were on the bottom of the bag soaking in fluids from the other meals. At that point I insisted on a full refund and that I would be bring back the mess they had handed to me. 

When I got there I had a replacement to my order, despite the fact I stated I wanted a refund on the phone. When I got there I showed them pictures of the mess I found in the bag they gave me. The excuse I got was the guy was new that he had been there for three months. I am not sure how a server can be new at their job after three months.  Especially when they are counting on tips to boost their income.  But if you are going to use being new as an excuse you don't argue with a customer about what is on the menu without actually looking. 

To make matters worse it was my fault that fluids from my food leaked on everything according to the manager. Perhaps they may want to visit their neighbors Line Thai for tips on how to package take out.

I got a refund, but after all the issues that I went through I will not be going back again.
Nice little restaurant in Greenway shopping area.  Greek salad tasted fresh.  Pita bread was warm and very good.  Gyros meat was tender and seasoned nicely.

I just had a great experience at Sun Camera in Sun City, AZ!

The battery in my camera swelled and I couldn't get it out. I took it to Sun Camera and Jim Petersen was able to get the battery out without damaging the camera. He didn't charge me for the friendly service! I would have gladly paid him but all he asked for was a friendly handshake!

I am very happy to have found a well-stocked camera store with a knowledgeable, friendly, and helpful owner!

I really don't understand the point of this company. They manage my hoa which equals processing my checks every month. Anytime I need to call about payments or anything most of the time they just say I need to contact my hoa president or go to the meetings.... Isn't that your job? I'm calling the people who I'm sending my payments to but they can't answer questions about weird charges I'm receiving from them. Be sure to double check your account and get proof for sending your checks. I have sent my payment during the first week of the month for the last three months (due on 15th) and have received a late fee each month. They will send me a late fee notice on the 16th and then cash my check near the 23rd. Now I'm fighting to prove that my checks were mailed on time and they won't even look into the situation. They just tell me that the postal service must have been backed up. For 20 days? They are a complete joke and always seem annoyed to even be answering the phone. Don't give them your money, they don't know what they are doing!!!!!
We go every month for a shave and hair cut.for my dad.. Everyone does a great job....Friendly, Considerate  and  Very Clean ... I wouldn't think of going anywhere else.  You won't be disappointed....
Same rude gal at the drive thru window as last time.  This time she was rude to her trainee and not me the customer. Food is good here but that's it.
Smooth, hassle-free transaction.  They're a bit out in the boonies, but their prices are great, making the drive worth it.
Terrible customer care, they always seem extremely annoyed if I call for information and have no courtesy.  Very short and irritable, I always dread calling.
Stop making me pull out my weeds when you still haven't fixed the sidewalks, and pick up all the dog shit all over the neighborhood.

Wow!  Let's give a big shout out to the entire staff here. You are greeted with a smile. All paperwork is in order and printed ready to go. The owners and everyone working at Sand Highway treat the rental equipment like it is their own. All rentals are clean and in working order.  Nothing rag tag here, all pro's!  Next rental for us will be a motorhome!

This company is an absolute joke. 

Call their main number and listen to their auto attendant continually tell you, "That is an invalid option," I did that for about an hour on Friday. 

They send out letters with incorrect phone numbers on them that don't ring back to them. 

I'm going to run for HOA President next cycle and see if I can get them out of my neighborhood. You should do the same.

Been to other Greek restaurants but none compare to Sunset Bistro for delicious food or great service. My wife & I along with friends have been here many times and we're going back today.
We highly recommend Sunset Bistro to anyone who likes good food and friendly service.

Finally, an honest place to take your car.  Don't bother looking anywhere else.  The owner takes the time to review everything with you and explains everything in detail.  The place is great. Thank you.

Jeremy  "the manager" has never seen the internet... (Jeremy's words). 
 Miguel "the manager on duty" will speak to him. I won't hold my breath.
Excellent accounting services; great customer service.  Highly recommend for any HOA in Sun City and Sun City West.  I have had nothing but positive experience with Colby Management.

Wonderful shop with excellent customer service. Great selection of herbs both for cooking and medicinal. I purchased cooking herbs and received friendly advice from Laurie about which would be best for my intended purposes. If they don't have what you are looking for will special order. Directions on Google Maps were not good, I ended up in a RV park down the road. Store is in the strip mall directly behind the Circle K.
Circular polarizing filter was stuck on lens so I stopped in to see if they could help me out. It took Jim 30 seconds to get it off...I had worked on it for 2 hours! Thanks Jim!

Love renting from Sand Highway.  The equipment is always in fantastic shape and the service is super quick.  Paperwork/Hookup and I am usually out of there in 20 minutes.  I have used them 4 times and never disappointed.

This was our second experience with Floors N More.  The first job they completed for us a few years ago turned out great.  This experience was terrible and I'm hoping to save someone else from going through the same pain we experienced hiring them.  We hired them to install tile in our master bath.  The installation was done so poorly it had to be entirely removed and redone.   We had chipped tile, tile which was pieced together because it was mismeasured and the entire layout was poor.  They were also to raise the carpet where it met the tile and did not do that correctly the first time either.  The installers were hours late on more than one occasion.  What should have been a 2 day job lasted over a month with at least 7 days of inconvenience because they couldn't do anything right the first time.  They also did not itemize their quote and tried to tell us later that work we agreed upon was not in the original contract.

We were looking for tile for three bedrooms and part of the great room. Floors N More has a great selection of tile and an *outstanding* selection of wood plank tile - much more than we found in other stores, some of which are much larger. After searching every tile store in the west valley, we found exactly what we wanted at Floors N More..

The staff was very helpful and patient as we chose samples and made decisions about grout colors and they responded to all of our concerns and questions.

The installation crew was friendly and worked efficiently and were very careful in our home. They did a beautiful job cutting the border tile that sets off the new tile in the great room. After the completion of the job, we had a couple of concerns (which turned out to be nothing) and they came back promptly to review them with us. A few areas needed additional grout near the baseboards and they corrected that as well.

Perhaps the nicest touch was the thank you note that arrived shortly after the completion of the job thanking us for our business. It was appreciated and if we need tile in the future, we'll definitely go back.

Recently, I rented a trailer to tow my RZR. Laura and Curtis made the process much easier than I thought it would be. I had to change my pick up time and it was no problem. They are very helpful, friendly and organized. The trailer was in excellent condition and their prices are very fair. I will definitely rent from them again!

Wonderful groomers, so glad we found them. I just had my my Terrier and German Shepherd groomed. This was the first grooming for the Shepard and we greatly thank all the staff who patiently worked with her. Our boy and girl will be going there from now on.

I can't thank everyone enough for helping me and my beloved Mauri say good-bye.   Dr. Brown wasn't able to come to my home, but she immediately arranged to have two wonderful ladies, Dr. Jill Besemer and Alisha come to help.  Jill and Alisha listened to me tell stories:  how I rescued Mauri - no, how he rescued me;  funny stories about how Mauri made me laugh every day.  They took their time until I was ready and they made his parting the best it could possibly be - with love, kindness and a peaceful parting.  I am so glad this was done at home and not in a clinic, where the last few visits were painful reminders - both for Mauri and for me.   Mauri was in the loving comfort and surroundings of his own home.

This company criticizes home owners and sends letters complaining about their front yards not meeting the HOA  standards. If we were to judge their standards by how they keep the development's areas under their control then they should never complain about homeowners yards. The sidewalks have broken slabs all over the place with some haven been broken three years or more and with portion sticking up as much as 3 inches. 11 lights in one flow control area have been broken for two years now. Two goal posts were broken for years and when finally they did something about it the just removed them and were never replaced. The grass in most parks is in very poor condition. Gopher holes and and mounds are everywhere and weeds are more abundant than grass. Water fountains have been our of service for many years. The irrigation water forms shallow lakes everywhere creating breeding grounds for mosquitoes - a big health hazard. Over the years I have been associated with many HOA's and this one is, by far, the worst.

We picked out the tile and they started within two weeks.  The installation was done very well.  They even worked Saturday and Sunday to get finished.  A great professional installion.  Very nice work and crew.  Many Thanks

I have never ordered a chicken gyro and received something so disgusting. The "chicken" was a flattened hunk of mystery meat. It looked like a couple slices of thick turkey lunch meat packed with fillers. 

There was no way it was going in my mouth. 

I pulled it out and then tried to eat the--now veggie--gyro. It was still awful. The tzatziki sauce was so bland it could have been water. The pita itself was nothing special. And the water from the soda fountain dispenser tasted worse than tap.

Best RV Rental ever.  All the features of a big company with the flexibility and friendliness of a small one.  The RV was clean, well maintained, stocked with conveniences. Pick up and drop off was very easy and hassle free. I rarely give recommendations to my friends, but Sand RV has been shared around. It was such pleasure working with them we will do so again.

Moved from Sun City and didn't bother telling us that. Got to the correct place finally and front office staff was rude as all hell.  Couldn't give a damn what we had gone through and that the website is showing the wrong address. Extremely short and rude with us and other people behind us and on the phone.   Drop the attitude lady. Why do these front office people act like they are doing us all a favor for doing their job?  She acted like it was the end of the world that we were checking in.  Excuse us for being patients and here paying you salary. 
The website is wrong.  Their address is jow 9069 W Thunderbird.

We purchased floor tile and installation for our 1800 sq. ft. home. We were first impressed with Matt and his staff in selecting the tile which we were looking for. He and his staff were very professional and personable. They found exactly what we wanted. Their installers were the best we have encountered (and we've had tile laid in several homes previously). The installers were prompt, extremely professional and hand rubbed each tile to ensure it fit perfectly. They were prompt, cleaned up meticulously after each day and were personable. We'd definitely recommend Floors and More.

Pretty much told me that all my stuff was worth nothing even though it had value when you research it online. Brought in some autographed sports memoribilia and they told me it was "a fake" but then still made me an offer.. Or more like a low-ball I should say. Worthless pawn.

Our pet enjoys the grooming, we know because she seems so happy when we leave her, and when she is picked up. 
 The staff is friendly and helpful. Dr.Johnson is friendly and cares about your pet. Her suggestions have been helpful, and shows empathy and is a good listener when explaining what's going on with our pet. Our dog just loves her, when she enters the room our dog wiggles all around her wagging her tail as she goes.The Paw plan they offered helped with the cost, and help us to maintain her required injections, including other needs. When scheduling appointments the staff works with you including when rescheduling.
Rebecca & Ralph

We recently went on an adventure of a lifetime - my husband rode his bicycle across America for Foster Children -and I followed along with our doggie to support him.

With that I had never driven an RV.  We contacted Sand Highway and the entire experience could not have been better.  We rented the 2017 24' Thor Class C from Laura, the owner.

Laura made me feel so comfortable on the entire process - from driving, the black and grey water, the levels, set up - just everything!

The support was unbelievable!  While we were on the road and had any questions, there was always someone to help us.  Additionally, Laura is the most encouraging positive person you would ever want to rent an RV from.  Her comments always included, "Have a great time on your adventure - have fun!

Because of Sand Highway and Laura, we know exactly where to go for RV needs in the future - SAND HIGHWAY!

We're so glad we found Sun City Animal Hospital!  Starting with the girls at reception desk, Carrie and Ashley are always friendly and helpful.  The techs are great too ~ they're very personable & you can tell they all really love their jobs!  Dr. Ashworth is the best!  She's so great with our 2 labradoodles, Jack & Baxter!  She takes her time and explains everything, plus she's very patient answering all our questions.  We feel very comfortable with the care our dogs receive at SCAH & highly recommend them!

I was looking at ads for low cost spay service for my puppy chihuahua.  They are out of their fricking minds $539.00 that how they list themselves "low cost". Floored me was almost hard to say thank you for your information. I might of said youre crazy!

Colby Management is North Pointe in Mesa Az. payment center, too.
I've also called to discuss my financials and can't get a name of whom I'm speaking with - let alone get a straight answer.  And ROOF RATS are actually eating/sharpening their teeth on our homes. HOA won't admit that we have any problems. I've don't some searching on "Colby Management" and I've come to the conclusion EMBEZZLEMENT. 
Follow the MONEY........Go to you HOA meeting.....Follow your MONEY.

Dr. Brown is an amazing vet and person and made a very difficult time as good as possible. I have had her here twice now for euthanasia services and she took time to talk with me and to examine them. For the first, it wasn't an easy call and we talked about options. I never felt rushed and she was so kind and supportive of my decision. I highly recommend her.

Very friendly staff, clean front office as well as exam room, that I was in. I felt comfortable there with my pet.
Dr. Johnson is super caring and listens to your concerns about your pet. I got the Paw Plan that helps me maintain my pets health at a great monthly rate. It covered my office visit, urine dip and my general teeth cleaning. I have never got something like this before but I am glad that I had as I have already used the plan twice now.
I am glad I found this vet and I also drive 22 minutes to get there. It is worth it to me and my pet!!!
Thank you Dr. Johnson!

Ace Fitness promptly delivered my AXT-225 home gym this past week.  The guys who delivered it and set it up for me did a great job.  Ruben then made a follow-up visit to fine-tune some things to my preference with the cables.  He is a master at fine-tuning home gyms.  I couldn't be happier with the team from Ace Fitness.  They were all wonderful and went the extra mile to make my AXT-225 home gym perfect.  I highly recommend them.
My first visit was great.  Nikki, my poodle, wasn't ill, I just wanted to get established with a good vet and, I did.  Sun City Animal hospital is my new vet.
The owner is an ignorant egotist. Talks down to customers and is amazingly rude. I wont be going back, even with really low prices, I don't like being treated rudely.

One of the worst barbershops customer service unprofessional rude Barber at a barbershop his name is Dave  I experienced him giving my brother a haircut that looked like a mop on his head I walked in there the next day with my brother and I told him that he needs to fix his hair because his hair looks like he has a mop and so  while he was cutting hair he was very rude he told me that I need to speak in English to my brother because were in America which is very racist because this country was founded on immigrants so we're all immigrants in America.  And then he tells me that I don't know how to address correctly and not my clothes don't match when and first off I am in the fashion world and I am a stylist a professional stylist like him he has the worst haircut he had the worst close to matching and he tried to cut hair like he still in the 60s. I'm sorry but he needs to update his license Go back to school and learn how to cut new hair styles.  Go back to school and learn how to cut the new style of haircuts. 

 Sincerely a barbershop review specialist.

Dr. Brown was referred to us by another vet.  Our dog Bruno had been diagnosed with Lymphoma and was at a point in his life where he was barely getting through each day.  We knew we had to do what was best for Bruno and called Dr. Brown. Dr. Brown was very compassionate, kind, and patient.  She walked us through the steps of what was going to happen and allowed us time to say any final goodbyes.  As difficult as it was to say goodbye to our beloved Bruno, we were very happy to have had Dr. Brown there to help us through the heartbreaking moment of having him leave our lives forever.  Thank you Dr. Brown for your kindness, professionalism and care of Bruno's final moments.

Dr. Johnson has always been such a wonderful Veterinarian for all of our dogs that we have brought there. For starters, and as someone who has worked as a Veterinary Technician, this practice is very clean, and very friendly!

Unfortunately, I cannot remember any names, but I don't think that I need to; when you receive help form the Sun City Animal Hospital, EVERYONE is kind to you there. In fact, it almost feels like a family in a way.

While there are always areas of improvement, there are little to none needed here! We were in for our appointment, out at a decent time, and most of all we felt welcomed and wanted there. 

A review long overdue, but certainly well worth it. Keep up the wonderful work!

(Catching up on reviews from my last trip to Phoenix Oct. 19-22)

This salon is the epitome of a Senior Citizen salon. Yes, it is Sun City, so I wouldn't expect any differently, and their hours cater to seniors-open 8am-4pm M-Sat. It is a cash/check type only place and there is a nail salon connected to the shop as well.

Why am I writing a review for this place? Well, this is my Grandma's hair salon and she has a weekly appointment here. If I am in town when she has her appointment, I take her. I think I have taken her here 3 times now (twice this year) and have seen her hair after an appointment more times than I can count. They do "old lady hair" and they do it just fine for a reasonable price. Her beautician is very nice and low key.

The real reason I wanted to write a review for this place is that in late July, the appointment my Grandma had here saved her life. How? Well, there were two retired nurses getting their hair done at the same time and they noticed a wound on my Grandmother's ankle. My Grandma had a biopsy taken earlier in the week on a possible skin cancer and sure enough, it turned out to become infected with MRSA and landed her in the hospital for a week and in a rehabilitation center for 3 more. 

Old lady hair do's or not, my Grandma is treated right here and at 88, here is where she will be every Saturday at 1pm.

One of the worst places around. It's a filthy and unprofessional. I saw a piercer piercing a young girls face without washing her hands or wearing gloves! I got out of there so fast! Do not get anything done here!!!
Food is always good. But this last time going thru the drive thru was disappointing. Rude gal at register/drive thru!!!

We rented a toy hauler from this family-owned company about a month ago, so this review is overdue. We we're having trouble finding a trailer that was available in the area for our weekend, but they suggested that we rent a toy hauler, which we hadn't thought of and it worked out great. The trailer came with basic necessities (dish soap, lighter, spatula, spoon, can opener), and it was clean. I accidentally ripped off a towel rack which I felt pretty bad about, but they just said it happens and didn't charge us extra. When we returned the trailer, they showed us other ones that had already been returned from the weekend that they would recommend for us next time, and they were beautiful! Can't wait for next time!

Me & my husband had been shopping/looking around before we settled with Floors n More! We were wanting someone who could work with us in short timing, had a selection of floors & a good reputation. I found this company through yelp so based on reviews I decided to go visit. Upon entering we were greeted by Lisa & felt welcomed. They have nice showroom with a great selection of wood look tile. Lisa was professional & gave us some tips on selecting a tile. We were able to take some samples home to help us decide. Once we made a decision Lisa was on board & made the transition so easy. We were on the schedule with in a week. We removed carpets & tile all downstairs from our two story home it was a little over 1100 square ft job. It took 9 days in total to finish the job. Martin was an AMAZING worker!! He is knowledgeable & easy to work with. He made the stress and transition into a smooth one. Thank you Martin for helping out so much especially with moving furniture, being patient with my dogs & being so accommodating to all the changes. He knows what he's doing & works so beautifully!!! The only complaint I have which is minimal is I never received a call or visit from Matt or Patty to see how things were going throughout the process or installation. Overall I recommend this company, they're in-house tile is very different, distinct & unique!! I love my new floors!

Nicole and her team are so amazing!  They came highly recommended by my wedding planner, but honestly, I fell in love with their work via their Instagram feed.  Their style and design was impeccable...and at such a good price.  All of my wedding planning was done long distance, and I didn't have a strong vision of what I wanted for florals.  I met with Nicole once to discuss my few inspirations for flowers, otherwise I gave her and her team total creative control.  I couldn't wait to get to the venue the day of the wedding to see what they had designed, and they did not disappoint!  They were able to bring several different design ideas together to create a cohesive look for the whole wedding.  Everything they make is magic, and I still drool over their Instagram feed!

customer service is a nightmare.  small showroom with no selection and high prices. try cornerstone flooring on 99th and bell for excellent help in finding what flooring is right for you! stay away from floors n more.  they are also more expensive them their competitors with no customer service skills!!!!!!!!!!
